name: Not Pacman
summary: Ever wondered how Pacman would be like with physics? No? Well, it's revolutionary. This mashup of "Not" and "Pacman" puts The Pac and the Ghosts in a Pacworld cage, at mercy of gravity and the level's shape, controlled solely by you. Ghosts still don't like you very much, so you should be careful to make Pacman avoid them.

name: Nonuple Nine: Asymptote
summary: "NONUPLE NINE: Asymptote" is a side-scrolling, narrative Sci-fi adventure game. Control the subject girl and solve the mystery of the building where the same floor loops. With vast scientific insights, can you find the answer for the "meaning of humanity" during this deadly journey?

name: Nostalgia
summary:
Nostalgia is a piano based rhythm game in Konami's BEMANI franchise. It is the first game in the Nostalgia series and a spiritual successor to Konami's Keyboardmania series.

The game consists of falling bars corresponding to certain areas of the keyboard. When the bars cross the judgement line it is time to play that key. There are three type of notes - Normal note which you play as normal, slide note where you slide your hand across the keyboard and trill note where you rapidly and alternately press two neighbouring keys.

The keyboard itself consists of 28 keys, but unlike a real keyboard the black keys are omitted. This was done because it was viewed as added difficulty to the game during location testing and the aim was to make the game more accessibly than other games in the BEMANI franchise.

The game features a story mode communicated only with animated cut scenes without any spoken word, making it accessible regardless if you do not know Japanese. The game song list consists of 83 songs.

name: Nostalgia: Op.2
summary:
Nostalgia: Op.2 (Op.2 meaning the second opus) is a piano based rhythm game in Konami's BEMANI franchise. It is the second game in the Nostalgia series and a spiritual successor to Konami's Keyboardmania series.

The game consists of falling bars corresponding to certain areas of the keyboard. When the bars cross the judgement line it is time to play that key. There are three type of notes - Normal note which you play as normal, slide note where you slide your hand across the keyboard and trill note where you rapidly and alternately press two neighbouring keys.

Op.2 adds a recital mode, with more strict timing, pressure requirements on key presses and bigger penalties on misses and how many keys may be played at the same time. Recital mode also challenges you with picking songs of a certain theme to fill your game session. An enourmous settings screen was also added so that you can customize your play (scroll speed, note style, falling style etc.).

The story mode added proper progression with a map screen, diverging simultaneous stories, and themed worlds with according unlockable songs. All songs from Nostalgia and Nostalgia: Forte are returning for this game. Along with the 126 new songs in Op.2, that brings the total song list up to 307 songs.

name: Nostalgia: Forte
summary:
Nostalgia is a piano based rhythm game in Konami's BEMANI franchise. It is an standalone expansion of the first game in the Nostalgia series and a spiritual successor to Konami's Keyboardmania series.

The game consists of falling bars corresponding to certain areas of the keyboard. When the bars cross the judgement line it is time to play that key. There are three type of notes - Normal note which you play as normal, slide note where you slide your hand across the keyboard and trill note where you rapidly and alternately press two neighbouring keys.

The game adds a grade system where your overall skill in the game is measured. A NEAR judgement has also been added, which is obtained when you press the wrong key near the right key, but in the right time. It does not earn any score, but stop you from losing your combo. Arcade matchmaking is extended to 4 players at the same time.

The game extends the base games 83 songs with 98 new songs for a total of 181 songs.

name: Nostalgia: Op.3
summary:
Nostalgia: Op.3 (Op.3 meaning the third opus) is a piano based rhythm game in Konami's BEMANI franchise. It is the third game in the Nostalgia series and a spiritual successor to Konami's Keyboardmania series.

The game consists of falling bars corresponding to certain areas of the keyboard. When the bars cross the judgement line it is time to play that key. There are three type of notes - Normal note which you play as normal, slide note where you slide your hand across the keyboard and trill note where you rapidly and alternately press two neighbouring keys.

Op.3 adds more sorting functionality to the song selection screens, which is needed as the song list has grown in size. It also allows you to filter on your scores and grades, making it easier to improve your overall skill level in the game. Recital mode is now a toggle on the standard mode instead of another mode.

This is the first time in the series where some songs are not carried over from previous version, due to licenses not being renewed. 75 songs were brought forward from Nostalgia, 97 from Nostalgia: Forte and 126 from Nostalgia: Op.2. Along with the 49 new songs in Op.3, that brings the total song list up to 347 songs (as of 27th June 2020). Since this is an currently active game, the song list will likely expand up until the release of the next game in the series.

name: No Secrets
summary: cw: implied adult content! | seizure warning | a collection of thoughts on 4 sept 2017

name: No Cortarás a tu Hermana con el Filo de Esta Espada
summary: The invasion is here and your only chance is to travel around the city recruiting different gangs. It is not about fighting them, violence is not going to help you this time: you will have to negotiate, know what to say and how to say it to bring them to your side and be ready once the invasion arrives.

name: Nowhere New
summary: After crash-landing on a mysterious planet, novice engineer Nova Collins must unravel the secrets of a town's messy past to escape it. Talk your way through this enigmatic place, but beware: ideas manifest as things that can be traded and lost, so don't lose yourself along the way...

name: No Destination
summary: A purgatory of forlorn memories.

name: Nodeshifter
summary:
Nodeshifter is a modern, roguelike arcade game that pits you against an invading horde of Kryptorians in the single most deadly offensive launched against the forces of humankind — through the computer! So get your power gloves out because you’ve been approved to pilot a state-of-the-art Nodeshifter digital vessel. 
 
Each Nodeshifter comes fully equipped with a rapidly orbiting Node capable of summoning destruction at a scale the likes of which has been heretofore unseen. Ok so maybe the Nodeshifter isn't exactly that advanced… and yes maybe the weapon systems are a little crude but don’t worry along the way you will pick up a number of upgrades to make smashing aliens easier. Sure, it may be in pixels, but that doesn’t make it any less metal. 
 
To become a Star Defender pilot takes guts, skill, and bravery. But if you are selected to be a part of this elite alien fighting space force then your name will be etched in the stars of valor forever. 
 
Power-Up Your Play Style: Acquire unique and game-changing Enhancements for your Shifter that will dramatically alter your strategy and play style for the run. Try out new combinations for punishing results. 
 
Even Loss is Progress: Pick up Saalt from your fallen foes to purchase Cassettes that will give you a competitive advantage in future runs. These power-ups are permanent upgrades that can be chosen to better fit your uniquely preferred play style and preference. 
 
New Paths of Destruction Every Time: Every level of Nodeshifter is dynamically generated so that your pixel carnage is fresh every time you play. It’s so timeless, it’s practically undead! 
 
A Unique World to Explore: I mean, “explore” is a loaded word here, but there’s a story and everything. And it kinda rules? 
 
Think you have what it takes to beat the hardest game known to mankind? Join the journey of a galactic lifetime and play Nodeshifter today!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence with Power-Up Kit
summary: "Nobunaga's Ambition'' is the definitive historical simulation game about becoming a Sengoku daimyo and aiming to unify the country. The 30th anniversary work "Nobunaga's Ambition: Creation" has achieved the biggest and strongest power-up in the history of the series! Numerous new elements have been added, including a "new corps system" where you take command as a daimyo, a "new battle system" where you take command as a military commander, and "Sengokuden" where you live in a turbulent and turbulent time as a human. Create everything with your hands, from the beginning of the Sengoku period to the climax!

name: Norn9 Lofn for Nintendo Switch
summary:
A bundle of Norn9: Var Commons (Main Game) and Norn9: Last Era (Fandisc) for the Nintendo Switch.

Within an old-fashioned town, much like the Meiji and Taisho Era, there exists a giant globe that floats in midair. This is the 'ship' called 'Norn'. The inside is set like a small town with parks, etc.

The story takes place a little in the future. Guided by one particular song, young elementary kid, Suzuhara Sorata is warped through a time skip to an unfamiliar place much like the Meiji and Taisho eras from his textbooks. In this world, he meets 3 young ladies and 9 young men and joins them on a journey aboard the mysterious 'Norn' ship in the sky.

name: Nora to Oujo to Noraneko Heart 2: Dakimakura Cover Set
No Umbrellas Allowed
summary: Reveal the true value of the items coming into the shop. Each item has their own history. Dig deep to see what is behind them and become an expert appraiser. Begin a tug of war with customers. With their own expectations and knowledge, they never give up on money.

name: Nova Lands
summary: Nova Lands is a factory building, exploration, and island management game. Explore, engage in combat, and automate your industry. The planet you’re on is full of mysteries, creatures, people, and things to do. Welcome to your new home amongst the stars!

name: Nova Parkour
summary: With "Nova Parkour," is an parkour game that challenges players. Developed by IMG Studio "Nova Parkour" redefines the parkour gaming experience, offering an parkour game for players of all skill levels.

name: Now Boarding
summary: The employees of Airways Airlines are an interesting bunch. Their airport is going to be closed if they don't get some help quick. Take charge and get the airport running smooth. Be responsible for delivering all passengers and keep them happy. But you're not alone - employees will be working along side you. Lead your team and help them learn skills.

name: Nour: Play with Your Food
summary: Nour is an experimental food art game designed to make you hungry. Free from the constraints of scores, time limits, and realism, Nour lets you play with your food as if you're a kid again, with no mess to clean up.

name: Nova: The Birth
summary: NOVA: The Birth is a limit-removing megawad released in 2014. It was made by members of the Doomworld community who were new or inexperienced with mapping at the time.

name: Not in the Groove
summary: A rhythm game based on StepMania, In The Groove, and other games alike, that provides modding capabilities to charts, and features compatibility with most StepMania and In The Groove charts previously available, uses mods to allow for a different twist on charts, breaking the boundaries for what a playable chart can be.

name: Nova II: New Dawn
summary: NOVA II: New Dawn is a limit-removing megawad released in 2015. It is the sequel to 2014's NOVA: The Birth, and follows the same concept of being predominantly made by Doomworld users who were newer and/or inexperienced with mapping.

name: Noir Fury
summary: An Ion Fury map with a black and white twist

name: Nova III
summary: Nova III is a Boom-compatible megawad released in 2019. Continuing from Nova II: New Dawn and Nova: The Birth, the project was aimed at newer or inexperienced Doom mappers. Nova III went through a lengthy development cycle of four years, with multiple changes in management. The project was first publicly announced on the Doomworld forums with a sign-up and planning thread on December 22, 2015, under the leadership of James Collins (an_mutt). Development officially began on January 17, 2016.

name: Noch
summary:
Go alone (or with a friend) to find the girl who destroyed the world. An ominous surreal first-person adventure full of dangerous monsters and secrets of the deceased world

Let's start!

Imagine… Night. You’re in a car, lost among endless forest on a highway. Perhaps you will desperately try to escape... Try not to lose hope. You were in hurry to get somewhere. But does it matter now?

After all, Lisa has already destroyed the world and our reality has become unsteady, like a dream. All around, or maybe only around you, was an unimaginably thick sparkling black-blue haze with no end. The worst thing happens - an animal being scared to death by jumping to the road from the forest.
Crash. You are alive. You have to get out of the broken car and face what the time-changing reality has prepared for you. Welcome to the worst! And remember, waiting for dawn is useless, but death will not bring salvation...

Can you survive if the nature of things as they are is destroyed? And what will you do if you meet the one that is hard to remember and impossible to forget? The one responsible for the endless night and darkness?

Your adventure begins!

name: NoMaKo
summary:
NoMaKo is an omorashi RPG. If the term “omorashi” is alien to you, then this probably isn’t your type of game! It’s usual turn based RPG action with adventures to be had, dungeons to be travelled through, and many puzzles to solve. All while drinking to recover HP and MP and having to deal with the bladder need of the characters who are animated with progressively more desperate squirming. If this need isn’t handled, well… laundry can be done at any inn! Design is intended to not be frustrating: running is always successful, no missing, KO’d party members still receive EXP, etc! 
 
A unique feature compared to other RPGs of this type is the ability for characters to learn to push themselves further with holding. After an accident or using the toilet when beyond their limit, the character’s holding ability will permanently grow slightly! This can be seen on their status page.

name: Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition
summary: Nongunz is a roguelite action-platformer described as “The Binding of Isaac meets Cookie Clicker.” Battle grotesque creatures, kill quickly to maintain your combo meter, and rescue worshipers to become part of your idle army to buy upgrades.

name: Noise City Osaka
summary:
Sougaku Toshi Osaka is a simulation game that takes place in the future in which the player can choose a party of 3 member from 6 different characters.

In the game the characters can improve their stats doing different jobs and activities each week meanwhille they go to different places of Osaka and there they can talk with different characters and go to shops and buy different items.

The gameplay use a first person perspective and use close up views when the player characters appear and when they talk to other characters. The game features different events during the weeks.

name: No End in Sight
summary: No End In Sight is a megawad for The Ultimate Doom created by three Doom the Way id Did contributors: Emil Brundage (NaturalTvventy), Xaser Acheron, and Christopher Lutz. The megawad includes both new levels and levels modified from Doom the Way id Did. The first three episodes are vanilla-compatible, whilst the fourth episode requires a limit-removing source port. It was named as one of the winners of the 2017 Cacowards, and the final version 1.4 was released in July 2019. On March 31, 2020, it was added to the list of official add-ons for the Doom Classic Unity port.

name: Not Another Weekend
summary: For all the fans of pixel art out there, get ready for the wackiest adventure of time. You are a bellboy, Mike Melkout, working at a high-class hotel. Mike may seem crazy, or even peculiar or he might as well be. Nevertheless, he has only one plan. A dark plan. To throw everyone out in just one Weekend. A humorous point ’n’ click adventure game, set in the ’80s, as a tribute to the pop culture of that era.

name: Not a Hero - Me, Myself & Bunnylord
summary: The ME, MYSELF & BUNNYLORD Campaign lets you play as the BunnyLord himself! Use unreasonable force reasonably to fix his space-time-continuum mishaps and restore balance to the universe in this new adventure featuring 3 all new missions, with new baddies, settings and challenges.

name: No Limite
summary:
No Limite is a survival sim based on the reality show by the same name, developed by Continuum and published by Brasoft in collaboration with Rede Globo.

Be one of the twelve participants of the virtual No Limite and live days of great emotion! Make part of the Sol team or the Lua team and socialize with the other participants. Meet the other participants to vote in the Portal of the 4 Elements. But beware! The audience is watching everything and you may be eliminated.

name: No Place for the Dissident
summary: In No Place for the Dissident you'll have to spread a new ideology to dominate the world. Whatever means are necessary. Adopt new politics from the ideology tree, manage each country, and compete with other players. Watch closely the consequences of your acts when the game is over.

name: Nomads of Driftland
summary:
Nomads of Driftland is an RTS game initially created as an add-on to Driftland: The Magic Revival. Since it is significantly different from the base game, it was released as standalone expansion available for free. 
 
Base game - Driftland: The Magic Revival is a unique fusion of RTS, 4X strategy, and Sim genres in a fantasy world made up of the shattered planet. The player takes on the role of a powerful mage-ruler capable of moving and reshaping parts of the planet. Both game mechanics and history are based on an innovative concept of dynamic topography and issuing orders to individuals with free will. 
 
Nomads do not have a ruler and do not carry out orders like other races in the base game. Units are managed directly, like in classic RTS games. New unit types/classes affect strategy on the battlefield.

name: Nox Archaist
summary:
Nox Archaist is a brand-new Ultima-style CRPG from 6502 Workshop, endorsed by Richard Garriott. For Windows, MacOS, and original Apple II hardware, available as a Digital Download and Collector's Boxed Set.  
 
Within a deep and engaging story, you control one or more characters who travel Vali, visiting towns and castles, exploring dungeons, and fighting monsters. As your characters grow in wealth, experience and skill, they will face ever greater foes and challenges as you seek to save the world from an unknown and terrible danger. 
 
Lord British himself has traveled the metaverse to Vali, to aid you on your quest!

name: Noolwok Nimble Delivery Service
summary: Noolwok Nimble Delivery Service is a first-person fetch and deliver quest game set in a vast post-apocalyptic and unique world in which the sea is the new way of life. Delve into the secrets and adventures of the Noolwok fleet as a parcel deliverer. Use your instinct and trust of the people and environments around you to navigate and solve mysteries on your way to the destination.

name: N.O.V.A. Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance
summary:
This version of N.O.V.A. is different from the 3D game, being a 2D sidescroller shooter.
The player must fight against aliens, using different abilities to proceed in each stage.

name: Nocturne in Yellow
summary:
Nocturne in Yellow is a fantasy medieval first-person shooter using an extremely modified version of the idtech1 engine, also known as the Doom engine. In it, you play as a dude marching through ancient castles with the realization that every myth and story ever made in the history of man is true and all of them are pissed off at you for having a pulse and four functional limbs.
You utilize a bow, some grenades, and a spear in order to fend them off, wandering deeper to stop the rise of the dark lord threatening to spread death, destruction, and hurt feelings all around.

Being a first-person shooter, you step into the eyes of a protagonist and wield whatever weapon he was smart enough to grab before wandering off on this death quest. Primary fire, well, fires whatever weapon you're using, while secondary fire lobs a grenade at whatever looks funny at you.
Run around through seven maps, picking up items and stabbing dudes before reaching a boss at the end, and then stab the boss. Boss drops artifact, pick up artifact for more powers for your bow, and then move on to the next level to repeat as needed. After you do this seven times, you win!
If you play on Story Mode, occasionally there will be long walls of text about people talking about their feelings. If you play on Arcade mode, all of the boring text will be stripped out, leaving you free to stab enemies without hearing about their failed love life.

name: No Place Like Home
summary: Humanity trashed the Earth and left for Mars. Only few remained. Explore the world. Clean the environment, Craft with recycled resources. Domesticate animals. Rebuild your village. Restore environment and run your own post-apo farm as there is 'No Place Like Home'!

name: Nociception ~ Simple Outlook From Hell
summary: A happy demon known as Empitts escapes out of Hell to retrieve ice cream.

name: Nostalgia Konaste
summary:
The cloud-based home release of the arcade series Nostalgia, released as part of Konami's Konaste line.

Largely based on Nostalgia Op.3, the most recent arcade release at the time of launch.

name: Nora Roberts: Vision in White
summary: When a casual fling turns steamy for a brilliant wedding photographer, life remains less than picture perfect. Relying on girlfriends to cope with the reality of her past, will Mackensie capture the romance, or will her narcissistic mother and fear of commitment be the prophetic snapshot of her future? Take part in Nora Roberts’ best-selling novel in Nora Roberts Vision in White, a fun Hidden Object game.

name: Not a Happy Family
summary:
Not a Happy Family is a game that you play as a blind protagonist. Your role in story mode is to explore the entire house for clues to understand your family's history.

The plot was written in a way that leaves several things in suspense, counted between the lines, leaving the player always with "a flea behind the ear" related to the events of the game.

It was also used a device for the player to set the story of the game without knowing that he is taking an important action, that is, it is possible to replay more than once and obtain different outcomes for each day and for the game itself.

The "For Fun" mode is the way in which the player must try to escape from the mansion while having a monster behind him wanting to kill him. It is a way that can make the player tense for not knowing where the monster is and even more, for the aggravating player being blind.

name: Not Dead Yet
summary: Kill zombies, buy better gear, die, repeat. You can also play with 3 other friends.

name: North Modding Company: Bergsbruk
summary: Bergsbruk lets you mine gold, crush gravel, build roads, tunnes or just play around with heavy equipment but they will breakdown and need repairs.

name: NoReload Heroes: Enhanced Edition
summary: NoReload Heroes Enhanced Edition is a couch co-op twin stick shooter for 1 to 4 that combines the devilishly engaging combat with the shenanigans of having your friends over for game night. Fight the mighty wizbot Mephisto and take on his hordes of henchbots to reclaim the mage’s tower. NoReload Heroes Enhanced Edition sees you fighting your way through 18 levels, 40+ types of enemies, and all with an arsenal of over 150 weapons.

name: North Town
summary: Conquer the icy lands and build the most magnificent city of the North! Admire the vivid scenery, meet the gods and interact with the locals. Become the master of economy, develop your settlement, and rule the North Town!

name: No Way Out: A Dead Realm Tale
summary:
100 years after the massacre at Huxley’s Mansion rumors swirl of an unclaimed treasures waiting to be collected. But there are things the rumors don’t mention. The murderous ghosts who prowl the hallways waiting for your torch to dim… The wails of a grieving mother who begs you to help her son. And the madman at the center of it all, William Huxley, whose inventions have left the mansion suspended somewhere between Earth and hell.

No Way Out: A Dead Realm Tale challenges you to solve puzzles, overcome ghosts and free yourself from Huxley’s grasp before it’s too late. This immersive VR experience provides a spine-tingling twist on the haunted house genre. Will you escape? Or will you become just another lost soul trapped forever in Huxley’s Mansion?

name: Nomads of Driftland: The Forgotten Passage
summary:
Nomads: The Forgotten Passage is the scenario pack for Nomads of Driftland.  
 
Includes ten new scenarios: 
- The Long-awaited ally 
- The sources 
- Dwarven solidarity 
- Gold rush 
- Forsaken Wastes 
- Large-scale encounter 
- Ancient knowledge 
- From ashes to bones 
- Path clearing 
- Forgotten passage

name: Notebook Ninja Fights
summary: These are the ninja doodles you used to draw in your notebook in Science class turned into life!

name: Nova Island
summary:
On Nova Island, experience 1v1 card battles like you never have before!

Looking for a new kind of strategy game with great characters? Nova Island has the gameplay experience for you! Take on single player challenges, play matches with friends, and compete against players from around the world to climb the leaderboards. Nova Island is free to play —start playing now to put your strategy to the test!

Play cards to gain strength, deal damage, or disrupt your opponent in a way they’ll never see coming. Choose one of 8 Pro Characters, each bringing 6 unique Superpowers to the battle.

name: No One Can Ever Know
summary: No One Can Ever Know is an autobiographical game about dealing with gender dysphoria, and the consequences of repressing your emotions. The game mechanics are inspired by classic survival horror games. As you navigate the levels, you encounter intrusive thoughts, which increase your dysphoria meter. If the meter reaches 100%, it's game over, so you need to properly manage your phone battery in order to distract yourself from the thoughts and make it through the day.

name: Nordicandia
summary:
Nordicandia is a semi-idle action RPG with a deep and unique crafting system.

Collect epic loot, craft and merge items, and level up your character to beat the World Bosses! Adventure forth as a mighty Warrior, agile Hunter or a powerful Mage. Assign Attributes to specialize your Character, and unlock unique Active and Passive Skills as you progress.

name: Nobody Saves the World
summary: Nobody Saves the World is an action role-playing game played from a top-down perspective. The game can be played solo or in a cooperative multiplayer mode. In the game, the player controls a blank-state character named Nobody, who is equipped with a wand.

name: Noddy's Playtime
summary:
Noddy's Playtime is an edutainment game aimed at children between 3 to 8 years old. The game is based around Enid Blyton's Noddy books, and the accompanying TV series.

It consists of several mini-games, accessed by a driving section where the player drives Noddy's car between different places in Toytown. The games are: Railway Station (memory game), Post Office (maths), Market Place (reading), Chimney House (music), Noah's Ark (jigsaw puzzle), Farm Yard (matching), N & B Works (odd-one-out) and Noddy's Paint Pot (art). The different ages that the game is aimed at are catered for by having three different difficulty levels which make the games harder for older children.

name: Northgard: The Viking Age Edition
summary:
After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: NORTHGARD.The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods.That is, if they can survive the dire Wolves and Undead Warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North. 
 
Northgard: The Viking Age Edition includes: 
- Northgard 
- Northgard - Sváfnir, Clan of the Snake 
- Northgard - Nidhogg, Clan of the Dragon 
- Northgard - Svardilfari, Clan of the Horse 
- Northgard - Lyngbakr, Clan of the Kraken 
- Northgard - Himminbrjotir, Clan of the Ox 
- Northgard - Brundr & Kaelinn, Clan of the Lynx

name: Nostalgia of Magic
summary:
Developed by the unknown developer IKGN Soft and published by KOGA, Nostalgia of Magic certainly looks old for a 1997 game, even by Korean DOS game standard. Apparently emulating the visual style of the first Ys games, with tiny sprites and sparse coloring, it rather looks like a late 1980s home computer game. Even in cutscenes, which are zoomed in and show much more detail than the regular game graphics, the 8-bit style is preserved. Only during combat, which is not at all like Ys but held in typical JRPG fashion, the characters are replaced by much more realisticly pixeled sprites. Oddly, only one half of the unusually wide battlefield is displayed at any given time, with the camera scrolling abck and forth during attacks. 
 
The game design feels equally archaic. The different regions of the game world are accessed in fairly linear order, but it got the same kind of undocumented hidden passages, unspecific aims and inconspicious event triggers as the classics. Other than most 8-bit games, though, enemy encounters can be seen on the map beforehand and therefore be avoided, but once they see the player party, they hunt them down relentlessly.

name: Northern Blade
summary: Northern Blade is a dynamic action MMORPG from one of the oldest domestic developers. Its innovative combat system, powerful focus on PvP and vivid, realistic fantasy setting immerse the player in an atmosphere of global war, where the future of nations is decided by only one judge: your blade.

name: NovaMundi: The Spear of Chaquén
summary: A Historical Strategy Sim set in a beautiful and perilous land of mountains and jungles inspired by the geography of South America and its indigenous cultures. Unite the Muisca people to repel the Spanish invasion of the Andean highlands. New adventures await you every time.

name: Nonogram Galaxy
summary:
The goal is to find out which of the squares should be painted (or left blank), to form a figure, which will emerge when the hobby is solved correctly. Each number, on top of each column and to the left of each row, indicates how many squares must be filled in the grid, forming blocks.
There must be at least one blank space between one block and another. After completing the grid, the image will be revealed.

name: No Meteors
summary: A self-proclaimed god enters a high school as a transfer student, trying to navigate the intricacies of human dating life in time for Valentine's day.

name: No Escape Saga
summary:
A story as old as civilization itself... What you are about to experience is the result of over 18 years of grueling research on one of History's most elusive GameToy titles. I have attempted here to faithfully recreate the experience as it was intended- salvaging interviews, screenshots, and promotional videos from Nindendy Power- to give the most complete simulation of this masterwork as can be done with modern technology. I hope some enjoy it- and more are moved by it. What started as a hobby has become a life-changing opportunity to enlighten the gamers of the world, and I think this is it. Thank you.

DR. ELIZABETH DEADMAN, ESQ.

name: #NoLimitFantasy, Super Puzzles Dream
summary: Puzzles move onto the next level with ‘Super Puzzle Dream’, a mix between classic jigsaw and a ‘Tetris’-style dynamic mechanic. #NoLimitFantasy! is the hashtag for this section. Devoted to the necessary and forgotten world of fantasy featuring illustrations and motivational messages after each puzzle is completed. Two levels of play, 'senior' (for adults) and 'junior' (for children aged 3+), guarantee hours of entertainment for all. Become an expert and finish the puzzles in the shortest possible time and you will find yourself amongst the best in the world on the online leaderboard. You can also play with friends and family in the one-on-one split-screen competition mode. Your rival won't make it easy for you! Don't give up - fill an energy bar to perform a counterattack and put them in their place. Get the 3 stars in the 25 jigsaw puzzle with 7 difficulties each. This gives the game great replayability.. Remember, without fun there is no « Super Puzzles Dream »

name: No Chance
summary:
No Chance is a single-level PWAD for Doom II requiring Boom-compatible source ports that came out in September 2008. It was designed by Death-Destiny and uses the music track "Absence of light" by Symphony X. No Chance gets its name due to its incredibly high level of difficulty.

In 2018, No Chance was included in the Top 25 Missed Cacowards.

name: Nox Terrorem: Lost Souls
summary: A survival horror game where you must evade an ancient terror and solve a chilling mystery.

name: No Man's Island
summary: No Man's Island is an uncompromising wilderness survival game. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.

name: Nokosu
summary: Nokosu is a short independant game, which metaphorically deals with the topics of change and letting go, through simple puzzles, a musical environment, and aesthetic exploration.

name: Northern Blades
summary: "Northern Blades" is a visual novel about warriors who gave part of their humanity and soul for the benefit of the inhabitants of the northern lands. But what is their real purpose?

name: Nowhere Else and Beyond
summary: A free indie Browser Based MMORPG that has shut down.

name: No.L85
summary: No.L85 is an exploration shooting game in which only one person participates in the whole process and obtains materials to survive in the thin air area.If you can tolerate loneliness, explore.It takes patience.

name: Now Testing: 407
summary: A puzzle-platform game taking place inside of a videogame where you can exploit glitches to solve puzzles and traverse outside of the actual game map.

name: Now There Be Goblins
summary: Fight off hordes of goblins in this VR smack and smash tower defence hybrid! Punish the invading goblins by using your mighty chained hammer and your wide arsenal of traps and structures.

name: No School No Rules
summary: Immerse yourself in the full cycle of life of the most severe school in Russia! The game will tell you the story of a Russian schoolboy Ivan who is on the verge of graduation and expulsion. He intends to finish school in his own way and, along the way, take revenge on all teachers and local bullies.

name: No Parachute
summary: No Parachute is a fast-paced arcade game with a pixel art style, in which you will dodge various obstacles in free fall. Try to find out what is on the other side of the tunnel, and save your arms and legs along the way!

name: No More Room in Hell 2
summary: No More Room in Hell 2 is a terrifying 8 player co-op action horror experience. Find your friends in the dark and survive - in a dynamic, endlessly replayable zombie apocalypse.

name: Notebook Artillery
summary: The classic game of Artillery with beautiful hand-drawn art. Play solo with Target Practice, or play against a friend in Vs. mode.

name: No One Lives in Heaven
summary: What happens to the inhabitants of a game world after you have finished it? In the story-driven, 40-hour role-playing game No one lives in heaven, you will encounter over 200 unique NPCs with over 300 quests that can be solved in various ways. Philosophical and crazy.

name: No Hope
summary: No Hope is a survival horror game based on the classics of the genre. You are a teenager and you must survive the darkness that has fallen over the city. There are terrible monster along the way, few resources, locked doors and some scares.

name: Nosferatu's Butler
summary: A surveyor breaks into a mysterious and sinister Mansion on Pleasant Street in order to find his missing sister. She was last seen being interviewed by the mansion's young and mysterious Butler.

name: NobleEscape
summary: NobleEscape is the ultimate story based, puzzle, escape room game out there. You start the game with one end goal; Escape the room to save your life! Not only will you need to escape the room, but you need to avoid multiple obstacles along the way.

name: Noir Punk
summary: 2D sidescrolling adventure narrative game with puzzle solving and platforming elements.

name: Noctambulant
summary: Noctambulant is a hand-drawn 2D survival and psychological horror game. Renee moves in with her grandmother after the passing of her parents in a tragic accident. Walk with Renee and unfold the terrifying mystery as to why she was made to go to bed early every night.

name: No Cure
summary: Step into the shoes of Jon. A police officer in 1984 at the beginning of a zombie outbreak. An adventurer found a mysterious worm that once brought to the city creates a flood of zombies and could lead to the end of the world. You must explore the city, find health and guns to survive.

name: Noah's Ark
summary: Welcome to Noah's Ark, a realistic simulator game inspired by stories from Genesis of the Bible. Now it is time for you to be like Noah and build famous vessel, save (hunt) animals and survive during the biggest flood ever. Are you ready for this challenge?

name: Nocturne
summary: The afterlife is now digital. Discover that eternal life comes with sacrifice in a genre-defying RPG with unique rhythm combat.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Tenkafubu Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." This scenario centers around Nobunaga's grand plan to unite the land, and the historical drama that it ignited.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Nagashinonotatakai Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." Following Shingen's death, Nobunaga senses an opportunity to strike at the Takeda clan. In this age of uncertainty, heroes are made and legends are born.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Dutiful Lord of Echigo Scenario
summary: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Harukage Nagao succeeded his father, Tamekage Nagao of Echigo, as leader of the Nagao clan. However, his weak nature soon had control passing to his younger brother Kagetora.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Battle of Nagashino Scenario
summary: A great star falls. With the death of the head of the Takeda clan, it appeared the Takeda offensive was over. However, even without Shingen, the Takeda weren't finished. Katsuyori, the heir of the Tiger, continued to expand with the same momentum as his predecessor.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - The Battle of Okitanawate Scenario
summary: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Following the defeat of the Otomo by the Shimazu, the Ryuzoji clan began to build up their own forces. This left the battle for Kyushu between the Shimazu and Ryuzoji clans.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit - Shokutokudoumei Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit". Relive the historical drama unfold towards unification in the footsteps of Nobunaga Oda and Ieyasu Tokugawa, the sworn allies from childhood.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Tennouzan Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." After the Incident at Honnoji, chaos reigns once more, and heroes from across the land vie for power.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Dokuganryutatsu Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." This scenario centers around the bold and ambitious One-Eyed Dragon, Masamune Date, and his heroic gamble to seize control of the land. This is a story of passion and unbridled ambition.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Mount Tennozan Scenario
summary: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." Who will gain control of the chaotic world that springs up after the death of Nobunaga Oda? Will it be Mitsuhide Akechi or Hideyoshi Hashiba? A battle for control of the land erupts in the vicinity of Mount Tennozan.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit - Gunshinkourinsu Scenario
summary: Additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou with Power Up Kit". Kagetora Uesugi, later known to become Kenshin Uesugi the God of War, arrives at a battle shattered Echigo. Relive the historical drama of the ambitious expedition the young hero sets out to.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Tetorigawa Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." Nobunaga Oda, in an attempt to seize control of the land, comes face to face with the honorable Kenshin Uesugi. This is the story of men who followed their ambitions to the bitter end.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Birth of Nobunaga Scenario
summary: An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi." ▼How to use To play, select "New Game." Then, from the scenario selection screen, select "Birth of Nobunaga."

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Shingenjouraku Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." The time has finally arrived for the Takeda Army, reputedly the strongest in the land, to march upon the capital. Shingen's illness has healed, and he is no longer uncertain of what he desires.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Itsukushima Scenario
summary: An additional playable scenario for the title "Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou." This scenario centers around the great strategist Motonari Mori, and the time he made his move. This is the story of men who dreamed of conquest, and risked their lives.

name: No Light
summary: When wake up, you in a strange world. You must learn to be strong in this dangerous and dark world. Look for all the materials that can live, light the torch in hand, this light may be the last hope, but don't forget, in this boundless darkness, the light will also let "them" See you.

name: Nothing to Remember
summary: Nothing To Remember is an immersive murder mystery that runs in real-time, right on your desktop. Through their personal messages, you'll uncover two characters unknowingly intertwined as they hunt a killer long thought dead. When your next choice could mean life or death, will you answer the call?

name: No More Surffer
summary: Enter a dark 2d platform style game with choices to speak the truth and the lie it will only depend on the path you want to follow and beware of the ending you will achieve.

name: No Game No Life
summary: "No Game No Life" is a puzzle game that erases cubes that increase and decrease according to the rules of "Conway's Game of Life".

name: Norsk: Epistle
summary: Norsk: Epistle is an experimental singleplayer game. Set in the atmospheric abandoned Siberian town the game will introduce how to solve puzzles using second dimension in 3d world to understand what happened with humanity.

name: No Man is an Island
summary: Zombie virus swept the world, the infected people were isolated to some closed islands. Some organizations hold zombie hunting competitions. In a hunting, you're infected with the virus and abandoned on an island. The hunt is not over and you've gone from hunter to prey.

name: Notre-Dame de Paris: Journey Back in Time
summary: Ubisoft proposes a Virtual Reality visit of Notre-Dame de Paris in real time, based on the XVIIIth century reconstitution from the videogame Assassin’s Creed : Unity.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou - Power Up Kit
No More Light
summary: No More Light is a narrative survival shooter where humanity’s last remnants battle an alien insectoid invasion. Thrown into a post-apocalyptic world, you’ll turn enemies into weapons, undergo a deadly metamorphosis, control weather, and fight for survival in brutal, high-stakes combat.

name: No toilet paper!!
summary:
Is this happen to you?
When you go to the toilet, and there’s no toilet paper...
That kinds helpless ,sadness feelings...or even just put on your pants without wipe your butt after all...
Hey...don’t give up so quick...here comes our savior!!

Now grab the toilet paper and help the people on toilet together.

name: No Humanity
summary: The genre of the game is bullet hell without shoot'em up, it looks relatively low effort. It's like b-movies, it's so bad it's good. The game design philosophy behind is controlled chaos, if you can't control or learn from randomness, you might have a hard time mastering this very unique game. It also includes a handy map editor, a world explorer full of stuff created by our community, a fun fast paced multiplayer mode and lots of ships and cosmetics to unlock

name: Nose
summary: Nose is one of the few games released for the Game Boy Advance add-on Play-Yan. It was distributed online by Nintendo in 2005

name: NoSeq
summary:
You ever had dreams but never kept a dream diary? Me neither!

This game is a throwback to dreaming and not having your cake, don't remember anything? No worries, you'll forget everything after today too!

This game is basically a simulation on what a dream could hypothetically be. What is a dream? What is a nightmare? What is your mind that causes you to have a weird dream that doesn't make sense? Are we guilty? Are we innocent?

name: Nostalgici Anonimi
summary:
Can't stop playing video games? You watch over and over again your favorite TV shows? Don't worry! The Nostalgici Anonimi visual novel program is here for you! Our expert team of androids uses dialogue, listening and card interpretations to help you overcome your obsessions.
Join the program now!

name: Now you can't see me
summary: First person puzzle. Solve riddles by closing your eyes or blinking them. While your eyes are closed, time freezes and gravity has no power over you. There is a funny voice acting and non-trivial tasks included.

name: No Ghost in Stay Home
summary: A dimly lit room, her first time stay home.... Do you gently watch over little Anna? Or....

name: Noesis II
summary: In order to pay off the loan, the protagonist and childhood sweetheart work together to clean up the lonely death. After meeting the girl who claims to be the incarnation of the firefly, the protagonist quietly changes.

name: No Fear
summary: No Fear is a top-down arena shooter in which the player has to fight against hordes of various monsters. Challenge them using various weapons. You must survive!

name: Nokia World
summary: Talk to some characters before the battery dies and the phone turns off for good. you can take as long as you like.

name: Nothing to be done
summary: In this adventure game you explore a sombre world of two people who no longer believe that future holds any change. Spend some time with them to discover if their fears are also yours.

name: Norega
summary: Norega is a game where you play as Kurt, a Knight in training, and your task is to feed up Kurt's stats so that he can improve in Strength and be able to defeat the tougher monsters found on the outskirts of Norega.

name: Northgard: Sváfnir, Clan of the Snake
summary: After taking control of her father's clan, Signy, now head of the Clan of the Snake, leads her people to the mysterious land of Northgard, ready to prove to the world what her clan is capable of!

name: Northgard: Himminbrjotir, Clan of the Ox
summary: Led by Torfin, an ancient leader who returned to help his progeny, it is known for its tremendous might and unrelenting devotion to its ancestors. While they may not be the fastest starters, once they've gained some momentum, they can crush anyone and anything in their way.

name: Northgard: Lyngbakr, Clan of the Kraken
summary: The Clan of the Kraken knows first hand how dangerous the sea can be. They worship the gigantic creature, fearing it's brutal might, honoring it's instinctual knowledge, and using its powers when he deigns bestow them.

name: Northgard: Svardilfari, Clan of the Horse
summary: Led by Brok and Eitria, two spirited siblings, the Clan of the Horse are a quiet and sturdy people. They are also recognized by all as the best craftsmen and women of the known world.

name: Northgard: Brundr & Kaelinn, Clan of the Lynx
summary: Led by Mielikki, the Beastmaster, the Clan of the Lynx have an exceptional connection with nature. Proud Hunters, their excellent archery skills and unique luring technique are more than enough to ensure the ongoing prosperity of their people.

name: Northgard: Nidhogg, Clan of the Dragon
summary: The most alien of all clans, the Dragons follow ancient customs and embrace freakish traditions. They use sacrifice and slavery to further their goals, often earning the other clan's distrust.

name: Non: The First Warp
summary: A genre-first time-manipulation, high-resolution (up to 8K), unconventional 2D point & click adventure.

name: Not Tonight: One Love
summary: King's Head Dave is done with all this Brexit malarkey, and has decided to pack up and move to France, in the hope of finding true love.

name: No Turning Back: The Pixel Art Action-Adventure Roguelike - Potions Starter Pack
summary: Every time you start a new game you will have access to a selection of 3 randomly generated potions to pick.

name: Nonestory P1
summary: Nonestory is an RPG game that tells the entertaining story of one man who decided to prove his case to everyone to the world.

name: Nopperabou
summary: It is a search-type horror game set in a mansion where curses live."Nopperabo" who became a curse after the tragic event You reached the end,Can you enshrine the curse?

name: No Light
summary: The objective of this game is to scare you, you will not wait, you will run ... A Guard against five demons.

name: No Sushi, No Life
summary: You’ve arrived at a robot sushi bar with one goal in mind… To eat all the sushi you can. Grab all the sushi coming your way and stuff them in your mouth! Test your reflexes as more and more plates of sushi rush toward you!

name: Not Our Home 2
summary: Discover the truths on what is causing the deaths of many innocent people. Experience a fully driven story in different atmospheric environments and chapters with different characters to interact with, along with many different player choices.

name: Nohra
summary: A fast paced precision platform game where you play as Lupu, a monster looking to make their way out of the abandoned lab and onto the surface!

name: Not Your Eyes
summary: Your eyes cannot be trusted. A girl finds herself questioned by a twisted psychiatrist, helping a fallen angel, and followed by a bizarre stalker, descending to a beautiful, terrible world where nothing is as it seems.

name: Nonsense Soccer
summary: ⚽ Nonsense Soccer ⚽ is a platformer-soccer-hybrid for people who like chaotic local multiplayer games

name: Nocko
summary: Nocko is a short minimal, logical thinking game.

name: Nova Odessa
summary: Nova Odessa is an action/adventure game where you play as a novice demon hunter to kill demons and buy stuff for your house.

name: No More Home
summary: Tactical cooperation FPS, you are part of an elite commando force, came to free the city from the "Salvagers" claw. Terrible extra-terrestrial machines that are here to exploit the earth's resources. Are you gonna just run into the fight? Or play stealth and safe?

name: Nobody's Quest
summary: A cozy sandbox RPG adventure in a mini pixelated open world. Explore the realm of Hubbington, collect crafting materials and resources, save the citizens of Hubb Burg so they can help you in return, defeat Evil spawns and face your ultimate foe!

name: Noise Hunters
summary: Noise Hunters is an action stealth video game where noise is your tool, but also your enemy. Don't let them hear you, HUNT or be HUNTED.

name: No Cure 2
summary: The zombies are hiding in plain sight and your job is still to find and kill them.

name: Noren
summary: Noren is a simple key finder game. The map of the game consists of several different regions and some of these regions have special game mechanics except for finding keys

name: Now It's My Turn
summary: In this classic turn RPG game. You will seek revenge for those that destroyed your homeland.

name: No Break
summary:
What if you lose the brakes from your car, how will you stop it?

How to stop it in the appropriate position without any damage or to say the least damage?

In the No Brake game, you will simulate your assumptions and prove that you can stop the car without brakes and without any damage

can you do it

name: Not Another Princess Game
summary: A princess locked in a tower. Some heroes who come to rescue her. Will they succeed? You've seen this approach hundreds of times, but remember, this is Not Another Princess Game.

name: Northgard: Ratatoskr, Clan of the Squirrel
summary: Led by Andhrímnir, the Clan of the Squirrel knows better than most how to enjoy the present moment but not at the expense of being farsighted and expert at managing resources.

name: Northend Tower Defense
summary: Live real time battle, micromanagement and survive the battle with your army of your chosen, Live with mayhem and explosions.

name: Nova Genetics
summary: Nova Genetics is open-world sci-fi zombie survival game. With focus on survivability/exploration and quick decision making. Should you try to run and live to fight another day or build outposts and fight against threat hordes.

name: Not An Angels: Erotic Puzzle
summary: Not an Angels is a puzzle game with a beautiful graphics, relaxing music and erotic content.

name: No-Zero
summary: The last fortress is victory and death.

name: Nonogram: Master's Legacy - The Greatest Pack
summary: The Greatest Pack is a DLC for Nonogram: Master's Legacy and includes 125+ hand-made colored Nonogram levels.

name: Nothing!: Impossible puzzle
summary: Impossible pussle add-on.

name: Nothing!
summary: What do you play? I play nothing!

name: NovelAI
summary: NovelAI is a monthly subscription service for AI-assisted authorship, storytelling, virtual companionship, or simply a GPT-powered sandbox for your imagination. Painlessly construct unique stories, thrilling tales, seductive romances, or just fool around. Anything goes!

name: Nominal
summary: Take command of a highly detailed, alternate-history, 1960's spacecraft facing a series of fatal failures. Your friends, Mission Control, have the ship manual. You must work together to bring the ship back to a NOMINAL state before the mission, and possibly your life, is lost!

name: Nomad Revisited
summary: In 1985 N.O.M.A.D. pushed the boundaries of what the 8-bit computers of the day could achieve with both their graphics and their gameplay. A fast-paced, all-out action shoot ’em up, this retro classic still retains a fan base to this day.

name: No!Ah!'s Ark
summary: No!Ah!'s Ark is an advanced Whac-A-Mole game. The Big flood came and the world was destroyed. You're the chosen one, Noah. You have to save the animals and the girl you love.

name: No More Inputs
summary: NoMoreInputs is a puzzle game. You have to try to create a control with the "Inputkeybocks" and at the same time design the level in such a way that it is possible.

name: Not Their Will
summary: Not Their Will is a 3D Top-down shooter in which you are an alien that uses the weapons of the enemies against them.

name: Noyah: Corrupted Memories
summary: Noyah: Corrupted Memories is a roguelike deckbuilder, in pixel art, with random battle generation, day and night cycle, climate events, advanced rune system, that allows you to create endless possibilities with a single card.

name: Northern Journey
summary: A norwegian happysad game set in a northern land! Adventure through a beautiful and very varied wildereness. Dive, fly, use ziplines and find different weapons to aid your journey to reach the cold mountains and below. Encounter over 50 unique bosses and enemy types!

name: Not In My Crapper
summary:
That's it! Bad enough his family won't leave him to use the John in peace, now alien turdzonians from Toiletron have invaded his loo! This means war!

Not In My Crapper is a game that looks to be inspired by Space Invaders. You, as the protagonist Dan, fire turds at advancing aliens to destroy them. Collect steaks to upgrade in the Refrigerator shop. Get upgraded attackes like the "Dingleberry Assault" and "Shart Attack". Upgrade Dan's shuffle speed, turd speed, and turd power. Defeat these invaders and restore Dan's right to be the king on his throne.

name: No Straight Roads: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Collector's Box,
Game: No Straight Roads,
Premium Artbook (64-page),
Exclusive NSR Drumstick Set,
Double-sided, 12" LP featuring music from the game’s official soundtrack

name: NostAlgic
summary: nostAlgic is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. It is known for its very light color scheme and for having a generally more optimistic take on a Yume Nikki-based exploration game, with A's dreams being rather light and childlike.

name: N'Oubliez Jamais
summary:
N'Oubliez Jamais is a Yume Nikki fangame, known for its unique, realistic approach to the dream system. As opposed to having a single, interconnected dream world, the player is randomly placed in a linear set of locations, the end of the dream depending on the choices of the player.

The game stars Al Ree, who, unlike many protagonists, lives in a three-room apartment with his parents and cat, and is able to exit his home.

name: No Honor
summary: A pixel art style shooting adventure with challenging levels and bosses.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition Online: Kakusei no Shou
Nobunaga's Ambition Online: Kakusei no Shou - Treasure Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Nobunaga's Ambition Online: Kakusei no Shou
- Start Up Guide
- Soundtrack CD
- Special DLC

name: No Longer Home: Farewell Edition
summary: The Farewell Edition includes No Longer Home, and its available soundtracks Immerse yourself in the lives of Bo and Ao and learn about their dreams, frustrations and fears. Welcome the magic of the everyday and somewhat extraordinary.

name: No One Lives in Heaven: Digital Deluxe Edition
Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 6: Battle of Itsukushima
summary: An additional playable scenario, "The Battle of Itsukushima". This scenario centers around the great strategist Motonari Mori, and the time he made his move. This is the story of men who dreamed of conquest, and risked their lives.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 4: Fateful Clash
summary: An additional playable scenario, "Fateful Clash". After the Incident at Honnoji, chaos reigns once more, and heroes from across the land vie for power.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 9: Shingen's Final Step
summary: An additional playable scenario, "Shingen's Final Step". The time has finally arrived for the Takeda Army, reputedly the strongest in the land, to march upon the capital. Shingen's illness has healed, and he is no longer uncertain of what he desires.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 7: Battle of Tetorigawa
summary: An additional playable scenario, "Battle of Tetorigawa". Nobunaga Oda, in an attempt to seize control of the land, comes face to face with the honorable Kenshin Uesugi. This is the story of men who followed their ambitions to the bitter end.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 2: God of War Descends
summary: An additional playable scenario, "The God of War Descends". The soon to be War God, Kenshin Uesugi, was born Kagetora Nagao, and he starts his career now. Enjoy this historical drama of the first days of a young hero.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 3: Dawn of Revolution
summary: An additional playable scenario, "Dawn of Revolution". This scenario centers around Nobunaga's grand plan to unite the land, and the historical drama that it ignited.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 5: Battle of Nagashino
summary: An additional playable scenario, "Battle of Nagashino". Following Shingen's death, Nobunaga senses an opportunity to strike at the Takeda clan. In this age of uncertainty, heroes are made and legends are born.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 1: Stronger Than a Alliance
summary: An additional playable scenario, "Stronger Than a Alliance". Having spent a part of their troubled youths together, Ieyasu Tokugawa and Nobunaga Oda become trusted allies and create a grand drama that claimed a place in the history of conquerors.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Scenario 8: The One-eyed Dragon
summary: An additional playable scenario, "The One-eyed Dragon". This scenario centers around the bold and ambitious One-Eyed Dragon, Masamune Date, and his heroic gamble to seize control of the land. This is a story of passion and unbridled ambition.

name: Nonvilia
summary: This game is in Japanese only.

name: Noisz Re:Verse
summary: Noisz Re:Verse is a new evolution and expansion for Noisz, featuring 12 challenging all-new stages, style customization for deeper scoring mechanics, and the epic conclusion to Noisz's storyline.

name: Noun Town Language Learning
summary: Noun Town Language Learning is the new way to learn a foreign language! Interact, listen, read, and speak your chosen language in a world that regains color as you learn. Test your skills with mini-games & talk to the local villagers. Learn Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, and more…

name: No More Rainbows
summary:
No More Rainbows brings the fun of a classic platformer to VR. Use the intuitive locomotion mechanics to run, jump, and climb using only your hands.

As the Beast, rampage through colorful worlds to reclaim your desecrated Underworld. Extend your experience with 3v3 multiplayer game mode to become the world’s most respected beast!

name: Not Tonight 2
summary: Immigration Enforcement Case #112: You are under arrest. Unless your friends can cross a broken America, retrieve your identifying documents and stay out of trouble... this is the end of the American dream for you.

name: Noctem
summary: Noctem is a first-person psychological horror game with an element of some real life experiences. Dive in an immersive experience, with atmospheric, realistic environments and unravel the horrifying long-covered secrets and the mystery that spreads all over the Alaska Triangle.

name: Nofrills Solitaire
summary: A fresh take on Solitaire Klondike with no distractions.

name: No Going Back
summary: A story about Her and Him. Where you control both, to aid one another, through small puzzles.

name: Nova Odessa: The Strange Tower
summary: Nova Odessa: The Strange Tower is an action/adventure roguelike where you play as a demon hunter lost in a haunted tower. Explore the tower and find new weapons and items to fight demons.

name: Non-Linear Text Quests: The Barbarian and the Subterranean Caves
summary: The Barbarian and the Subterranean Caves is an adventure visual novel about the heroic feats of the intrepid warrior Ragnar. Delve into the mysteries of the caves and discover what lies in waiting below. You will investigate sprawling, far-reaching webs of intrigues and unmask the cunning evildoer.

name: Non-Linear Text Quests: Return of Red Riding Hood Enhanced Edition
summary: This visual novel is a collection of alternative realities. Visit wolf's den and solve his secret, or try to tame the wild beast. Eat a pasty with mushrooms and experience something new. Find out the real reason why Wolf attacked Red Riding Hood's Grandmother.

name: Nowhere
summary: Nowhere is a horror action game for mobile phones. The game takes place in two worlds where players control Lucas and John. Lucas has lost his wife Emily and is slowly getting his life together with Catherine, while John goes out to find his wife Emily while battling monsters.

name: No Fair Play
summary:
No Fair Play is a multiplayer soccer anti-game based on physics with parkour gameplay.

An anti-game :
No Fair Play is a "Free Fight Football" game where you can beat your opponents using a nonstandard way. A member of the opposing team has a good dribbling skills ? Aim for the legs !
Punch, push, tackle, grab ... it's up to you to choose how you get the upper hand on your opponent.

Based on physics :
Ragdolls, ball control, player interactions … physics gives players more opportunities to have fun with unexpected situations.

name: Not Another Dungeon?!
summary: The demonic Tower of Imalsrith has appeared on the battlefield of the Kingdom of Infantriell and the Empire of Fractile. Conquer it in this action-packed card game with rogue-lite elements!

name: Norr part II: Will Walker
summary: Shot, run and slow time or you'll die!

name: Noble's Life: Kingdom Reborn
summary: Mix of realistic medieval noble simulator with a strategy game of historical depth. Manage your city and villages and make decisions in non-linear events. Command defenses in epic sieges and organize dangerous raids.

name: Noah's Heart
summary: Immerse yourself in intense battles with enemies from evil factions. Explore uniquely designed dungeons. Choose and build weapons and skills that best suit your style of play. Noah’s Heart is a next-generation MMORPG. Explore the planet Noah and uncover its secrets with your friends! Adventure and fortune await you, explorers!

name: Not My President: Level 1
summary: This is a 3D-action-shooter. You were sent to a foreign planet to free the kidnapped Earth people. Find all the rocket parts. Assemble the rocket. Free all captives and put them in the rocket. Start the countdown and try not to die during this time.

name: Nocked!
summary: Nocked! is a lushly-illustrated, text-driven role-playing game playable for minutes or hours at a time. Define the deeds and identity of Robin Hood, outlaw of Sherwood Forest; recruit allies, forge alliances, find love; and chart a path between war, negotiation, and dangerous magics. Your choices are remembered and your actions shape the world, but you can’t do it alone.

name: Nomad
summary: Shoot your way through the sands and catch as many chickens as you can. Why? Because you get to keep any gold you find for yourself! A skill-based perma-death shooter with challenging AI rather than floods of kamikaze sprites. How many chickens can you catch before your inevitable demise?

name: No More Heroes 1 & 2
summary: Burn rubber through the coastal city of Santa Destroy on Travis' motorbike, the Schpeltiger! Unlock a devastating arsenal of pro wrestling moves from Power Bombs to Brain Busters. Unleash the powerful Dark Side to mow down the competition and show em who's boss! Dual wield beam katanas as Travis Touchdown to dial the hack and slash insanity up to 11! Jump through combat as the agile Shinobu or leave foes in the dust as Travis’ brother, Henry. Experience a blast from the past by playing 8 bit minigames to earn money and power up!

name: Nobody Said It Was Easy
summary: Run. Jump. Hit walls to turn around. Sounds simple, right? Just remember: nobody said it was easy.

name: Not Pinball
summary: It's like an one hand pinball game but in an infinite random-generated trail. Tap your pinball to bounce it up. Make it hit stuff and get score. It sounds simple but it IS NOT.

name: Nono Pixie
summary:
A collection of 100 Nonograms (Picross puzzles) originally created for the RGCD 2019 16kb C64 cartridge game jam with additional content (manual, etc.)
The puzzles can be played in any order and can be filtered by theme or played in random order.

name: Nosos
summary: Nosos is a cooperative horror game from 1 to 4 players. Find all the demonic objects and complete a ritual without getting caught by the monster in the house.

name: Not It: Spookiest Edition
summary: A horror-filled visual novel full of suspense and mystery where you navigate Katie through a living nightmare. Her move-in day on Halloween throws her into a centuries-old curse. Can she make it through the night? Will her new neighbors perish? Decide their fate.

name: North Shore
summary: Quick turn-based strategy game! WW2-Themed.

name: No Prey, No Pay
summary: Frenetic fights for loot between a crew of greedy pirates!

name: #Notifications
summary: Just one message can make your life hell.

name: No More Snow
summary: Battle your way through Christmas monsters in this laid-back co-op shooter. Equip a variety of firearms and melee weapons, face hordes of enemies and bosses in each level, and take down the evil Krampus.

name: No Water in Hell
summary: In No Water in Hell, you play as a firefighter through the forces of hell with nothing but a firehose as you spray down demons on your trek throughout the underworld. You'll face monsters of all shapes, sizes, and varieties, each with their own powers and abilities which may make your time in Hell, well....Hell. No Water in Hell is a 2D roguelite which is designed in the same vein of games such as The Legend of Zelda, Enter the Gungeon, and Crypt of the Necrodancer which features top-down gameplay and 4-directional movement.

name: No Words to Speak With
summary: "Word: 'Rock', Meaning: 'A Rock is red. A Rock is smelly. A Rock is dangerous.' Give Back Note."

name: No Stars, Only Constellations
summary: This is just a short narrative game about looking up at the sky and thinking about it, while that cute guy next to you just won't shut the fuck up about space.

name: Not seafoam
summary: a little mermaid bedtime story

name: Noble
summary: Manage the family tree of a Noble House!

name: Noboru
summary: super smooth, fast-paced, vertical platformer

name: Normal Human Face Simulator
summary: Local 2-player face-biting simulation

name: Nocturnal Visit
summary: Nocturnal Visit is a short horror experience. One late night, you decide to explore this unknown abandoned house hidden in the woods to make an article for your blog. Several rumors say the house is haunted. Your objective/job is to investigate the house to find clues to whether the rumors are real or not.

name: No Sidewalks in the Mushroom Kingdom
summary: Take this lap on foot

name: Not a Creature Was Stirring...
summary: (except Squeaky Whiskerson and his Marvelous Musical Mice!)

name: Normal Diner
summary: Serve up sandwiches...and more?

name: Not of This World
summary: A lone being that resembles a human that feeds on people.

name: Notice Period
summary: The one thing that stands between you and your freedom...The Notice Period!

name: Nod If You Can Hear Me
summary: Visit Your Grandmother

name: No way back
summary: Solve puzzles in this top-down / plat-former / anti-gravity mind bender!

name: No More Future
summary: Live forever, at a price...In the last days of their life, a dying person takes one final gamble... No More Future is a linear Sci-Fi Visual Novel, where you explore a futuristic world as an android trying to rebuild their old life. In this strange journey, they'll question the very foundations of their life and their world.

name: No Straight Roads: Encore Edition
summary:
Start a rock band & end the EDM empire in NO STRAIGHT ROADS, a rockin' action-adventure from the minds of Wan Hazmer (Final Fantasy XV) and Daim Dziauddin (Street Fighter V).

Explore Vinyl City & fight musical megastars on your journey to defeat oppressive EDM empire ‘NSR’, in an action-packed adventure that mashes together rhythm-infused third-person combat with a kick-ass soundtrack!

No Straight Roads: Encore Edition is an enhanced version of the original music action-adventure that features the rock-tastic base game and festive-focused ‘Christmas Edition’ update, plus brand new content, including an expanded collection of tracks, a new opening cinematic, quality of life improvements and over 500 pieces of fan art available to view and collect throughout Vinyl City.

name: Noara: The Conspiracy
summary: Noara: The Conspiracy is a 3D strategy game based on the universe of Noara. At the head of an army where each unit has its own set of skills, the aim of the game is to destroy the opponent's stronghold in order to win the battle. It revisits the turn-based strategy game by combining it with the dynamism of real-time games and the reflection of chess games. From a brand new genre, Noara is a Multiplayer Online Chess Arena (MOCA) with a unique gameplay.

name: Nothing to Say
summary: A tongue-tied dating sim!

name: Nod: A Meditation on the Existential Pain of Becoming
summary: "Salvation is a long road that leads through many gates."

name: No Fuel Odyssey
summary: Get home in the ship with no fuel under the help of lovely planets.

name: Norman's Sky
summary: Explore the universe in 64x64 pixels

name: Nonessential
summary: Nonessential is an off-beat comedic drama about mental health and life during a pandemic.

name: NotZilla Ice Cream Vendor
summary: The accurate story about a giant lizard-monster who starts to work in the ice cream business

name: Not Enough Souls
summary: Steal the villagers souls and fight the onslaught of invading monsters.

name: Nosfereatyou
summary: Mind you energy in this fast paced action-tactic local multiplayer game!

name: Nobody's Home
summary: Catch Huntermann, World's Best Detective, in the Shortest Graphic Adventure Game Ever!

name: Nodomus
summary: Void probe live feed

name: Not So Instant Messaging
summary: Staying in touch with your ladyfriend can be a struggle, especially in 1925.

name: Not Quite Right
summary: Comedy visual novel about a support specialist.

name: No Crying in Baseball
summary: Don't disappoint your dad!

name: No Emotions
summary: You play as a little vulnerable thing. There are evil people trying to hurt you...

name: No Fly Zone
summary: 2D arcade style top down shoot-em-up.

name: Nott Longa
summary: A folk horror graphic adventure about nostalgia, lost futures & decay, designed as an interactive nighttime story to enhance your dreams. Collect hidden objects, help strange inhabitants, solve arcane riddles: find your way home through a ruinous reality haunted by glitches and folkloric creatures.

name: Nords and Fjords
summary: Fjord conquering roguelite escapade

name: Nodevious
summary: 2.5D Rail shooter with FTL-esque power management

name: Noman's Dungeon
summary: Noman's Dungeon, is a simple, turn-based, rogue-like video game. The goal is to travel to the last floor, retrieve the elusive trophy, and return to the surface.

name: N.O.R.E.D: The War on Christmas
summary: Party like it's 1979 and you're alone in a bunker. Save Christmas!

name: Nonocular
summary: Deliver a message by navigating a noisy festival through sound alone

name: Not You Mary Lu
summary: Jumping twice make things really hard for Mary Lu, the chicken!

name: Notes on Crying
summary: A tiny, little game about crying and sadness. But don't worry. You'll be alright in the end.

name: Nothing Special
summary: A short disturbing game about about being held captive by a mysterious girl.

name: Nodrog's Fortress
summary: Nodrog's Fortress is a Tactics-like Turn-Based All at Once Battler that features elements of Chess and American Football in a JRPG inspired package. Choose your Archmage, companions to fight for them, and try your hand in the 9 Story Missions, Local Pass and Play, PVP Online or in Survival mode, where there is no true Victory...

name: Notebook Detective
summary: Explore a slice of the prohibition era of the United States while solving a murder case. Armed with a Notebook containing the power to unlock narrators you will use different perspectives to help deduct the truth.

name: NonZero
summary: True Horror is the Unknown!

name: Now You've Made Me Crabby
summary: Does running from your problems count as exercise?

name: Northbury Grove: Walls Closing In
summary: At the tattered ends of trauma...can you survive the Butcher of Northbury Grove one last time?

name: No Transmission
summary: Run! Kill! Dance! Repeat!

name: Noodle Escape
summary: Noodle wants to go outside!

name: November
summary: A short escape room experience

name: NokNok Invasion!
summary: Nokia3310 Style Wonky Tower Defense

name: Noise Snke
summary: Noise Snke is a classic Snake game that writes its board state directly to your sound card. It is harsh and experimental. Headphones recommended only for the strong of heart.

name: Noble Fates
summary: A 3D Fantasy Kingdom Sim driven by intelligent characters with a rich simulation of opinions and memories. Build, Craft, Farm, Mine, Hunt, Defend, and more! Command from the sky or take control in third person as your story goes where the people, your actions, and their reactions take it.

name: Noah's Ark demake
summary: The water consumes and leaves little to be seen. You are Necro Noah, on a voyage to the highest mountain.

name: Not Alone
summary: A survival game set on a damaged spaceship, made for Pixel Horror Jam

name: Now That's Sport!
summary: everybody wins when you play sports

name: Not Actually A DOS Game
summary: Old DOS look. New roguelike style.

name: Nojong
summary: Tetris, Mahjong mashup

name: Nope
summary: This game is controlled by [NOPE]

name: No Deck? No Dice?
summary: Card simulator with multiple kinds of decks

name: No Crooks on Christmas
summary: No Crooks on Christmas is a tower defense game with a fun holiday theme. Defend your house against a relentless onslaught of crooks and save Christmas!

name: No Excavation Needed
summary: Competition entry for the Ludum Dare 36 Game Jam, made in 48 hours.

name: No Means No
summary: [JAM GAME] A short game about consent.

name: Nod
summary: a minimalist dating sim

name: No More Papers Please
summary: No more papers please is a physics-based game about working over-time in a stressful job. Use the tools in your office to fill out the papers and put them in your scanner. Make sure you get the work done as soon as possible so you can go home to your family!

name: No Internet Connection
summary: A remake of the classic browser game.

name: Noir Detective
summary: 2D stealth game that takes place in 30’s Chicago.

name: Not A Donut
summary: Not A Donut is a small game about making sweets.

name: No Haste
summary: No Haste is a survival horror game. Sneak into a shopping mall to steal, be discreet and smart and don't get caught by the Rist creature! Multiplayer is coming soon!

name: Northbury Grove: Entity
summary: Experience Horror, Live. This small horror experience was created in roughly 1 week. It's a short expose' set within the Scythe Saga Universe one year after the Northbury Grove Massacre. This shows a completely different and unseen side of the story.

name: No Leg Lenny
