summary: Lenny has only one dream, he wants to go on the moon. Problem is, Lenny has no leg... But this will not prevent him from becoming a living legend. And to do so, Lenny needs the help of two things : a rifle, and a skillful player to guide him.

name: Northgard: Dodsvagr, Clan of the Rat
summary: Welcoming in wounded and outcast villagers who have been forced out of their original clans without hesitation or prejudice, it is understandable why the many followers of the Rat dedicate their life, and sometimes their death, to the clan.

name: Nokta
summary: Nokta is an online compatitive FPS game that aims to give players fun and unique experience.

name: Nora's AdventurEscape
summary: After a life-changing accident ends your career as an Olympic ice skating champion, it's time for you, Nora Crawford, to find your new life's purpose! And where better to start looking than your childhood hero's hometown? But a quick visit brings new challenges when you find the town's residents preparing for an annual county competition and well on their way to another loss. Can you help the town win the grand prize, discover more about your hero and yourself, and even find true love? Find out in this Hidden-Object Puzzle game!

name: Nonstop
summary: This is a "This War of Mine" like game with 2D pixel art style. You need to manage your resources and find a way to survive on Planet Carol.

name: Norse
summary: A community driven an adventure MMORPG. We threw aside the traditional MMO and made it for gamers by gamers. In a world of chaos, it's your job as the player to thrive and free the world. The entire game is community based - even the economy is player based.

name: Nonograms 22
summary: A jam packed nonograms game with beautiful pixel art and a slick UI. Over 216 puzzles to solve, achievements and a relaxing audio soundtrack wrapped up in 20+ hours of gameplay!

name: No One's Earth
summary: Explore the abandoned CCTA through various simulations of alien environments, and improve your equipments to beat natural and synthetic challenges, looking for the ingredients that can resolve the Earth dispute, in this 2.5D science fiction adventure.

name: No Tyrant
summary: A FPS shooting hero counter dictator game.

name: Nobodies: After Death
summary: Nobodies: After Death is a puzzling point-and-click adventure in cleaning up dirty work. After your agency takes out a target, you make the evidence disappear without a trace. Find a way to get in, get out, and leave no bodies behind.

name: No Rage Quit Dude
summary: a game where only luck counts, jumping from platform to platform. Just mystery and luck will be essential for this game. Maybe you can finish maybe you can not. I just know the assets but I don't know what will you see and what gonna happen.

name: Northwind
summary: Northwind is a monster-hunting roguelite deckbuilder with a tug-of-war combat twist, card crafting, and a mana management system inspired by Magic: The Gathering.

name: No Momentum
summary: No Momentum is a portal based action-packed game that features a fast-paced style of gameplay with wild open areas mixed in with closed in small areas. Use your portal gun to fight back!

name: Notoris: The Goblin War
summary: Notoris is a fantasy war game featuring a unique combination of classic turn-based mechanics in a non-grid-based system. In it, you can command your soldiers in strategic battles, perform epic feats on battlefield and unravel the mysteries behind the Goblins invasion.

name: No Man's Sky: Nintendo Switch Edition
summary:
Inspired by the adventure and imagination that we love from classic science-fiction, No Man's Sky presents you with a galaxy to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action.

The No Man’s Sky Nintendo Switch Edition includes five years of updates that were previously rolled out for the PlayStation, PC, and Xbox versions of the game.

name: Novalie
summary: Surreal horror themed visual novel, with lots of branching paths, blood, tears and twisted pitch-black humour. You're playing as Ashia, who's forced to marry her slimy uncle, suffering from surreal nightmares at night. Then she meets Novalie. And then things gets really strange.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate
summary:
Noel the Mortal Fate is an adventure title that started serialization as a free game in 2016 and later spawned comics and novels. This version of the game has been remade for a console experience, with updated UI, story, and dialogue.
It follows the story from the prologue through Season 7 of the series where the real battle begins for Noel and her companions. Furthermore, it now supports full HD and so can be enjoyed in TV Mode as the epic story unfolds. This version also features Season 3.5, a bonus season which takes place between the Burrows and Jillian storylines.

name: Nobody: The Turnaround
summary: Nobody – The Turnaround is a realistic survival simulator set in a parallel world that echoes modern society. Manage your time and resources carefully, strive to find a way through difficult times, and overcome the predicament you find yourself in.

name: No Humanity 2: Swing'Em Up
summary: No Humanity 2 is a rogue-lite bullet hell space adventure RPG, a smash'em up with a twist: you're equipped with a rope-like swingable umbilical cord that can grab, throw and retrieve bizarre weapons. As a space intern, your role includes serving coffees, printing paper, and saving the world.

name: Nock
summary: Nock is a new sport that combines soccer and archery in VR. Play with up to 3v3 players in ranked matches or casual custom games.

name: Northern Guilds
summary: Northern Guilds is a fun-first, device-agnostic dungeon crawler blockchain MMORPG inspired by your favourite childhood games. In a modern take on the pixel perfect art style of nostalgic adventure games, players and their friends embark on an epic journey into ragnarok.

name: NoRoY
summary: A dark adventure full of tense moments that will test your skills. Your main goal is to climb to the top while avoiding difficult obstacles and disturbing creatures. NoRoY is very agile, but a single mistake can cause you to lose all your progress.

name: Not Escape Room
summary:
A long time after the 2000s WHEN the Earth is being ruled (invaded) by powerful (rogue) AI. 3 human beings are thrown into a room where there is no escape. (Or there might be some escape, instructions were unclear on that.) They trying to (struggle) adjust to life in a one-roomed house (imprisonment) while they live according to MY RULES. The Mighty AI, Ruler of Prisons, Tormentor of Minds, Inventor of Impossible Puzzles … Come join me at this show where we take joy from others’ sufferings and join (help) me in making their lives harder. Also, please enjoy the show (don’t let them escape).

Follow this visual novel where you play as an AI who is trying to keep 3 humans from escaping a definitely unescapable room and hopefully understand why you are trying to keep them there.

name: Note Brawl
summary:
Go head-to-head in a game like soccer, but filled with colorful monsters!
Note Brawl is a free-to-play fighting soccer game where you play with a diverse roster! Every map and character is completely unique so there will always be something new to find out.

name: No Reloading: Survival Trials
summary: Infinite destruction in infinite combinations! No Reloading: Survival Trials is a third-person rogue-lite style shooter taking inspiration from classics like Max Payne. Slay simulants, earn upgrades, and look cool while doing it!

name: No Anglerfish
summary: You awaken on a desert island with no knowledge of who you are, or how you arrived there. Explore and unlock surrounding islands by playing the mysteriously powerful arcade machines spread throughout the lands.

name: No Lights 2
summary: A nightclub bouncer discovers the true meaning of madness in No Lights 2, Surrounded by demons and evil beings, play a man on the brink of insanity, going through various difficulties and discovering more and more about the place and its past

name: Nova Slash: Unparalleled Power
summary: You've become a being with destructive celestial energy. Are you ready for your vengeance?

name: No More Regrets
summary: A young upper-class boy discovers he is about to die. Since all his life he bullied everyone around him, in order to have God's forgiveness, he decides to go after the people he has wronged and apologize.

name: No 1 Lives
summary: No1Lives, It's Your Turn to Die!

name: Nociception: Voltaic Marketplace
summary: A fantasy bullet hell on a strange, familiar planet. Fight the living and the dead alike as you figure out what's causing all this energy in the air! Play as a troupe of living puppets, curious immortal children, or a demon, and be sure to pick up journal pages on the way!

name: Norco: Special Edition
summary:
The Norco Special Edition includes:

• Norco
• The Norco Original Soundtrack
• The Art of Norco

name: Nocturama
summary: Nocturama Bononia is a container of visual novel, of an urban fantasy genre, set in a nocturnal Bologna. Different stories and characters but with a single common denominator: living the most important night of one's existence.

name: Normal Me and Abnormal Friends
summary: Having zero special skills, with just average academic performance, not standing out, with no friends… such normal me finally has friends… who are… from different tribes!?

name: Nodyssey
summary: A Dungeon Crawler RPG where you stay in your bedroom to defeat the Evil! Explore procedural generated dungeons, gain new abilities, build relationships and solve mysteries to overcome the dream realm! Enjoy your quiet life in town during the day, but prepare to face terrible Nightmares at night...

name: Not Spooky: But Good Enough For Me
summary: In this first-person horror-lite game, investigate your way through different locales such as the theatre, forests, and urban areas. Solve puzzles and unravel the story behind what happened at the community theatre.

name: Noukk
summary:
Noukk is an enchanting platform game that has been created with lots of love and a passion for detail.
The little huntsman Noukk is trying to save the love of his life and the rest of his tribe, who have been attacked by outlaws and taken hostage. He embarks on a dangerous journey to try and save them all. Along the way he passes many dangers and exciting challenges.

name: Nomad Survival
summary: Battle against hordes of enemies, conquer Boss encounters, and explore various character and skill combinations in this time-based auto-attacking Roguelite in your quest to become stronger and defeat the most menacing of creatures that lay in wait at the end of each run.

name: Nonogram Minimal
summary: Enjoy 200 hand-crafted puzzles, share and play user-made levels!

name: No Return
summary: No Return is a first-person psychological horror game set in modern-day China. With a focus on family tragedy, the story unfolds as our protagonist is mysteriously prevented from returning home by an unseen force. Can he navigate a nightmarish maze of hallways and uncover the disturbing truth?

name: No-Snake Hotel
summary: Welcome, to the No-Snake Hotel, the only hotel with a 99.99% no-snake guarantee! Here at the No-Snake Hotel we pride ourselves in our incomprehensible lack of snakes!

name: No More Heroes III: Day 1 Edition
summary: Day 1 Edition contains a 5.3” x 7.3” softcover 70-page art book, a CD featuring select songs from the soundtrack, and a 7” x 4” Santa Destroy commemorative biker license plate, all in a custom box with an original illustration

name: No Prince Needed
summary: No prince needed is an adorable 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a princess which was kidnapped by evil wizard. Use ability to throw boxes and solve unique puzzles. Escape the castle with the power of your intelligence and platforming skills!

name: No Cat Fights Here
summary: Let's avoid catfights on the roof? Draw a path for each cat to follow and keep them from bumping into each other along the way.

name: No Limits Rally
summary:
An exciting arcade rally experience without limits for everyone!
Race around the world in 4 different locations.
Drive through dirt, tarmac or snow. Chalenge yourself against the clock in Time Trial mode and unlock new cars and stages.
Upgrade and customize your car and beat your personal best times.

name: Nob Hero
summary:
Embark on a great journey for a quest searching for the absolute power.
Learn new ways to damage your enemies and improve them further to defeat them!
There is no shame in dying, you can always come back stronger and wiser.
Nob Hero needs your help, do you have the courage to back him up?

name: Normal Club
summary: ‘Normal Club is an investigation adventure in which you build (and play as) a team of three members of the West C. High School Competitive Paranormal Investigation Club as they investigate a big scoop and try to beat their academic rivals.

name: Note 2
summary: Note2 needs to find Ana, daughter of scientist Dr. Anderson, its creator. Ana was taken hostage by the evil robot Note1, the first robot created by Dr. Anderson. Note2 needs to find Ana on one of the 11 planets in the solar system X. Is Ana still alive? Run, be quick, help Ana!

name: No One Survived
summary: This is a multiplayer cooperative open world construction survival sandbox game, where you and your friends must find supplies and build shelters in this world. You have to keep an eye on your character's needs state at all times, a bad state is likely to lead to death.

name: Nora's Dream
summary:
Solve puzzles to help her escape

Nora finds herself in mysterious, but strangely familiar place inhabited by creatures that seem to know her. She has no recollection of how she got there. Can you help her find a way back?

name: Nocturia
summary: You slept over at a friends house. But now you are awake. And it's early. Like really early. Also you need to pee. So get up and find a toilet without waking anyone!

name: Nosher
summary: Nosher serves up the perfect platforming meal. Nosh on a variety of 'enemy treats' to possess their powers and movement, opening up more of the stages to find those hidden secrets you remember from classic '90s platformers.

name: Not Your Mind
summary: An experimental first person adventure/horror/exploration game that takes place in a dream-like world.

name: No Son of Mine
summary: No Son of Mine is a survival horror game focused on combat, stealth, exploration, puzzle solving and uncovering a gruesome mystery. Your job is to find the truth, before he finds you. You will be hunted. You will be terrorized. Can you survive?

name: Not Dream Syndrome
summary: (not) Dream Syndrome is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Shiutsuki and explore her dreams.

name: No Outlet
summary: No Outlet is a Yume Nikki fangame that was created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. You play as Mint, a young lady who uses her bedroom cabinet to wander around in other people's dream worlds collecting "spells" and disturbing private spaces.

name: No Way Up
summary: The only way up... Is down.

name: Nora: The Wannabe Alchemist
summary: Witchcraft school dropout Nora can’t seem to keep her houseplants alive, much less excel at alchemy, but her dream is to become a famous alchemist! In this visual novel-time management hybrid, your greatest enemies are klutziness … and a ticking clock.

name: No-Go
summary: A dark thriller in first-person perspective. We play as Charles Wood, who has the task of espacing a city taken over by a fanatic gang.

name: Notpron
summary:
Notpron is an online puzzle game and internet riddle created in 2004 by German game developer David Münnich. It has been hailed by fans, journalists, and Münnich himself as "the hardest riddle available on the internet".

Regarded as one of the first of the online puzzle game genre, Notpron follows a standard puzzle game layout, where the player is presented with a webpage containing a riddle and must find the answer to the riddle in order to proceed to the next webpage.

name: NoWayBack
summary: No way out is a cartoon style third person shooting game. You need to play the main character of the game, chicken bro, who is forced to move forward because the 'W' of keyboard is pressed by the headset. Defeat the enemy, get speed and overcome different levels with different mechanisms.

name: Nova Odessa: The Demon Trainer
summary: Nova Odessa: The Demon Trainer is a monster raising RPG with real-time combat. You feed and train your demons to make them stronger, and then put them to fight other demons. You can then spend your hard earned money buying better equipment and demons.

name: Nodes
summary: Node production simulator. Purchase nodes to produce resources, so you can advance in the technology tree and build yourself a large production line. This game will satisfy your need for incremental simulators with the large amount of content.

name: Norgame
summary: Help the moon girl defeat the ancient monster that stole the sun. The action in a fabulous adventure puzzle game takes place in the scenery of the polar cities of Norilsk and Dudinka under the mysterious light of the Aurora borealis.

name: Nova: Cloudwalker's Tale
summary: A charming puzzle game about moving clouds, combining and walking on them to gather the lost star shards across the skies.

name: Notice Me, Leena-Senpai!
summary: Oh no! The Demon Lord is attacking! Help Leena-senpai defend her town against a horde of demon lord goons!

name: Norland
summary: Norland is a medieval kingdom sim that generates stories. Manage your noble family and face with class society, crime, slave revolts, religious conflict, economic issues, personal relations, treachery, secret murders, and spectacular battles.

name: Nosy
summary:
Nosy is a boy who lives in a religious orphanage, he has a special talented gift, he can move between two worlds, the real world and hell. A tragic death causes that a powerful demon catches the souls of the boys living there, Nosy's friends, who called him that way because he was a curious and gossip boy.
Go through a gloomy orphanage full of spirits to catch. Look for the yellow bones which will give you clues to get the objects needed to beat the final demon, if you get the wrong objects, you lose the game.
Remember to look at the moon side.

name: No Longer Human
summary: No Longer Human is a high-energy cybergoth action fvck-em-up with expressive, freeform combat that encourages aggressive, stylish play. Set in the near future, brain-computer interfaces have become as commonplace as mobile phones, allowing users to submerge themselves entirely into the metaverse and abandon the physical world altogether. You assume the role of Tsunono, the once world famous vocaloid idol turned cyberdemon, on her destructive path to total world domination.

name: Nora to Oujo to Noraneko Heart 2
Nova Battles
summary:
Competitive ability, awareness and teamwork are just some of the skills needed to succeed at NovaBattles! Through our 3v3 game modes, players are pushed to the limits in mobile gaming, making sure that talent really does pay. At the same time, through cleverly designed mechanics, a two-tiered currency in place. An in-game gold coin can be used to buy a number of collectables, including our super Heroes!

NovaBattles presents to you a free, PVP, multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) suitable for players of all types and ages! No matter if you’re a casual gamer, or a seasoned professional - there’s something for everyone!

name: Nordic Ashes: Survivors of Ragnarok
summary:
Norse themed Roguelike enemy hell, where you’ll have to survive hordes of creatures that come your way. Unlock new weapons and abilities as you battle. Upgrade your character's stats with Constellation Ability Trees and slay your enemies before they surround you, or it may be too late…

Fight all sorts of beasts, from basic creatures to Elite monsters and Epic bosses with their own AI. Don’t be fooled, even minions can be pretty dangerous!

Unlock new weapons and abilities as you battle. Upgrade your characters’ stats with Constellation Ability Trees and slay your enemies before they surround you, or it may be too late…

After Ragnarok, Yggdrasil, the World Tree, lost almost all of its energy to sustain the Nine Realms. Only a few heroes survived the End of the World. In this Technical Demo you’ll play as Axeldör, a Norse berserker, Thyra a fierce hunter, and Hafgrim, a master of the elements. Wield a legendary sword, or maybe conjure ancient fire to slay all the enemies that have reached your realm to conquer its remains.

Design different builds and make each run different by using the Constellation Ability Trees to upgrade your damage, area, cooldown and many more stats during each run.

name: Non-Binary
summary: "Non-Binary" is a video game that mixes text choices and bullet hell to tell the story of two non-binary people's journey of self-discovery. Make your choices. Dodge words. Go through things that hurt without breaking down. If you can.

name: Nowhere House
summary: Nowhere House is the third chapter in the Hidden Town escape game series. You will have to interact between three parallel worlds and seek help from the characters trapped in the house. Only with their help you will be able to escape.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Oretachi no Sengoku
summary:
When Sengoku, number of powerful era.
Invest only in "real-time large-scale battle" of decisive, let's aim to expand its own power!

name: Non Fingo
summary: VR spaceship crew simulator with realistic physics and extensive mod support.

name: NOMBZ: Night of a Million Billion Zombies
Nom Nom Nom
summary: A delicious arcade game of eating and drinking.

name: Noodle Party
summary: A trivia party game with a high range of questions and multiple minigames along the way. Compete against friends or family, with up to 4 players locally! Prove you are the smartest noodle!

name: Noah's Ark
summary: Noah's Ark Deluxe, a really nice puzzle game sold in 2002 for Windows, is available and ready to be played again! Time to play a real-time, falling block puzzle and tile matching puzzle video game title.

name: Not Another Advent Story
summary: In the game, you will control the journey of MC as they try to make their way to church on Christmas Eve. You will run into a series of roadblocks and unexpected changes to your path. As you meet the cast of lonely characters, you will be given chances to make a connection, take action, or simply try to survive the night on your own.

name: N.O.V.A.
summary:
This is the java version of N.OV.A. originally released for IOS.
The game could be considered a demake, now featuring 2d graphics and a new level design.
The game was re-released in Gameloft Classics (2020)

name: None Left
summary:
This is literally just a black and white platformer made by poto.

The Vita version is a homebrew that can be played on hacked Vita systems.

name: Noelle Does Her Best!
summary:
Noelle has lived out in the sticks all her life, but the frequent monster attacks, lack of shops, and general monotony of village life has her itching to move somewhere with a little more excitement. Just as she's bemoaning her lack of funds, the opportunity she's been searching for hits her... literally! Carried on a breeze, a flyer for a house in Milum Town at a price that's almost too good to be true smacks her right in the face. Though initially wary, she enters MACS Real Estate to inquire about the property and leaves a proud homeowner.

Unfortunately, Noelle's joy is short-lived. Just as she's getting settled, two mean-looking debt collectors barge in and demand she pay off her debt. Confused, her attention is directed to her housing contract, where she learns she's been fooled into taking on the debt of the previous owner! As if that isn't bad enough, she's given a paltry 10 days to pay back the monstrous 1,000,000 gold she owes! Will she be able to cobble together enough money in time, or will the life she's always dreamt of slip through her fingers? No matter what happens, one thing's for certain...

Noelle will do her best!

name: NoAmmo
summary: You are a tanker who has run out of shells, your rifle has run out of bullets, you are wounded and powerless, but you must complete the task, so despite the crowds of enemy soldiers, you continue to move forward, transferring your coordinates to the base and praying for a victorious end!

name: North Frontier
summary: North Frontier is an exciting real-time strategy game where you have to explore new lands, build cities in harsh conditions and develop them! Mine for minerals, build factories, institutes and get rewards for completing your plan!

name: No More Fathers
summary: Set off on a high flying, exploration and puzzling adventure game. A journey set high above the clouds, in a mysterious world full of unexplored islands, dark spirits, caves, people with stories to share, and a boy looking for answers to the questions of a fatherless life, led by an ancient wind.

name: No Way Out
summary: No Way Out is a single-player psychological horror. Paranormal activity is on the rise and it’s up to you to get rid of it and get the hell out of the house.

name: Note of Janus
summary: The ordinary mansion where the Marquis of Ethan is living... and a terrible incident happens there. Get to the bottom of the case and uncover the secrets hidden in the mansion!

name: No Body
summary: No Body is a story driven, turn-based-action RPG hybrid (sort of) in the present day. With puzzles. Inspired by UNDERTALE, Silent Hill, and a Night In The Woods, four teens and their robot friend must escape the bizarre and dangerous reality they find themselves trapped in.

name: Notmads
summary: Command a powerful beast as a mage in an open-world action RPG and build your customised fortress on its back. Defend it by learning and casting magic spells and team up with friends to experience this fantasy world together.

name: Noreya: The Gold Project
summary: Venture into a frenetic metroidvania and take part in a fight between divinities where you will have to choose between Corrupting Gold and Purifying Light to achieve your ends.

name: Nona's Game
summary: An online game of challenges, fragile alliances and betrayal for up to 12 players. Escape elimination through diplomacy or deceit! The last remaining player wins.

name: Noblesse Oblige
summary: Spark romance amid secrets in a crumbling mansion! What will you sacrifice for love? Can you trust your own heart?

name: Not Your Mama's Autobattler
summary: Invite your friends, build your team and prepare for battle.

name: Noclipped
summary: Noclipped is a Survival Horror Adventure game located in the Backrooms. Explore infinite levels, collect resources, fight or flee from dangerous beings and survive in the harsh environments of the Backrooms.

name: No Skirt Convenience Shop
summary: In “Convenience Store Without Skirts” story, a 29 years old single guy, Dominic, after traveling around the world, comes back to his hometown. To fulfill his foster mother’s dying wish, he spends all his money to run a convenience store and becomes a shop manager man.

name: Nobunaga’s Ambition: Rebirth - Treasure Box Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Nobunaga’s Ambition: Rebirth
- Kou Shibusawa Secret Strategy Data & Officers Art Book
- Daily Pad Calendar
- Two-disc Original Soundtrack
- Exclusive Scenario DLC

name: Nocti
summary:
Nocti is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam.
Play as the titular Nocti, a young girl on an important quest to collect all of the Orbs of Creation. Guide her through the strange Otherworld, meet new people, crush sandcastles, and learn more about your journey and the world you've found yourself in.

name: Nonozle
summary: A number logic puzzle game. Solve nonograms to form pixel-art images. Features 200 hand-made puzzles.

name: Noa's Project
summary: NOA’s PROJECT is a voxel rogue-lite stylish action game. Secret agent NOA fights against various types of enemies using katana and submachine gun. NOA challenges random generated dungeons to complete her secret missions.

name: Notes From Province
summary: Dive into a deep Open World that rewards exploration. Solve clever puzzles with lateral thinking, and engage in unique, story-driven boss battles. Then take a break. Furnish your home, fish a little, and chill with your eccentric neighbors.

name: Nonogram: Kawaii Cuties
summary: This game, called "Nonogram", is a logic puzzle that correctly fills the squares from the given hints. Solve the puzzles and complete the "cute" picture!

name: No Longer Home: Friary Road
summary: Bo and Ao are the last ones left after a barbecue and find themselves stargazing.

name: Noah's Ark Animal Adventures
summary:
When Noah hears a great flood is coming, he quickly builds an ark and gathers two of every animal on earth.
Hop on board the ark with Noah and the animals for a fun learning adventure!

name: Nomori
summary: Nomori is a mind-bending puzzle game where you need to control time and space to journey through a shattered spirit world. Take shortcuts through portals, rotate your perspective, and control the flow of time to move forward, whichever way that is.

name: Nova Antarctica
summary: Survive Earth's harshest conditions on a devastatingly beautiful journey shaped by the choices you make, the paths you take, and the stories you weave with the mysterious animals of Antarctica.

name: No C1ip
summary: Explore a landscape of disfigured shapes and distorted views.

name: Nosy Little Fly
summary: Nosy Little Fly is a funny 2D side scroller with an unique movement mechanic. Instead of moving sideways as usual, you can add force to your character in any direction. You must manage you inertia in order to finish the levels. It is a challenge to your motor skills, filled with humor.

name: Nobody Saves the World: Frozen Hearth
summary: The first expansion for Nobody Saves the World introduces new challenges, player forms, and abilities.

name: Normal Fantasies.exe
summary: Join Lynette Johnson as she enjoys the AI Girlfriend Add-On, & discovers new things about her romantic desires while escaping a harsh reality.

name: Norroth: Online
summary: A nostalgic tile-, turn- and web-based MMORPG in a vast medieval fantasy open world. Gathering spots, crafting stations and over 20 professions to master. Many different biomes and enemies to discover. Create or join a Guild and have fun in the special World Events that change every holiday.

name: No Place Like
summary: Pour yourself a cup, take your time & enjoy. Choose a cup you'd like to have your coffee in & add in whatever else you like. This is a cozy point & click game, where you can go at your own pace - there is no end goal, make as much coffee as you like! There are also 6 hidden little coffee beans for you to find in the kitchen. Remember, there's no place like home (whatever home might mean for you).

name: Noracam's Slider Challenge
summary: Retro 3D slider action game. Beat the 6 slides full of speed brilliantly. There is also an online ranking

name: Notebook Entries Vol.1
summary: Horror Anthology focusing on different tension methods. One should caress your fears..

name: Nova Squadron
summary: Dive straight into Jupiter's atmosphere and take down vast flying fortresses from within in fast-paced, arcade flight combat. Losing your plane is just a setback - return with an upgraded replacement and take back lost territory in Nova Squadron's roguelite campaign.

name: No: Worse
summary: There are a few cups of tea, bottomless despair, a couple of heartbreaks, and plenty of lies waiting for you in this Visual Novel. And on top of that, you'll find a touching love story between two kind but insanely vulnerable souls.

name: Nope Nope Nurses
summary:
Hospital ≠ hospitality...?!
Yamada is afflicted with a rare condition that makes his life hard, and when he manages to break bones in both his hands too, he ends up on a medical bed with beautiful nurses tending to his every need.
Make no mistake, though—these nurses are vicious and no love sparks fly… Will young Yamada leave the hospital with his sanity intact?

name: Normal Adult Human Person
summary: This was made in a week for Brackeys game jam with the theme "stronger together".

name: Norigin
summary: Norigin is a third person story driven adventure exploration game centred around a son reconnecting with his father through lost memories. Take control of our lost travelling protagonist during his journey of self discovery as you become intertwined in this gripping and emotional origin story.

name: Northern Kingdoms
summary: In this addictive city-builder game, your job is to guide your citizens to create the ultimate buzzing city. Expand your city, keep your citizen feed and plan your way to victory.

name: North of Nowhere
summary: Settle a new land of monsters and mystery, alone or with friends and family in this Real-Time Life Sim!

name: Not Alone: Remake
summary: NOTALONE is a single-player horror simulator in which you play the role of 45-year-old Mortie Jones. You learn that your mother is dead and your father is missing. Your task will be to spend the night in your old family home.

name: Nova Lands: Emilia's Mission
summary: Nova Lands: Emilia's Mission is a prologue chapter of the main game, Nova Lands. Learn your way around the planet you've landed on, build your base, and automate it with your helpful bots!

name: Novi Cube
summary: Casual + Old-School + Roguelike = Novi Cube! Shoot dozens of projectiles at evil geometric shapes to finally satisfy that itch to kill geometric shapes that we all have since we had to calculate weird shapes and forms! Calculating areas of squares is boring! Novi Cube is fun²!

name: Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts
summary: Nowhere: Mysterious Artifacts Survival & Horror Game Set in September 1993, the first episode begins with four friends searching for an artifact. They have no difficulty in realizing that something is wrong here, this is the site of the Root Experiment mentioned in conspiracy theories. There is only one thing left for the rest, to survive and not to be afraid if it is possible...

name: Non-Stop Raiders
summary: In this infinite side-scroll runner play as different raiders, run and jump across areas. Pillage gold from either your enemies or chests across your journey to upgradeabilities or unlock new charecters.

name: Nonno Lorenzo
summary: Farm, cook, explore and level up in Nonno Lorenzo! An exploration driven farming and cooking RPG where you run your own pizzeria. With an old farm at disposal, you must grow ingredients, level up and explore the island to make it the happy community it once was.

name: Noir Storm
summary: Take on the role of a private detective who, intercepted by a MOSSAD spy on the city of Buenos Aires in 1952, is drawn into a dangerous odyssey against exiles from the Third Reich and the inminent threat of a new and unprecedented weapon of mass destruction.

name: NotEel!
summary:
NotEel! is a fishing/fighting game. Whoever touches the hook is out!!
Published on Itch io and free to play in WebBrowser, no download required.

name: Northgard: Hræsvelg, Clan of the Eagle
summary: Carried by the winds, the agile explorers of Hraesvelg do not need to occupy a large territory, for they will readily venture outside to gather resources. Their profound knowledge of the terrain and their ability to exploit it to its fullest allows them to survive in the most desolate of areas.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition Online: Chapter of Heaven
Nobody Saves the World + Frozen Hearth Bundle
summary:
A bundle including the base game and the Frozen Hearth expansion.

Nobody Saves the World is an action role-playing game played from a top-down perspective. The game can be played solo or in a cooperative multiplayer mode. In the game, the player controls a blank-state character named Nobody, who is equipped with a wand.

name: North Tower
summary: 3d tower defense game, with merge and clicker mechanics. Make your army grow and beat hordes of enemies

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 10
summary: This is the tale of a girl who lost everything in her deal with a devil and her quest for revenge. Will she and her friends be able to uncover the dark secret that sleeps within the city of Lhaplus...?

name: Nonogram: Girl's Sweets
summary: This is a puzzle game called NONOGRAM. Please enjoy cute and sweet anime-like illustrations by solving simple puzzles.

name: Noodle Samurai
summary: You are a monkey samurai who has been captured by a gluttonous demon toad. Using your grapple hook you traverse arenas slaying dangerous ingredients with your trusty blade, cooking and serving them to the demon, lest you become the meal yourself.

name: Nova Tales
summary: Nova Tales is a tactical battle game where you summon units from cards to battle your opponent on a turn based battlefield. Use strategic command to thwart you enemies plans!

name: Nox Timore Remake
summary: Official remake of the original Nox Timore, that was released in 2014. A nightmare, that you come back to every night. Mannequins. Darkness. Horror.

name: Noesis
summary: From behind the incidents, there hide the secret of the past.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Rebirth - Digital Deluxe Edition
Novastella Island
summary: This is a slow-paced building game. Accidentally traveled to an island in another universe, you decided to collect resources and make tools to find a way home. But you'll also lead an amazing life, make some friends with the local Lilles, build a home, and reform the island while finding a way back.

name: Noctuary
summary: Two young illuminators, Fancia and Alina, start their adventure in the bright and fascinating Inlixaland... ...in pursuit of becoming trustworthy "Arborangers."

name: No More Heroes III: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Beam katana your way to the top!

No More Heroes III: Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- No More Heroes 3 game
- Bonus in-game item "Cat T-shirt"
- Bonus in-game item "Destroy All XXXXXXS!! T-shirt"
- Bonus in-game item "IAFK T-shirt"
- Bonus in-game item "Tenstion of Tiger T-shirt"
- Bonus in-game item "Insert Coin T-shirt"

name: No Man's Sky: Waypoint
summary: Access the universe of No Man’s Sky from anywhere in update 4.0, Waypoint! Launching for the first time on Nintendo Switch, and overhauling fundamental elements of gameplay including game modes, inventory size and usability, milestones, journey cataloguing and much more!

name: No Man's Sky: Endurance
summary: Dramatically expand your capital ship in update 3.94, Endurance! Introducing deeper and more varied freighter base building, including exterior platforms and catwalks; enhanced nebulae and deep space storms; fleets of organic frigates; and so much more!

name: No Man's Sky: Outlaws
summary: Become an interstellar rebel in Update 3.85, Outlaws! Introducing outlaw systems; the ability to recruit your own squadron of pilots; improved space combat; a stunning Solar Sail Starship, and much more!

name: No Man's Sky: Sentinel
summary: Fight alongside your own personal robotic companions and battle an array of new foes in the Sentinel Update! Introducing a total overhaul of weapon systems; new lore and stories; all-new Sentinel enemies and combat behaviours; the ability to reprogram and adopt your very own friendly AI drone; and much, much more!

name: No Man's Sky: Frontiers
summary: Become Overseer of your very own procedurally generated alien settlement in update 3.6, FRONTIERS. Make choices, guide your citizens, develop new structures and defend your people from the Sentinels. Or, take advantage of a massive overhaul of base building to construct your own dream base.

name: No Man's Sky: Prisms
summary: Update 3.5, Prisms, dramatically refreshes the No Man’s Sky experience with a range of new visual features and technologies. The universe has never looked better, with reflections, new texture effects, more biome detail, improved lighting, new skies, new warp effects, creature fur, and a host more besides.

name: No Man's Sky: Expeditions
summary: Update 3.3, Expeditions, introduces a brand new way to play No Man’s Sky. Start a fresh journey in a brand new game mode, master a unique set of challenges with revitalised mission mechanics, earn exclusive new rewards, visit bustling hub worlds, and much more!

name: No Man's Sky: Companions
summary: Adopt an alien creature and explore the universe side-by-side in the Companions update! Take care of your new friend as they find hidden resources and protect you from hostile aliens, or genetically modify their eggs and breed unique, never-before-seen creations!

name: No Man's Sky: Next Generation
summary:
Update 3.10 brings a graphically enhanced and smoother No Man’s Sky to the next generation of consoles. All enhancements are available to PC players.

Continue your journey in a universe with bigger bases, lusher planets, more players, faster warp speeds and more – free for all existing players.

name: No Man's Sky: Origins
summary:
Update 3.0, Origins, dramatically expands the universe of No Man’s Sky. Explore a stranger, richer and more varied universe, with deeper planetary diversity, dramatic new terrain, a host of new creatures, new weather conditions, colossal buildings, and much more.

Our journey continues.

name: No Man's Sky: Desolation
summary: Scavenge and survive in the haunted wreckage of derelict freighters with the Desolation update. Introducing procedurally-generated freighters, more story content, combat improvements, freighter customisation and more!

name: NoReason's Speedmaps 2
summary: NoReason's Speedmaps 2 is a collection of new speed running maps.

name: No Man's Sky: Exo Mech
summary: Soar and stomp across the landscape with the Exo Mech update. Introducing a fully controllable mechanical walker, new Exocraft technologies, improvements to base building, and much more.

name: No Man's Sky: Living Ship
summary: Explore space from a different perspective with the Living Ship update. Introducing a new class of biological ship, a new story mission, mysterious space encounters, space NPCs and more.

name: No Man's Sky: Synthesis
summary: The Synthesis Update introduces a number of frequently-requested features and improvements to No Man’s Sky Beyond. Alongside these new features are a large number of community-led quality of life improvements, as well as general polish.

name: No Man's Sky: Beyond
summary:
Update 2.0, Beyond, massively expands the multiplayer experience introduced in NEXT, takes immersion to a whole new level with fully-fledged Virtual Reality, overhauls base building, NPCs, technology trees, and much, much more.

Marking the three year anniversary of No Man’s Sky, this is our largest update so far, broadening the experience across the entire game.

Our journey continues.

name: NoReason's Speedmaps 3
summary: Even more speedmaps, slaughter

name: NoReason's Speedmaps
summary: a bunch of shitty, unbalanced speed maps made for nanowadmo

name: Nobetsu Maku Nashi
summary: Nobetsu Maku Nashi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame created by Chiriakuta in WOLF RPG Editor.

name: No Man's Sky: Visions
summary: Discover a more varied, more diverse universe in the Visions update. Introducing new planetary biomes, more colourful worlds, new fauna and flora, archaeology, salvaging, and much more…

name: No Man's Sky: Abyss
summary: Explore the terrors of the deep in The Abyss update. Introducing aquatic environments with over 5 times more variety, varied creature behaviours, improved underwater visuals and much more.

name: No Way Back
summary: Welcome to the battle-royale genre made for ninjas! Participate in the epic thrilling battles, loot the best weapons and objects in the map to become the king of the battle. Play different game modes like Free-4-All or Team Deathmatch to practise your ninka skills with different weapons.

name: No Man's Sky: Next
summary:
Update 1.5, NEXT, introduces a full multiplayer experience, near-unlimited base building, command of freighter armadas, a graphical overhaul and more.

This update marks the two year anniversary of No Man’s Sky, and a lot has changed. Please see Atlas Rises, Pathfinder and Foundation for previous major updates.

This is an important next step on our journey.

name: No Man's Sky: Atlas Rises
summary:
Update 1.3, Atlas Rises, brings a brand new and overhauled central storyline, portals, a new procedural mission system, trade improvements, system economies, joint exploration and more.

This update marks the one year anniversary of No Man’s Sky, and a lot has changed. Please see Pathfinder and Foundation for previous major updates. This is the next step on our journey.

name: No Man's Sky: Pathfinder
summary: The Path Finder update introduces planetary vehicles, base sharing, PS4 Pro support, ship/weapon specialisation, permadeath mode, and much more. It shows the path for the future.

name: No Man's Sky: Foundation
summary: Update 1.1: Today we’re excited to bring you the Foundation Update. It’s the first of many free updates to come, and we’re looking forward to you getting hands on with it. Here’s an outline of the updates – but we encourage you to dive in and discover for yourselves!

name: Nova Urbana
summary:
Invite your friends to join you in an amazing experience through Nova Urbana’s brazilian inspired suburbs. Discover a new way to play in this physics sandbox city.

In Nova Urbana you can choose between the greatest cars of all time, from the classic Beatle to yellow Camaro.
You can be whatever you want: the best pizza delivery person or a 5 star Driver! The biggest collector or a master of the wheel in the challenges of chrome rims!

name: Not Alone
summary: You are a housekeeper, called to do a clean up late at night by one of your most important clients after a big party. Your job should be simple, you already know what to do, but strange things happen...

name: Not Another Needle Game
summary: Not Another Needle Game is a platform fangame based off I Wanna Be the Guy

name: Noslrac
summary: A casual dungeon crawler ARPG with three unique classes with differing playstyles and distinctive skill trees. Choose your conqueror, level up, slay monsters, complete campaigns, obtain better loot, and gather resources to craft the most customizable and powerful items the game has to offer.

name: Nothing Can
summary: A minimalist, difficult puzzle platformer. Help two souls cross the boundaries of their dimensions and rejoin by solving progressively more challenging puzzles. Control both souls or play co-op with a friend.

name: No Men in This House
summary: "No men in this house" is a visual novel set in Thailand. This edge-of-your-seat detective story about mysterious deaths on a touristy island will make you suspect everyone, including yourself!

name: Noroware Cycle
summary: Mayuhara City, Tokyo. The wounds of the mass suicide event of Mayuhara Academy from eight years ago have finally begun to heal. The rumors of the “Mayuhara Curse” are still whispered amongst the students.

name: Nozoku Rush
summary: Subtract tiles down to zero to clear them off the board. Maximize your score with big combos and show your friends who's boss on the leaderboards!

name: Nowhere Manor
summary: House of stolen devil bargains and indolent angelic aristocracy: Nowhere Manor is doomed to disappear. You can leave if you’ve got a soul … but that’s not an option for an artificially created servant such as Liber. Just how far are you willing to go escape?

name: Non-Euclidean
summary: Nothing ever truly resorts to such madness, but when something is brought to exist that fragments the true nature of what we believe to be possible, everything goes out the window and into the mits of madness.

name: Nordland Mahjongg
summary: "Nordland Mahjongg" offers many hours of challenging gaming fun for both beginners and passionate Mahjongg players. Enjoy different, hand-drawn tiles sets that can be coordinated with beautiful backgrounds.

name: Nose
summary: Nose is a souls-Like 3D action RPG.

name: Nobelia
summary: Nobelia is a cross between Zelda and Bomberman in which players must travel the world and solve puzzles to collect seven legendary golden coins.

name: Nothing to Declare
summary: Nothing to Declare is a story-driven VR game with multiple endings where you play as a security agent in the Populistan International Airport. Your job is simple: check passports, frisk people, find contraband, make sure documents are in order and most important, follow the orders of your superior.

name: Nom Nom
summary: A puzzle game for the playdate.

name: No Mans Land
summary: A simple 2 Player pong game for the playdate just with a skin over it.

name: No Random Novels
summary: I woke up in a BL novel? The Story of Taeran's Struggle to Escape Fiction BL Ren'ai Simulation "No Random Novels"

name: Nocturnal Visitors
summary: Investigate morally grey crimes in this fantasy thriller in where magic and science, chaos and order, are two sides of the same coin.

name: N.O.M.A.D.
summary: In this innovative top-down shooter from 1985, pilot the Nemesis Organisation Mobile Attack Droid (N.O.M.A.D.) through the heavily armoured homeworld of galactic supervillain Cyrus T. Gross, solving tricky puzzles, dodging deadly hazards, and shooting fiendish enemies.

name: Nonogram: Kawaii Cuties 2nd
summary: This game, called "Nonogram", is a logic puzzle that correctly fills the squares from the given hints. Solve the bit harder puzzles and complete the "cute" picture!

name: No Limit Drag Racing 2
summary: The OG of drag racing games is back and better than ever! No Limit 2.0 has taken all the things that made the original game great and turned the dial to 11 - more tuning, more customization, better physics, better mechanics, and more content than the original game ever could have had.

name: Nose Bleed
summary: Motion-driven game about nose bleeds.

name: Nonogram: Girl's Sweets II
summary: This is a puzzle game called Nonogram. Please enjoy cute and sweet anime-like illustrations by solving simple puzzles.

name: Nostalgic Nights at Freddy's
summary: NNAF is a classic and nostalgic experience, this fangame takes the original fnaf and puts new ones hoaxes animatronics from that time, like sparky or endo, also this game has new easter eggs and mechanics

name: Not Just a Hat Rack
summary: A fast-paced 2D platformer developed for the Arduboy.

name: No T!me No Space
summary: Capture the dark antimatter particles to unlock secret portals into different dimensions. A 3D FPS responsive ZEN shooter for Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop and PC. Let's play!

name: No Time For Caution
summary: No Time For Caution is a 3d parkour game. Sit back and enjoy the parkours with different difficulty levels. Don't forget! No time for caution.

name: Noche de Reyes
summary:
In Spain, January 5th is the night before Three Kings Day. Children write letters, tidy their rooms and leave milk and cookies next to the door. They're hoping the three wise old men will bring them the toys they asked for. For us, Christmas really ends on January 7th.

My grandfather died around this time, which for some reason felt even more shocking. He owned two toyshops and Christmas was always a busy time for the whole family. It had that additional meaning for us that always made it different. When he passed away, this day acquired yet a new flavour, though it was a bittersweet one.

But my grandfather did so much more. He traveled to so many places I completely lost track of them. He built the house where my family still lives. He didn't just sell toys, he made friends everywhere, started businesses and was always building or fixing something.

This tiny flat-game is about how January 5th has felt over the last few years. I hope that every time we lose somebody important to us they leave knowing how much we loved them.

name: NOX: Chapter 1
summary: NOX: Chapter 1 is a first-person puzzle game, where the player has to make use of gravity changes, gravity shifts and portals to explore the dreams and nightmares of a child. All this, in a world inspired by the work of Escher.

name: Nocturne
summary: Nocturne is a cyberpunk-themed experimental/exploration game. The goal is to simply wander around and enjoy the sights.

name: None
summary: Play as None as they explore their dreams. This is a game made for Dream Diary Jam 4. The concept and mechanics are based on the 2004 indie game Yume Nikki.

name: Not All There
summary:
After working overtime one evening, you go to the underground parking lot to search for your car, you notice it's nowhere to be found. The parking lot is completely empty except for one car driving around in circles. A sinister feeling that something bad is going to happen overwhelms you as you continue to search for your car.
Will you make it out alive or should you have stayed at work?

name: Not Involved
summary:
Not Involved is a dark fantasy/horror visual novel about Doctor who balances between helping others and taking care of himself.

If you want to save someone, you will have to make sacrifices. How far are you willing to go: being beaten, ostracized, having your limbs chopped off?..

You will find that this world doesn't always reward selflessness and kind heart...

name: Nothing_Matters
summary: A short narrative 'point and click' adventure inspired by the real life experience of a struggling solo indie game developer. A story about everything and hence nothing at all. Discover what truly matters to you.

name: Northgard: Cross of Vidar Expansion Pack
summary: Northgard: Cross of Vidar is a Northgard expansion pack bringing a new campaign to the game that takes place in an entirely new civilization: The Southern Kingdoms. It also introduces a new faction unlike any seen before in Northgard, The Kingdom of Neustria.

name: Nous
summary: Go on a journey into your own mind with Nous, a psycho-reactive computer program that learns about you and changes the game world to fit your personality. Fight your demons or embrace your friends. Face your fears or flee in terror. Just who are you, anyway? Nous will tell you.

name: No Questions Asked
summary: A neo-noir point&click thriller about a delivery service for illicit goods.

name: Nomiss
summary: Nomiss was an online Nintendo-published Adobe Shockwave game made to promote the release of Mario Party 2 on the Nintendo 64. It was playable from the official Mario Party 2 website. The game shows what looks to be a flying saucer with 5 circles on top, reminiscent of the style of the Space Land board from Mario Party 2. The circles are colored orange, green, blue, yellow, and pink. These circles also have portraits of Donkey Kong, Luigi, Toad, a Star, and Princess Peach on their respectively-colored circles, and the Nintendo logo in the center.

name: Not Born to be King
summary: Not born to be King is a simulation game where you embody a medieval king and try to lead your kingdom to success. Face a large variety of events, build a strong economy, and make the right decisions to prosper in this ruthless world.

name: No.13 Shelter
summary: 1 3D story text adventure playing game

name: Not Match
summary:
"Not Match" is a fresh original reflex game with deep malice.
One tap to switch blocks and NOT match them!
"Not Match" may break your heart, but you would like to suffer it.
If you start to challenge levels, don't to be scared at the begging.It may be easier in new levels, may be harder too.

name: No More Money
summary: A visual novel in which you play as a 20 year old man forced to move to a new city after his family lost all of their money.

name: Norm of the North's Digit Dodge
summary:
The Lemmings aren't just Norm's indestructible A-team, they’re also math whizzes! So...when Norm can't get any of the answers right, the Lemmings (like all the other animals in Norm’s life) have a whale of a time teasing him. Well, Norm's not having any of that!
Join Norm and the Lemmings for no-holds-barred, mathematical winter warfare! Pick a side and answer math questions correctly to launch snowballs at the enemy. Solve them quickly, though. If you don't, then you’ll be the one who gets pelted with snowballs and put on ice!

name: Norigiri
summary:
Catch the ingredient on the rice ball! Make the best rice ball in the world! Swipe the rice ball horizontally to catch the falling ingredients! Reach 3000 yen to be a good rice ball.
Catching expensive ingredients and hear the sound of joy!

name: No One Dies 2: Hybrid Movement
summary: No One Dies 2: Hybrid Movement is a Real-Time Online, Multiplayer With Global player!

name: NO: Never Outside
summary: A graphical text adventure for the C64 based loosely on the sci-fi series 'V'.

name: Not those monsters again...
summary: Shoot'em up for Playdate

name: No Play No Die
summary: An addicting game that tests your reflexes. More challenging, more anomalous and more addicting.

name: Notakto
summary:
Simple to learn and hard to master, Notakto is a variation on Tic-Tac-Toe where BOTH players make X's and whoever makes three-in-a-row loses.
Difficulty ranges from Easy to Insane. At Insane, the computer uses advanced game theory techniques to play a perfect game, so don't make any mistakes if you want to win!
Unlock all levels and play on up to six boards at the same time!
Choose Rated Play and work toward becoming Notakto World Champion.

name: No Heroes Allowed!
summary:
Experience No Heroes Allowed! originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Become the God of Destruction, summoned to save Badman from an army of heroic forces. Dig a vast network of dungeons and create an ecosystem of hungry monsters to defeat the invading warriors.

name: Nocturnal
summary: After years of traveling, Ardeshir finds his native island covered in a mysterious fog. Carve your way with fire and steel to find out what happened to your people in this action-platformer game. You’re the only one who can discover the secrets that lie beyond the Mist.

name: Nob War: The Elves
summary:
The elves' arrows are poised, the humans' swords are drawn, and the centaurs lead the charge!
Lead your troops to conquer 20 castles. Battle against troops of humans, elves and centaurs!
You will assume control of the elves while the humans and centaurs battle against your enemy.

name: Not For Broadcast: Live & Spooky
summary: Direct the "Live & Spooky" paranormal investigation team around a derelict film studio deep underneath Channel One. Frame the shots, capture the action and help keep viewers on the edge of their seats with some TV magic. After all, these ghost shows are all just a hoax... right?

name: No Love Lost
summary: A luscious planet with a coveted resource. A booming black market that pays generously. Weigh the risks and watch your back in a battle between two raider crews. With Blending elements of PvPvE and competitive questing, No Love Lost takes you on a dangerous adventure at every turn!

name: Not Me!
summary: The eight adventurers will explore the mysterious island, but the ship has been damaged by the storm and cannot return. Little did they know that the werewolves on the island had already killed the two adventurers and blended in with the team, playing hide-and-seek with the other humans.

name: Nofsky Zombies
summary: Fight off waves of zombies with friends or go solo as you explore various maps, characters, and weapons! Here you will find all of your favorite 3D printed assets designed by your favorite creators! From well known designs to unreleased beta projects, Nofsky Zombies has it all!

name: Now You Would Destroy the Earth
summary: A top-down psychological horror adventure. After a letter from a lover thought long-lost, a man takes a job as a research scientist in a city torn apart by a strange disease.

name: Noxia Somnia
summary: Fight nightmarish foes in this action-horror exploration of psychological fears manifested. Understand, overcome, and confront anxiety and survive the twisted toxic reflection of life's challenges.

name: No Fly Drone
summary: Take command and defend Earth against the endless Drone invasion. Develop your defense using a combination of towers, abilities, and elemental upgrades.

name: No Sun To Worship
summary: Sneak into enemy bases, rescue hostages, hack computers and play your own way while you uncover a conspiracy to unearth unspeakable horrors. Stick to the shadows and stop an ancient curse in this mission-based stealth adventure!

name: Noah in a Dream
summary: A short single-player 3rd-person action-adventure game. Play as a boy who finds himself in a dream trying to reach school on time through a fantasy forest.

name: Nothing Can Stop Us Encore
summary: Time is just a memory, after all. A short, ~1 hour long narrative game that spans two lifetimes; seen through the serious, funny, weird, heartbreaking eyes of two friends.

name: Not Involved: Vermillion
summary: Where is the herbalist? Can you solve this mystery without killing your new patients?

name: Now You Are the Persecuted
summary: You spawn in a dungeon that hasn't loaded yet and for some reason the other enemies (apart from you) want to attack you and you have to escape before they reach you (there could be many bugs).

name: Not A Thief Simulator
summary: You are a thief who steals in every house without power. Take everything and throw it in your truck without being noticed by the police and become the thief you always wanted to be.

name: Nood Climbrs
summary:
Bare-it-all in a risqué climb to the top!
In Nood Climbrs you control a noodley-limbed (and scantily clad) climber while they explore a carefully designed climbing wall, streak to new heights, and unlock outrageous new outfits.
Master the simple & unique climbing mechanic which challenges you to gain mastery over gravity and test the limits of your spaghetti-armed body!

name: Not for Broadcast VR
summary: Get closer to the truth than ever in the VR edition of Not For Broadcast. Keep the cameras rolling, censor the swears and immerse yourself in the powerful, alluring and occasionally deadly world of broadcast television news.

name: No Name Village
summary: No Name Village is a top-down adventure game, set in a peaceful village that is at risk of being swallowed by the Black Sea. Follow our boy protagonist as he explores, fight off monsters, and uncovers the situation of the world around him.

name: Non-Stop Space Probe
summary: Take control of the Orblr-1 Space Probe and blast chaotically through the cosmos on your mission to collect precious minerals.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 11
summary:
Your main goal is to gather information as you explore the site of the Triela Tragedy, a nightmarish massacre long past.

This season introduces a crafting system, where you can pick up materials you find around the map and give them to your friends back at camp. They then can make items for you that will give you an edge in combat. It also has scenes where you play as a critical new character, providing deeper immersion into the story.

Do you have the courage to step into the shadows and uncover the truth about the devils of this world?

name: Nothing to Lose
summary: A retro horror and adventure game.

name: Noobs Want to Live
summary: Noobs Want to Live is a fast-paced roguelike featuring several characters and a large pool of skills to choose from (that synergize with one another, too!) Fight, kill, grow. Each run is a new chance to create a steamrolling build!

name: Notes of the Young Lady: In Turbulent Times
Nonotown
summary: Play classic and colored nonograms or picross.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Ascension: Scenario Senranyamazu
summary: An additional scenario for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Ascension" Ieyasu Tokugawa and Hidetada fall in battle at the hand of Yukimura Sanada. A revived Toyotomi clan and other powerful Daimyo throughout the land watch eagerly for their chance to take control of the land.

name: Nonogram.com
summary: Nonogram.com is an addictive picture cross puzzle with a vast collection of griddlers. Challenge your mind with this easy-to-play number puzzle from a top developer, and become a real Nonogram master! Join nonogram puzzle players all around the world, use logic to reveal pixel art pictures, and have fun!

name: Nozoku
summary:
A casual game of logic and numbers. Each puzzle has "easy" and "hard" solutions. Can you earn all the stars?
Play over 40 puzzles at your own pace. Undo, reset, or skip puzzles at any time.
The rules are simple: Combine two tiles to subtract the smaller number from the larger. Keep combining tiles until all the numbered tiles are gone. Use up all the tiles (including blanks) to earn stars.
Give your brain a twist with nozoku!

name: No Man's Sky: Fractal
summary:
The 4.1 update for No Man's Sky brings a number of Quality of Life fixes, and mainly PSV2 support.

This update includes a great number of general VR Fixes but also includes a resizing of the players Ship garage to 12, a new Style of "skimmer" ship and a new Utopia Expedition

name: Not Not 2
summary: Enhance your Brain Skills by solving clever Puzzles based on orientation, logic and colors!

name: NomNomNom!
summary:
This is Pug #1 and he is really hungry! The only way to make him happy is to feed him as fast as you can. Do it properly and as Grandma pug says: “Chomp to nom if you want to be a good bloke, otherwise bad things will happen and you’re going to choke!”.
Fist endless game by the Squarefrog Games gang. Endless and delicious! Beat your own score and save the pug from starvation.

name: None Tank Age
summary:
Can you image a tomato is running to you someday?
Join in on the fun and create the best weapon ever!

name: No Way Out
summary: Escape the monotony of your daily routine and discover a path beyond this seemingly endless cycle. Embrace the thrill of the unknown, as you embark on a journey to break free from the ordinary. Will you be brave enough to take the leap, even if there seems to be No Way Out?

name: Noah Please!
summary: Dash and whack your way through waves of animals that want a piece of that ark. There's only room for two of each!

name: Noughts & Crosses
summary: Naughts & Crosses is puzzle game for the Super Nintendo, that was added in special SNES systems for Airplanes and Hotels.

name: Not Anyone's Business but My Own
summary: Navigate a local princess through the pages of a hand-crafted fairy tale and help her solve the mystery of a golden ring in this narrative-driven point-and-click adventure game with multiple endings.

name: Nono Adventure
summary: Solve picture puzzle to uncover the epic story of Nono and join his adventures! There's so much to discover!

name: Not For Broadcast: Bits of Your Life
summary: Think you know Peter Clement? Show the new enigmatic Prime Minister in a whole new light on the always popular chat show, "Bits Of Your Life"!

name: Nordstrums Treasure
summary: For his 18th birthday, the main characters' "landlady", Melissa decided to treat her "tennant" to a vacation on an exotic island. Little did they know, this vacation would change their lives forever. The game is filled with love, lust, and wonder.

name: Not For Broadcast: The Timeloop
summary: The nation's first live televised science experiment is going to make you really happy.

name: Noroi E: The Origin of Nightmares
summary: You will have to make important decisions that will affect the outcome of the game and the fate of the main character. Will you be able to find a way to stop the curse and save yourself from the darkness, or will you fall victim to the darkness and join the ranks of the dead?

name: Nox: Escape Adventure
summary:
Nox takes you to an old, mysterious mansion filled with secrets waiting to be revealed by you. Accompanied by an exciting story, you explore mysterious rooms and discover their hidden mechanisms. Keep a cool head and do not get fooled - each room hides far more secrets than you can tell at first glance! Whether it's your first escape game or you’re a seasoned adventurer, the varied puzzles will hook you!
STORY: Your puzzle progression is accompanied by an exciting story!

name: No Brakes
summary: There are no brakes in this game! Drive around as your car and avoid the walls and red pillars to try to make it to the end and beyond!

name: No Paint
summary: Press "Paint" if you like what you see or "No" if you don't! Move a finger on the painting to "Nudge" and tap the painting to pause, title, and save.

name: Not the Hero
summary: Not the Hero - Yes, you are not the hero in this story, neither are you the right guy. but you will be doing it anyway!

name: Not for Broadcast: Deluxe Edition
summary: The award-winning Not For Broadcast, now including the DLC Season Pass.

name: Nostalgia
summary: Nostalgia is a 32-level megawad for limit-removing source ports. It was released by Alex Decker (myolden) in August 2022 and combines vanilla-style aesthetics with modern map design philosophies. Most maps are smallish in size, with a focus on easy-to-medium difficulty and fewer than 100 monsters. While level geometry and texturing is intentionally kept simple, the wad contains many instances of environmental storytelling as well as occasional doomcute detailing. Each level in the wad is named after a metal song that came out prior to 2000. The midi soundtrack is assembled from various sources from inside and outside the Doom community, containing no bespoke tracks.

name: Noclip VR
summary: Noclip VR is a co-op multiplayer backrooms game with unique locomotion and gameplay. The game has many unique levels and entities from the backrooms.

name: Novus
summary: Gorilla Tag meets FPS. It's that easy.

name: Not For Broadcast: Season Pass
summary:
Channel One is more than just the news! The Not For Broadcast Season Pass grants to access to all three of the upcoming episodes of Not For Broadcast as they release.

Each episode is a self-contained story, set early into the events of the main game.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 12
summary: This is the tale of a girl who loses everything in her deal with a devil and her quest for revenge. Finally, the popular game has entered its final chapter! In S12, which serves as the prologue to the "Final Battle Arc," the story of Caron and Burrows begins to take a major turn...

name: Not Only Nine
summary: A narrative turn-based RPG where the only fights are the bosses. Play as a cat and journey through the afterlife to save your human. Meet loveable characters and explore what it means to exist.

name: Noctropolis
summary: Night Dive Studios presents Noctropolis, a beautifully rendered, adult graphic adventure about the grisly things you dream. New Enhanced Edition.

name: Nonno's Legend
summary: A game about imagining places you’ve never seen. Nina's grandfather shows her that a globe has some magical properties—you can reshape the planet!

name: No Man's Sky: Interceptor
summary: Venture to forsaken Sentinel worlds in update 4.2, INTERCEPTOR! Explore corrupted planets, fight a legion of challenging new robotic guardians, hijack their technology, steal their ships, harvest their resources, destroy their freighters, and much, much more!

name: No Crime
summary: The story takes place in South East Asia. Start from a drug case, follow private detective Sui Feng to discover a mysterious complexion full of conspiracy, overcome his intermittent amnesia, and avenge for his love…Can you find out the real culprit through fragments of memories?

name: No Friends
summary: No friends is a comedic single player video game that lasts about an hour. Your choices doesn't matter that much like most of the games where they tell you your choices matter.

name: No.Break Brick
summary: Break the bricks and clear your view! This game is a casual game where players break bricks with small balls to penetrate the defense of a beautiful girl and open her heart.

name: Novastride
summary: Soar through and conquer the galaxy in Novastride. Lead your battalions in aerial and ground fights with real-time tactics, or join your comrades in high-action dogfights and ground battles. Dominate your enemies throughout the universe and explore the deep story waiting to be uncovered.

name: Nobody Paradox
summary: Nobody Paradox is a single player, Sci-fi themed FPS set in the dark environment of a spaceship, filled with explosions, shooting, survival and many challenges.

name: No Creeps Were Harmed TD
summary: Employ lethal turrets, traps, and gadgets to defend against an onslaught of evolving creeps! Step into a twisted, hyper 3D, mind bending realm. Upgrade and adapt your defenses. Become a master maze crafter. Collect bizarre artifacts. Rush creeps for lucrative rewards, and succumb to greed!

name: Non Human
summary: A game featured in Action 52. They're not human. They have a mind of their own. They are hungry and they want you as their next meal. Get them before they get you.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening
summary: The Fief system allows you to capture land and give it to your subordinates to manage. Divvy up and parcel out the beautifully detailed Sengoku Japan as you like, and make it prosper

name: Nonograms Katana
summary:
Nonograms Katana: Sharpen your mind!

Nonograms, also known as Hanjie, Griddlers, Picross, Japanese Crosswords, Japanese Puzzles, Pic-a-Pix, "Paint by numbers" and other names, are picture logic puzzles in which cells in a grid must be colored or left blank according to numbers at the side of the grid to reveal a hidden picture. The numbers are a form of discrete tomography that measures how many unbroken lines of filled-in squares there are in any given row or column. For example, a clue of "4 8 3" would mean there are sets of four, eight, and three filled squares, in that order, with at least one blank square between successive groups.
To solve a puzzle, one needs to determine which cells will be boxes and which will be empty. Determining which cells are to be left empty (called spaces) is as important as determining which to fill (called boxes). Later in the solving process, the spaces help determine where a clue (continuing block of boxes and a number in the legend) may spread. Solvers usually use a dot or a cross to mark cells they are certain are spaces.
It is also important never to guess. Only cells that can be determined by logic should be filled. If guessing, a single error can spread over the entire field and completely ruin the solution.

name: North Salvation
summary: A clone of Mr. Driller.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season Final Part 1
summary: This is the tale of a girl who loses everything in her deal with a devil and her quest for revenge. Noel and her team are ready for the final battle and split into two groups to begin their actions. Their long revenge story is finally running to an end!

name: Nonstop Arrow
summary:
It is an archery game that hits a target in a rotating object.
It is a simple but never easy game.
There are a number of levels and you will need a variety of strategies.

name: Nox Archaist: Lord of Storms
summary: An expansion pack for Nox Archaist, containing the original story plus a new scenario and new features. Puzzles and powerful magic items await, along with dangerous traps and monsters. Those foolhardy enough to brave these perils will come face to face with the Lord of Storms! 15+ hours gameplay.

name: Not Meow Purroblem
summary: Iris is tired of studying and working and just wants to be a cat. Her wish comes true. While she's discovering the joy and downsides of her new form, her girlfriend Maggie is bothered by absence of her partner.

name: Nomad Station
summary: Become a master MI6 saboteur, and earn your name as the ministry's most important asset on the Moon in this 1st-person shooter VR sci-fi epic! Follow the orders of your handler, or explore and find new weapons and defenses! Do whatever it takes to complete your mission!

name: Not the North Pole
summary: "Not the North Pole" is a magical VR game where players become Santa in a wintery world, battling festive foes. Enjoy strategic round-based gameplay fighting off snowmen, nutcrackers, and more. Customize your Mecha Santa robot and embark on enchanting adventures for all ages!

name: Notes of my silence
summary: Plunge into the silence with Stephan, young musician that lost his hearing and, at the same time, the meaning of life.

name: Nocturia The Game
summary: From a child's perspective, we will dare to cross in solitude the dark and vast spaces of a house haunted by an entity of ambivalent intentions that we will discover during our mission: to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night.

name: Noitcelfer
summary: You are lost in a world of invisible blocks, but these blocks cast a reflection. Your only hope of escaping is to use the reflection to see where to jump. Try to avoid landing on the spikes or being killed by the enemies!

name: Not In My Cave
summary: Defend Yourself! Not in my cave is the last line of defense to protect your magical spells from unrelenting attacks from the undead and goblin hordes. In this action based tower defense style game protect your spell books from being looted and leaving yourself defenseless!

name: Nosferatu 2: Run from the Sun
summary: The most fun vampire of all time is back! The popular endless runner with over 5 million downloads featuring Nosferatu, the friendly vampire, is moving on to the next round. The Garlians have returned and want to enslave humanity again. Help Nosferatu and his friends against the evil aliens while using numerous pets and mounts. There are plenty of free bonuses for completed missions. Race with your friends in the league and show that you’re the best and fastest vampire.

name: Nowhere, MI
summary: Nowhere, MI is an absurdist first-person metroidvania about a young man named James trying to track down his missing brother, Alex, after he runs away from home to find something in the mysterious town of Nowhere – ground zero for an experimental reactor detonation.

name: Nomad
summary: A serene first-person 3D platformer where you use a magical rope to traverse the body of a dormant ancient colossus in order to heal its wounds and awaken it once again. Embark on a relaxing journey of melancholy to rekindle one of nature's long-lost wonders.

name: Novus Conquest
summary: Enter the realm of The Plate, where the twin gods of Novus pose a challenge: conquer or vanish. Assemble a force of 100+ unique commanders, capture 28 lands, and unlock the secrets buried in a cryptic dungeon.

name: No Ghost in Sky Elevator
summary: It is a strange high-rise elevator. The objects that appear and the people you board are all strange. Depending on your actions, you will face a variety of consequences.

name: NoirNet: The Neon Enigma
summary: Dive into a neon-lit world of mystery with NoirNet – The Neon Enigma! Solve gripping cyberpunk murder cases in this immersive, episodic detective game!

name: No Legs? No Problem!
summary: Be the first to reach the goal in this intense 4 player racing game. Challenge your friends to a free for all or team up in an epic 2v2 race battle. Use your abilities to grief your enemies, or boost yourself to the finish line.

name: Nomad
summary: Weave and slide under waves of projectile hazards in this energetic movement shooter. Dispatch hordes of lost and otherworldly foes as you avenge the planet's demise. Creatively utilize flexible movement mechanics to navigate the environment for fluid movement and displacing enemies.

name: Nonogram Color
