summary: Discover the mystery of Nonogram Color! With its enhanced gameplay, it's easy to follow the game rules and become a Nonogram master. Explore Nonogram Color and discover a fresh take on this classic paper-and-pencil nonogram puzzle.

name: Nothing Bad Ever Happens to Me
summary:
Nothing Bad Ever Happens to me, is a short, 5 ~ 10min. story about a few girls who don't really get along.

Katrina, our heroine, is a popular girl who has had great luck in her life thus far. She's at the top of her class, her family is happy... she probably couldn't ask for a more perfect life!

One day, a few of her classmates suggest they walk home together. Might not be a bad idea to humor the lower-class.

What could go wrong?

name: Norn9: Last Era - Limited Edition
summary:
Fandisc for Norn9.
Limited Edition Includes:
15" x 25" Cloth Poster
Collectible Artbook
Set of 11 vinyl Hiyoko Stickers
3" Acrylic Keychain w/ chibi artwork
All in a collectible box

name: Noitapeli
summary: First person horror game, you have a special watch in your hand which shows the distance to the noita. Find a bottle which noita needs and bring it back. Use gun, collect mushrooms and avoid noita to find the bottle.

name: Noalone
summary: Noa, a lonely young boy, is struggling to cope with his parents' relationship that seems to be falling apart.

name: Normal Shmup
summary: Normal Shmup is a strange shoot em' up game based around classic gameplay. Fight the enemies and regain control of the world again.

name: Nobody's Left
summary: In a post-war apocalyptic city, ordinary men can no longer remain ordinary, adaptation is a survival must to protect your loved ones. take responsibility and lead this change in a game with emotional storytelling. remember! always expect the unexpected when nobody’s left to back you up!

name: Notes of Hearts
summary: In a world of fantasy and magic, you are a rising strategician unraveling the mysterious magical events occurring all over the world. You are free to choose your gender as well as your species, which ranges from Human, Canine, Feline, Avian, Dragon and Fae. You will meet many characters, most of which anthropomorphic in your adventure who you may befriend or seek a deeper connection with. There are multiple romance options not bound by species or gender.

name: NoEvidence: Scary Horror Quest Survival Story
summary: NoEvidence is an intense detective game where you investigate a murder. Navigate a dark environment using only your flashlight. Discover the murder location and prevent the crime. Use detective skills to find clues and important objects like a recorder, tapes, fuses, and a revolver. Solve puzzles and decipher codes to unlock doors and access key areas. With its immersive atmosphere, challenging quests, and gripping storyline, it's a must-play for detective game and thriller fans.

name: Nobody Told Me About ID
summary: Nobody Told Me About id is a love letter from DOOM fans to the iconic trinity of Build Engine games; Duke Nukem 3D, Blood and Shadow Warrior. Whether it be ludicrous gore or explosions, NTMAi tries its best to faithfully replicate all things Build on DOOM while also enhancing the base gameplay. Your arsenal may be tough, but some enemies will have a trick or two up their sleeves...

name: NoEvidence: Scary Horror Quest Survival Story
summary: Ready to solve the case? Play No Evidence, the thrilling detective adventure!

name: Noxious Weeds
summary: Face the corruption that poisons your harvest! Noxious Weeds is an action rogue-lite where you slay hordes of creatures with the help of cute veggies and a combination of your favorite tools. The harvest is power. Choose wisely!

name: No Man's Sky: Singularity
summary: The new No Mans Sky update, Singularity, continues the narrative arc that began in the Interceptor update and will progress throughout this year. In this five-week long expedition, players investigate strange robots that are delivering cryptic clues across the galaxy, following a story tangled in AI corruption. Watch the trailer for a peek at what's coming to the adventure survival game this time around.

name: Noah
summary: You play as Noah, a child who cannot speak, and travel a world that is destroyed. Travel back in time with the little jellyfish robot and find out why the world is dying.

name: Nobody's Dilemma
summary: Uncover the secrets of a war-torn kingdom in "Nobody's Dilemma," a captivating 2D action-adventure. Engage in intense battles, navigate treacherous environments, and immerse yourself in a story of intrigue and revenge. Will you triumph over the challenges that lie ahead?

name: Nova Roma
summary: The glory of Rome is at your fingertips in this city-building game where you must appease the gods, enact laws, and develop complex supply chains to meet the needs of your citizens.

name: Noun Town: VR Language Learning
summary: Supercharge your language learning in virtual reality with Noun Town, a mysterious island with quirky villagers, minigames, and more.

name: Novus Orbis
summary: A combo-based deckbuilding roguelike through a space-time loop: collect cards, receive blessings, add pets to your party, and grow stronger. Chain together cards in the right order for max power, and act before the enemy does. Build synergistic decks, find many secrets, and make BIG numbers!

name: No Stone Unturned
summary: Hunt for clues, interrogate suspects and solve cases! No Stone Unturned is a dark-comedy noir detective game featuring multiple endings and choices that truly matter!

name: NoCanNoTap
summary:
1.Tap to remove Woods as many as possible.
2.Keep thing(wood/stone/sponge) below the Role.
3.Wait green bar to be full and You Win!

name: Nomad
summary: Nomad is a sandbox survival game. Hunt, craft, kill and survive! Find food, drink, weapons, ammo and medical supplies - or craft them! Build a base to protect yourself but also remember to protect the base from raiding players.

name: Now & Then: A Tale of the End
summary:
Now & Then is the story of Jack (or a name of your choosing) Brooks, a widower who lives with his adopted daughter, Carol, during the aftermath of a global pandemic. Throughout the story, players witness the string of events that finds Jack adopting Carol and how they grow into a family unit before the collapse of civilized society. Influenced by Stephen King’s The Stand and numerous zombie movies and books, Now & Then is a tale of survivors learning to cope with life as it comes to them.

While the present is filled with tense moments as the Brooks family struggles with the challenges of the new normal, memories of the past provide a slice-of-life window as Jack tries to learn how to be a new father to a teenage girl.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following:
- Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening
- Digital Officer Artbook
- Digital 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book
- Digital Complete Soundtrack
- Exclusive Scenario "Muskets Arrive"
- 40th Anniversary "Officer Face Graphics and Additional Traits" (six each)

name: November
summary: Otome game in the Story Me app.

name: Nova Dash
summary: Nova Dash is a crazy action puzzle platformer, which throws you into space with the fun loving Gopas, cute little characters from the outer galaxy. Your goal is to rescue them from the exploding sun, avoiding all sorts of obstacles, from forcefields and aliens to frozen planets, meteor attacks, exploding planets and more!

name: Nomifactory
summary: Nomifactory (ファクトリーのみ) is a quest-driven expert pack focused on building large-scale factories, where you will put your automation skills to the test as you progress from punching trees to creative-in-survival, climbing the power tiers of GregTech: Community Edition (GTCE) and its extension, Shadows of Greg. No complicated magic systems, no forced combat or exploration: Only Factories!

name: Nodes Escape
summary: The game presents realistic game graphics through sound effects, narration and imagination. The level design is subtle and challenging, allowing players to challenge their intelligence and logic skills in solving puzzles.

name: Nonorelia
summary: A logic puzzle game and sci-fi visual novel rolled into one. Solve nonograms to overcome obstacles as Noah Von Sterne struggles to save his colony and reunite his family, or unwind and sharpen your mind with our relaxing Picture, Random, and ASMR Modes.

name: No Sleep for the Dead
summary: A Doom 1 episode replacement and the spiritual successor to 1997's Dawn of the Dead. This episode features 9 brand new original and consistently themed levels in classic good ol' Doom style. In addition, you receive one bonus level which runs on E2M1.

name: Nothing Somewhere
summary:
A story about art, what goes into being a human, and not feeling like a part of that. The lines that divide and define what "being" means are no longer existent, but were they ever there to begin with?

A non-binary visual novel talking about what it means to be neither here nor there- in more merits than one.

name: Noonna the Rock
summary: 'Noonna the Rock' is a special visual novel game that deals with the special material of death metal and the romance between the heroine 'Noonna' and the Protagonist.

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 3.5 - Revenger's Vacation
summary: Caron proposes a seven-day vacation for Noel, who is exhausted from the battle. Noel, who is spending his vacation in an unfamiliar place, eventually decides to search for the owner of the "safe house".... Gather information as you explore the slums at your leisure and find the owner.

name: Nok
summary: Get ready to Nok it out of the park with this immersive physics-based sandbox hidden object game! Step into a virtual world where you'll toss your worries aside and dive headfirst into the wild art of furniture flinging.

name: Nova X9
summary: In Nova X9, become a fearless cyborg girl, and fight against hordes of enemies, snowballing your advantage as you smash through thousands of foes. Survive the relentless onslaught and unleash your skills in this roguelite survival game set in a dark and futuristic world.

name: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café
summary: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxed decoration and rhythm game where you manage a cafeteria and befriend cute animals.

name: No Border
summary: No Border is an action-puzzle platformer where you manipulate each level borders to navigate your way through!

name: Nova Strike
summary: Fire up your blaster cannons and take on waves of enemies in this retro shoot'em up with procedural levels. Come back stronger with each attempt and beat the high score!

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season Final Part 2
summary: "Noel the Mortal Fate" is now complete! The time of the decisive battle has finally arrived. Noel and Caron finally confront Burrows, they raise their fists in a final counterattack in the face of the onslaught. What does the girl see at the end of her revenge.

name: Nothorian
summary: Challenge the awakening of ancient evil in Nothorian, where heroes, monsters, and the dreaded Lords of Hell battle under the shadow of legendary dragons and forgotten gods.

name: Non-Fellows
summary: Follow adventures of four not as much friends as they finds their way through zombie city, get acquainted with an ancient vampire and discover what happened to their cute blonde friend after this meeting. Republish of an old point-and-click adventure, with all 3 episodes in a single game.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario: "Battle of Tetorigawa"
summary: The dragon of Echigo makes his move to defeat Nobunaga.

name: NoteBlaster
summary: NoteBlaster is a retro-arcade inspired video game that takes you on a musical journey through space. Using the piano keyboard and drum pad interfaces, you can blast notes to your heart's content as you boost your proficiency with the musical language. Players can use any clef, making it the perfect practice tool for musicians of all types!

name: Nou wo Kitaeru! Zekkei Shashin de Machigai-sagashi
Nope Nope Nope Nope Nurses
summary: The thrilling final installment of Dark One!'s hit visual novel series! Hapless protagonist Yamada is once again at the mercy of the tender depredations of the world's worst staff of nurses... and this time, it's up close and personal with the ruthless Head Nurse who dominates all the rest!

name: Nostril Shot
summary: Face a horde of monsters in a fast and frantic battle. Upgrade your powers by finding different weapons and costumes. The space maiden with the most points at the end of the session wins the round.

name: Notes of the Outskirts
summary:
Close future. Rumors say megacorps are getting mad over a possible treasure. Bandits, mercenaries and opportunistic merchants are showing up, and of course you're too. Whatever it is, you're determined to find it and sell it to whoever will propose the best price. That's where the adventure begins.

Note of the outskirts is a classic party-based role playing game in the vein of titles such as the original Wasteland.

name: November 5th
summary: This level was orginally created to celebrate Hellbent's birthday in 2015.

name: Northgard: Kernev, Clan of the Stoat
summary: Independent and protective, the populations of Kernev occupy autonomous territories, but they will unite in battle under the command of their powerful Lords. Nominoe's knowledge of Viking cultures and diplomatic ways give the Kingdom the adaptability and allies to match any challenge.

name: NodeLord
summary: Build, automate and create - but most of all - survive!

name: No Man's Sky: Echoes
summary: Meet a secret society of robotic aliens in update 4.4, ECHOES! Furthering the narrative introduced in INTERCEPTOR, explore the mysteries of the Autophage, perform their rituals, learn their language, and assemble your own ceremonial staff. In deep space, confront huge outlaw dreadnoughts, sweep through their trenches and destroy vulnerable components in new tactical space combat – and much more!

name: Noble Knight
summary: Noble Knight is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Kill different enemies with your powerful sword and protect the peaceful island! Climb the locations to complete the task and deal with the monsters that stand in your way, and beware of deadly traps.

name: No Brakes io
summary:
Race real players in this relaxed and colorful multiplayer game. Upgrade your shape, face and color to find your perfect ride.
An indie game created by Niclas Aberg, the original developer of No Brakes.

name: Northgard: Kernev, Clan of the Stoat
Nounishpunk
summary: Nounishpunk is an exhilarating, fast-paced third-person comedy action-adventure shooter set in an open world, boasting a captivating fantasy futurism art style.

name: No Logic
summary: No Logic is a puzzle platform game where you have to disable your logic in order to complete this game!

name: Noga
summary: Noga is a single-player shooter/driver, RPG, where an alien invasion of Earth has just begun. As you try to save your friend from the hands of the aliens, you uncover the real reason that brought them to Earth.

name: Nodes of Yesod: 25th Anniversary Edition
summary:
Welcome to the 25th Anniversary Edition of Nodes Of Yesod!
Guide Astro Charlie through various moon caverns, defeating many monsters on your way. Collect 8 Alchiems to complete your quest!!!
In this enhanced version of the classic 8-bit platform game, you will find the complete original game, along with an enhanced version containing new graphics, new gameplay features, new audio, music remixes, and more!

name: Novantica
summary: Explore the open-world, futuristic city of Novantica in this sci-fi adventure game, traveling back in time, crafting devices, gathering clues, and solving puzzles to untangle the plot behind a mysterious event that has damaged critical systems across the city.

name: Noblesse Oblige: Legacy of the Sorcerer Kings
summary: Noblesse Oblige: Legacy of the Sorcerer Kings is a high fantasy RPG that reenvisions turn-based combat in dynamic ways, telling the story of Alexander—an idealistic yet pragmatic nobleman—and his allies as they navigate politics, intrigue, ruling, and love amidst a tempestuous civil war.

name: Nou wo Kitaeru! Nyanko Shashin de Machigai-sagashi
Noah's Descent into Madness
summary: Noah's Descent into Madness is a short horror-themed adventure and puzzle game. Make your way through a dark forest of unknown horrors while trying your best to escape the nightmare you've found yourself in.

name: No Numbers
summary: Put two and two together in this minimalist, hex-based puzzle game that will rekindle your love for numbers. Solve thoughtfully crafted levels that invite you to engage your mind and explore the unique gameplay at your own pace.

name: No Sleep for Sole
summary: No Sleep for Sole is a surreal survival horror game about mental illness and abuse. You play as a young boy named Sole who stays awake at night to protect himself from the monsters he sees around his home.

name: Nova
summary:
Nova is essentially an RPG with horizontal Level Scaling, which means that any advantages players get over other players are temporary, with skill and game-knowledge being the primary determining factors in player success.

When a player logs into the game, they are presented with 5 points of interest: The Courtyard, the Kingdom, the Desert, the Forest, and the Dungeon. These locations' unique objectives and loot combined with their varying aesthetics and purposes give them each a unique personality.

There are 5 classes in Nova: Fire, Frost, Shadow, Nature, and Storm. Because of the bifurcated class structure and the unique synergies of the elements, there are essentially 10 fun and interesting classes. Each element entails 7 unique abilities that can be cast at any time with the only limitation being mana costs. This leads to 10 very different elemental combinations, all with access to unique Talents and Augments.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Ranseiki
summary: The ninth title in the Nobunaga no Yabou series, this game returned to province-taking battles, and a system of varying powers was introduced.

name: No Vacancy Tonight
summary: Imagine waking up trapped in an abandoned motel. When you manage to get out of the room, a phone rings in the distance... In this point & click adventure game in 3D, you will have to use your wit to solve puzzles and find out what happened.

name: Nobody
summary: Nobody, the game! Spirits, monsters and autonomous machines will attack you, military traps abandoned for many centuries will return to work with your simple presence, you will also have to face earthquakes and avalanches.

name: Nothing Left: Give Up
summary: Legend has it that in the far east, there is a golden tree that produces golden fruits, and there are constantly explorers embarking on this arduous and challenging journey in search of the legendary golden tree. Explorers please be careful of the rough sea, once stepped into will never be recovered

name: Nodame Cantabile: Dream Orchestra
summary: This is the first work in the "Symphony Lover's Dream Series" to land on the Wii. The game starts with a completely original story and takes you into a different world of "Symphony Lover's Dream". The songs appearing in the game are all well-known songs, this time we will use Wiimote to perform somatosensory performances! And it supports 4 people to play together at the same time!

name: Nontan to Issho: Hoshi no Okurimono
Nontan to Issho: Nohara de Asobo
Nostalgia 2
summary: Nostalgia 2 is a set of 32 limit removing maps for Doom 2. Much like the original the focus is on modern map design slathered with a layer of old school paint, but now expanded on with the CC4 resource pack and new episode themes. It also includes a custom HUD created by me along with a custom monster reskin (featured in the secret maps) created and voiced by BluePineapple72

name: No Breaks Valet
summary: In No Brakes Valet cars need to be parked in a parking lot presented as a single-screen environment. A car always enter the location at full speed and then only gradually slows down. The player can only steer and needs to time correctly, trying not to bump into edges or other vehicles that were previously parked properly. There are many types of vehicles and also specific parking spots for VIPs and handicapped people.

name: Nostalgia Ain't What It Used to Be
summary: A drifting, dead planet shows signs of having once supported life. Scanning reveals the sites of their holy artifacts, now lost to time and decay. But, preserved in thick ash, you find one of their most sacred ancient totems. These items are so revered that virtually every household had at least one, if not more.

name: Normal Fishing
summary: Normal Fishing is a retro-handheld-inspired adventure where everything goes exactly as expected, and there is absolutely nothing to worry about. Explore the lake, chase and catch fish in frantic minigames, and uncover a much deeper, darker secret in this experimental indie horror adventure.

name: Noodle Fight
summary:
Gorillaz-guitar-guru Noodle stars in her very own game!
During the shoot for the Gorillaz' Clint Eastwood video, the co-star stunt ghoulies got carried away and decided to drag bassman Murdoc off to their lair... you play as Noodle and must track down Murdoc and return him to the safe confines of Gorillaz' KONG Studios!
Dodge the grasping hands of the ghoulies and those pesky flapping bats, evade the licking flames of the underground inferno and heed the warnings of Del Tha Funky Homosapien! Beware the Boss ghoul and you'll free Murdoc and return him to safety!

name: Nogizaka Haruka no Himitsu: Doujinshi Hajimemashita
summary: In this all new story you take the role of Yuuto, Haruka's most trusted confidante and the one who knows of the school 'unattainable beauty' Haruka's secret passion for anime and otaku pastimes. In the story of the game, Haruka has decided to make her own doujinshi (amateur fan comic). The only problem is that she's bad at drawing, but is so proud of her own work that nobody has the heart to tell her how it really is... The four themes you'll enjoy on this doujin creation adventure are "Maid Costumes", from Haruka's cosplay adventures, "Doujinshi", as she draws her own, "Party", as you gather with Haruka and your friends to celebrate, and "Event", the Comic Market-style doujin convention where Haruka finally is able to sell her books.

name: Nouryoku Trainer Portable
summary: An edutainment game intended to strengthen Japanese vocabulary.

name: Nouryoku Trainer Portable 2
summary: The sequel to Nouryoku Trainer Portable, an edutainment game intended to strength japanese vocabulary skills.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Shouseiroku
summary: Nobunaga's Ambition (Nobunaga no Yabou) is a turn-based strategy video game series first released in Japan in 1983. It is a series of loosely adapted historical simulations produced by the Japanese video game developer Koei. It features a predominately Japanese voice track though English dubs appear during movie cutscenes. It debuted before Romance of the Three Kingdoms but it hasn't been localized as often. Nobunaga's Ambition takes place during the Japanese Warring States period. As the title suggests, The player is tasked with achieving the ultimate goal of warlord Oda Nobunaga; the conquest and unification of Japan. Selecting Nobunaga is optional, however, as the player is also able to choose from a variety of other regional daimyo of the time. Nobunaga no Yabou - Shouseiroku is the seventh title in the series, released March 1997 for Windows 95. This game introduces a new map, portraying the entire country on a grid. Releases for Macintosh, PlayStation, Sega Saturn, Dreamcast, PlayStation Portable, and mobile phones were made subsequently.

name: NostalDoom
summary: A full Doom I E1 replacement that gimmick the original one BUT also take its own way, the theme stay mainly "Romero Tech" and retake the mains landmarks of the original maps to build another layout around it, but also take soft inspiration of E2. The main goal of this project was to catch a jovial tune for the sake of nostalgia.

name: No Recollection
summary: A mystery visual novel following a boy who awoke in a strange building, with no recollection of where he is, how he arrived, why he's here, or how to leave. Discover the answers to these mysteries as you search for a way out. Meet a small but colorful cast in your journey, and escape together!

name: Noyd
summary: Xbox Live indie game by Bog Turtle Games LLC.

name: Noisz Re: Collection G
summary: Noisz Re: Collection G is a massive all-in-one collection of Noisz content, featuring 40 action-packed stages and 3 story campaigns which mix the visual novel format with intense rhythm battles! It's time to face the music like never before.

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: "Explore Norway's beauty through captivating puzzles. From serene fjords to the Northern Lights, discover the magic of Norway!"

name: Nostromo
summary: Based on the ship Nostromo from the movie Alien, Duke must get aboard and set off the self destruct sequence that failed when Ripley activated it.

name: Nowhere
summary: Alien Life Simulator

name: No.HazedHeart
summary: This game is a casual strategy game that requires players to overcome multiple challenges and connect with beautiful girls' hearts. Players need to operate the two sides of the heart and guide them to reach the destination at the same time, in order to win the heart of the girl.

name: No King No Kingdom II
summary: You are the King in the first-person strategy game. Manage villagers, collect resources and build your castle. Сreate army not only of knights, but also with griffins, trolls or even mighty dragons. Mount your favorite fantasy creature and join the battle. Rise royal scepter to lead your kingdom.

name: Noddy's Magic Adventure
summary:
Journey into this magical adventure with Noddy to search for the Wizards' missing magic wand. Help Noddy discover the mystery of the strange happenings in Toyland - can he get the wand back from those naughty goblins who are casting mischievous spells?
The racing cars are driving by themselves! Help Noddy drive in his car close enough to the speeding cars and say a magic spell to stop them.
The goblins have taken all the batteries out of the robots and now they don't work. Put the batteries back in so the robots can continue building a space rocket.
The goblins made the balls bounce high in the sky - and stay there! Fly in the aeroplane and use some magic dust to bring them down to earth again.
Step-stone across the stream to rescue Bumpy Dog after the goblins turned the bridge into Jelly with the magic wand. Use the stones to cross the stream.

name: Nonlinear Door
summary: This is the first indie game I've ever made, and it includes puzzle solving, mazes, math and more, and if you're confident in your maze walking and puzzle solving skills, I'm sure this game will help you pass the boring time.

name: Nonogram Nights
summary: Nonogram Nights is a spooky puzzler where you use logic to uncover a mysterious picture.

name: No Brakes
summary: A large and difficult map influenced by Plutonia.

name: Nordhell
summary: Nordhell is a single-level PWAD for Doom II meant for the GZDoom source port, released in December 2007. Also titled "Death-Moroz" on the automap and intermission screen, it was designed by Alexander S. (Eternal) and uses the music track "". Nordhell was created to celebrate the coming new year of 2008, and was released alongside a different Nordhell for limit removing ports.

name: Nordhell
summary: Nordhell is a three-level limit-removing PWAD released in December 2007 by Alexander S. (Eternal). It was created in celebration of the coming new year, and was released alongside a different Nordhell for GZDoom. This WAD was later updated by Eternal in 2008 and 2009 to add two new maps to similarly celebrate the new years of that time. The PWAD furthermore comes with a custom enemy through DeHackEd, the evil marine originally from Scythe 2, but with a brown, rather than red, uniform.

name: Nostromo's Run
summary: Nostromo's Run takes place in an isolated station aboard some alien planet. The base was used for fighter training and mutant entertainment and features a large arena. Humans were being brought to this pleasure ground for the mutants amusement.

name: Noumisou Journey
summary: A boy, is killed by a killer but resurrected on Halloween. But his brain had been stolen. Confront traps and monsters. Interact with strange inhabitants, solve puzzles, and get your brain back. Dying Game & comical horror. death scene collection feature available. pixel-art exploration adventure.

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 5
summary: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 5!

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
summary: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 4!

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
summary: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 3!

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
summary: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 2!

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
summary: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 1!

name: No Place To Hide
summary:
No Place To Hide is a minigames collection for the NDS, inspired by a flash game where you have to dodge the blue shapes as they appear on stage.

In each game you must avoid letting your character get touched by any of the baddies.

They increase in both speed and numbers as the game goes on, so stay on your toes. Also look out for the tribute to the old arcade classics and home computer raves!

Avoid, avoid again, scores!

There are a total of 10 minigames all in different themes, as well as a WiFi mode for the online high scores.

name: No Pressure: Hive War
summary: Experience a challenging and fun top-down space shooter. Play as the sole survivor of the Human Alliance Federation's space fleet, battling the menacing hive. Defeat the Hive Ship to save the planet and compete on the leaderboard for an exciting and nostalgic adventure.

name: Novis
summary: Novis is a standard, medium sized hell leveI designed in just under a month from scratch.

name: No Case Should Remain Unsolved
summary: Twelve years after Senior Inspector Jeon Gyeong's retirement, she is visited by a young police officer: a woman who pleads with her to reexamine Seowon's case. But with each uncovered memory, only one thing becomes clear: everyone in Seowon's vicinity was lying.

name: NotHog
summary:
Stab your friends! Evade, fish for counterhits, and chip away at your opponent in head to head combat.

Inspired by Nidhogg and footsies.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Collaborating Nijisanji's VTuber "Ibrahim"
No Me: The Future is Ours
summary: the future is beautiful place!

name: Northgard: Vordr, Clan of the Owl
summary: Subsisting through the ages, the secretive norns of Vördr keep watch over all realms in Northgard and beyond. Protectors of Yggdrasil, the sisters Skuld, Verdandi, and Urdr, use the power of this sacred tree to spread their knowledge inexorably across the land.

name: Not Burned Evil
summary: The attractive and terrifying game "Got Burned Evil" is an exciting 2D horror with a side view that immerses the player in a mysterious world of tragedies and riddles.

name: Notice
summary: NOTICE is a 7-10 minute short interactive experience that follows the story of having a panic attack, then using awareness and presence to overcome it. As you get home and start to breathe, you take control over your thoughts. By clicking on each object, you start to become aware of everything in your space and what it means to you. Each object has its own style, musical note and meaning - whether that be the can of soda lying on your desk or the guitar gifted to you from a friend back home.

name: Nobody Nowhere
summary: A side-scrolling, story-driven text adventure game in pixel art. The story is set in 2079, when a Replicant awakens in a lab facility amidst a life-or-death situation. The replicant aid agency tries to rescue him but fails. In the process they stumble on the real secret of the Replicant project...

name: Novopangea
summary: Novopangea is a multi-player economy style strategy game. The game is designed around real world mechanics such as renting land, owning a business and completing jobs. Novopangea is set in a fantasy world comprised of six realms, each with their own story and lore and cast of characters.

name: Noisz: Episode G
summary: Noisz Episode G is the second story expansion for Noisz, exploring the tale of Gaius Antiphon long before the events of Ignition and re:||VERSE with 6 brand-new stages! Challenge new and old content with the tricky mechanics of Proto Style, further expanding your Style Lab possibilities, and earn more achivements and titles!

name: Nordic Adventure Bundle
summary: Embark on a beautiful yet dangerous journey with the Nordic adventure bundle, featuring Bramble: The Mountain King and Spirit of the North, will you become captivated or enthralled? All while encountering delightful mountain spirits and vengeful forest guardians.

name: Not Exactly A Hero: Story game
summary: Sick and tired of your usual typical superhero plots full of clichés? Wonder what it's like to live as an everyday citizen in a superhero universe? Play 'Not Exactly A Hero: Visual Novel, Story-driven Adventure Game' and find out!

name: Noah City: Rise of the conqueror
summary: Noah City:Rise of the conqueror is a SLG game. It takes place in an alternative reality where a great naval war is spreading all over the world. it focus on developing players’ gears and finding a comfortable pace of the gameplay, players who are fond of SLG games, you certainly cannot miss it!

name: Nomad Defender
summary: How many tries will it take to get back our land? Enter the Kernel - defense simulation to protect the Wirelands. Fight roguelike strategic Tower Defense battles. Upgrade and customize your Turret deck with unique synergies and countless combinations. Do you have what it takes to reach the end?

name: Nocturnals
summary: A short, choose your own adventure game about two boys that find each other in a lonely, post-apocalyptic town.

name: Norinori Rilakkuma Hit Song Ongaku
summary: A DS rhythm game featuring Rilakkuma.

name: Nope Challenge
summary: Nope Challenge is a VR thrill ride where you tackle spine-tingling phobias - think clowns, spiders and dizzying heights - with a twist. Hit the Nope Button to jump from adrenaline-pumping action to a peaceful Breather Space. It's not just a heart-racing experience for players but also a hilarious spectacle for friends watching. Perfect for a fun, fear-conquering adventure!

name: No Rest for the Wicked
summary: From Moon Studios, the award-winning developers of Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps comes No Rest for the Wicked, a visceral, precision Action RPG set to reinvent the genre.

name: Nourish
summary:
A pleasant puzzle, chill and wholesome as a capybara taking care of a garden.

I made this game to remind myself to nourish the aspects of my life that are dear to me.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. DX
summary: An enhanced port of Normal Super Mario Bros.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. 2 DX
summary: An enhanced port of Normal Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: Normal Super Mario Bros. Trilogy DX
summary:
Normal Super Mario Bros. is a series of fangames created by gamester and released for PC. Trilogy DX is a port of the original games, with enhanced features, making the games available in other platforms.

The first the was released in December 2023, with the first game 99% and the second about 60% complete. The third game wasn't available yet.

name: Notes To Myself
summary: The horror began when you wrote your first note.

name: Noxium
summary: Welcome to your new job mining Noxium for a sketchy business. Keep the power on and everything should be fine.

name: Nova Hearts
summary: A mysterious force of power transforms you and other highly attractive people in your area into superheroes and villains! TEXT, DATE and FIGHT your friends and enemies alike.

name: Notanote
summary: Welcome to Notanote！

name: Noelle's Forest Adventure
summary:
Noelle's forest adventure is a standalone adventure about NOELLE.

It takes place in the light world and it is about Noelle going out to visit her sister and gift her a Gladious. She explores FARAWAY FOREST, a forest filled with dangerous insects to fight in Deltarune style combat with a light world twist, as well as traces from memories in the past from all sorts of people. Can you reach Dess and give her Noelle's gift? The game has 4 endings to obtain, depending on your actions!

Enjoy an OMORI inspired mini adventure featuring Noelle! (This game can be played without having played OMORI, it isn't a crossover with OMORI)

name: No Man's Land
summary: The player has to destroy ervy tank in the area.

name: No Time for Mercy
summary: "My best friend came back after six months. There's someone else in her skin."

name: No-good Noelle
summary: Noelle and Ivy's friendship starts falling apart when only one of them gets accepted as a Snowflake Maker apprentice. Will you attempt to fix things, or move on to something even worse?

name: No Salvation
summary:
The kidnapped protagonist, Maya Higuchi, lives a strange communal life with Satori Nakahara, a hitman.
Maya, who was rejected by his parents and others because of his "talent" and wanted to die, finds salvation in the "violence that destroys all of his opponents" that Satori is trying to kill.

name: Not Even Remotely Fair
summary: Not Even Remotely Fair is a limit-removing Doom II megaWAD project lead by Peter "MegaSphere" Lawrence designed around Doom's Nightmare difficulty setting.

name: NoisyDiarrhea
summary: NoisyDiarrhea is a 32 Map speed megawad made for the 2018 NaNoWADMo challenge, a trial held last November to generate a 32 map megawad in the span of only one month. NoisyDiarrhea is what came out of me during that time.

name: Nope quiz
summary: Nope Quiz is a puzzle game. This crazy quiz features an extravagant host who tries to stick you with particularly sneaky and funny questions. It's up to you to surpass yourself and win the challenge.

name: Northrealm Tribes
summary: "Northrealm Tribes" is an exciting strategy game that immerses you in the captivating world of the Vikings. In this game, you take on the role of a tribal leader and delve into the rugged and thrilling era of the Norsemen. Your task is to establish, expand, and protect a flourishing settlement while meeting the needs and desires of your inhabita...

name: Nobunaga no Yabou Game Boy-ban 2
summary: The warlords start moving lively! A masterpiece depicting the Sengoku period is powered up! Now is the time to fulfill the great ambitions of Nobunaga Oda, who has been scattered in the midst of his ambitions by making full use of his unique warlords and doing his best in strategy and tactics! "Nobunaga's Ambition: Sengoku Gunyuden" is now available on Game Boy! !! The scenario is equipped with two episodes, "Gunyu Wari" in 1560 and "Nobunaga's Ambition" in 1582. There are more than 400 warlords. Equipped with "field battle" and "siege battle" modes.

name: Nothing
summary: A game about doing Nothing

name: Nobody Sleeps Tonight
summary: A co-op survival horror about finding your friend who disappears at night in a strange forest hiding a sinister secret.

name: Nothing to Declare
summary: As a guardian of the customs realm, you hold sway over the comings and goings of travelers, packages, and cargo containers alike. Do you possess the mettle to tackle such a formidable responsibility?

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario: Battle of Komaki-Nagakute
Nowhere
summary:
Nowhere is a Nordic inspired narrative mystery/horror game, revolving around Nordic mythology and what happened to these Gods after Ragnarök and how the rise of Christianity impacted them and their worship.

Featuring the mixing styles of detective gameplay and survival horror, It's going to appeal to people who love a good mystery and also love to be scared, wandering through these haunting atmospheres, feeling something watching them at every turn while the tension builds and builds until the world turns into a nightmare and its fight or flight.

name: Nope Nope Nope Nurses
summary: The world’s worst nurses are back, and they’re nastier than ever! Can Yamada escape the clutches of the “OG Three,” a triple threat of veteran nurses who like to play dirty? Find out in this, the second genre-defining hospital misadventure visual novel from Dark One!

name: Nothing Together
summary:
Nothing Together is a game that requires you to do nothing. If you act in the game, it's game over. All you have to do is be idler.
Multimode has two modes, Together mode and Battle Royale. In Together mode, up to 20 people unite to do nothing. In Battle Royale, you compete to see who does the least.

name: Nodame Cantabile
summary: Based on the manga and anime of the same name, Nodame Cantabile follows the odd couple of Shinichi Chiaki and Megumi Noda. Both are students at the prestigious Momogaoka College of Music; Shinichi is a studious and strict conductor while Megumi is a pianist known for her loose and inventive playing style.

name: Nodame Cantabile: Tanoshii Ongaku no Jikan Desu
summary: A classical-music-based rhythm game, tasking the player with correctly tapping the notes flowing across the screen, with the DS's Stylus.

name: Notebook Wars
summary:
Get ready for the ultimate notebook shooter!

Destroy hundreds of enemies and bosses to earn enough money to buy better planes and weapons, you have 40 different planes and 20 upgradable weapons to buy, and a survival mode… have fun!

name: Notebook Wars 2
summary:
More than 30 different enemies, bosses and a lot of ships, weapons and upgrades to buy; make your custom ship to destroy everything in this piece of paper!
A lot of new features like world map, different backgrounds and weathers, multipart bosses, etc!

name: Notebook Wars 3
summary:
Get ready for the ultimate notebook shooter!
Destroy hundreds of enemies and bosses to earn enought money to buy better planes and weapons, you have 40 different planes and 20 upgradable weapons to buy, and a survival mode… have fun!

name: Nonograms
summary: Nonograms is a relaxing puzzle game where you use logic and creativity. Your goal is to reveal hidden pictures by filling in specific grid cells, based on numerical clues provided for each row and column. The games in this genre are also known as Picross, Griddlers, Pic-a-Pix, Hanjie, etc.

name: Nope Rope
summary: Combining many ideas from a time when games were simpler, nope rope is a blast from the past. Nip your friends in the butt in local multiplayer, or blow them to pieces over the network. Design your own levels and make your own challenges. Do you have what it takes when it's snek versus snek?

name: Normal Person
summary: Normal Person is a single player horror, first person Visual Novel where your choices matter! Will you be able to escape or will you be stuck in a limbo with the man who claims to be a "Normal person"

name: No Worries
summary: You find yourself in a mysterious island fight to stay alive against a monsters. Build, explore, survive in this relaxing first person survival game.

name: Nova Core Chaos
summary: NOVA CORE CHAOS is a chaotic co-op cooking game for one to five players. Play as one of five unique classes and follow the recipes to make energy cores. Give these to your customers to help them evolve into Novas!

name: Nova Historia
summary: A unique 4X real-time historical strategy game, set on a procedurally generated globe. Play from ancient times, right through to the modern day. Expand your empire, build settlements, units, buildings and construct world wonders. Make History, Your Way.

name: No Walking, No Problem!
summary:
Oh no! An evil purple slug has stolen poor Sticky's ability to walk!
Use your mouse to manipulate objects to guide Sticky on his journey to vengefully steal back his walking power!

name: No Man's Sky: Omega
summary: The OMEGA update invites everybody to embark upon a new shared interstellar expedition entirely for free, whether they already own No Man’s Sky or not. Featuring a complete overhaul of expeditions, new on-planet missions, claimable pirate freighters, and much more!

name: Nose
summary: An easy [climbing] game by a gentle author.

name: NonStories: Eien no Hakoniwa
summary:
This is an event-based RPG.
It is a dark fantasy RPG with the content of an ensemble drama through conversation.
In short, it is an orthodox RPG in which everyone defeats the enemies that stand in their way while advancing through the events.
This is the first full-length RPG with an emphasis on scenarios in our game.

The difficulty level is high, and it is an unreasonable game in its own way.
We do not expect everyone to clear the game at all.
However, if you can complete a typical RPG just to reach one ending, I think you can go for it.

There are many long events, so it is not for those who want to operate quickly.
It is for those who want to proceed slowly and steadily. It is also for those who are not satisfied with a half-lengthy story.
However, I think it is not suitable for perfectionists.

name: None Like It Hot!
summary: An underground geothermal base, mixed with cavernous/hellish touches. A fairly tight and claustrophobic level, but with some open exploration and non linearity mixed in as well.

name: No One Is Watching You
summary: Point-and-Click-Adventure about the intrusiveness of being watched in your own Home

name: Node: The Last Favor of the Antarii
summary: NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii is a 2.5D puzzle platformer about a robot navigating a Cold War nuclear complex. Execute timeline-based commands to control NODE. Unravel mysteries, explore the unknown. Your commands decide the outcome.

name: No Surrender Heroes
summary: No Surrender Heroes is a real-time epic battle game set in the No Surrender Universe.

name: Node Farm
summary: Node Farm is a game about building a fully automated farm using nodes. Connect nodes, harvest and sell veggies, buy new islands, discover new nodes, and automate the process - all in a cozy farm simulation formula!

name: Nono's Quest
summary: Nono's Quest is a short casual 2D JRPG were you fight monsters and get in all types of trouble.

name: Nope Nope Nurses Melee
summary: The unbelievable spinoff off Sakusei Byoutou! You might not believe it, but it's now a 2D fighting game! It's kill or be killed, and either way you're getting sucked dry!

name: Nonogram 3D: Mega Puzzle
summary: Nonogram 3D: Mega puzzle is a logic and puzzle-solving game. Analyze the hints, then break and paint the puzzles to reveal hidden shapes. Inspired by nonograms (or picross), this 3D variant adds depth to the game while remaining accessible.

name: NoName
summary: NONAME is a strategy, puzzle battler with tons of tactics to win once and for all. We invite you to enter a unique game world that requires logic and wits!

name: NodeRunner
summary: Jump from Node to Node while surviving the Chasers onslaught. Keep moving, Keep Upgrading, and don't get terminated.

name: No Strings Attached
summary: No Strings Attached is a puzzle platform thriller where you play as Pavo, a newly-sentient puppet, in a struggling circus. Marionette Pavo's arms to swing, climb, and more to escape your Master's true intentions.

name: Noiseless
summary: Noiseless is a first-person survival horror game. You follow the story of a freelance investigative journalist who tries to uncover the secrets of the Gaudium Hospital.

name: Not Alone in the Space
summary: "Not Alone in the Space" is a visual novel for adults only. Young pilot Avis and his two adorable female partners explore space. What they encounter will turn their minds inside out, forcing them to break the chain of command and expose their inner desires.

name: Nothing Together: Multicolor Eye Pain Theme
summary: Do you like colors? Do you like a lot of colors? Do you like colors so bright they will hurt your eyes? Then we got a great deal for you! With the Multicolor Eye Pain Theme, you can now enjoy tons of amazing bright colors dynamically changing in the background!

name: Nothing Together: Banana Theme
summary: Enjoy doing Nothing while looking at a black background with bright yellow texts with the Banana Theme DLC!

name: Nothing Together: Dark Fire Theme
summary: Enjoy doing Nothing while looking at a black background with neon red texts with the Dark Fire Theme DLC!

name: Nothing Together: Retro Console Theme
summary: Enjoy doing Nothing while looking at a black background with neon green texts with the Retro Console Theme DLC!

name: Nothing Together: Deep Purple Theme
summary: Enjoy doing Nothing while looking at a nice deep purple background with the Deep Purple Theme DLC! Why would you want that? I don't know, someone in the Discord asked me to make this.

name: Nothing Together: Light Theme
summary: Just doing Nothing is boring! Use the White Theme DLC to destroy your vision and see absolutely Nothing! It has never been easier to experience absolute nothingness!

name: Nothing Together: Cute Theme
summary: With the Cute Theme DLC, you can look at cute colors while doing absolutely Nothing! Why would you want that? I don't know. Why would you want anything anyway, if you could have Nothing instead?

name: Nothing Together: Dark Theme
summary: Experience truly Nothing with the Dark Theme DLC. Stare into the void and question your life decisions.

name: Novark
summary: You crash land on Novark during a rescue mission. With hostile aliens in a war, nowhere is safe and everything is out to kill you. Fight to survive. Discover secrets. Fight epic bosses. Progress through the story. Survive and escape Novark!

name: Nottolot
summary: NOTTOLOT is a robot hacking action game. Your character can take over enemy robots and use their special abilities to escape from the factory.

name: No Love Lost: Founders Pack
summary: Incoming -- limited-edition content is up for grabs! Start your raiding journey now to seize your chance and acquire the Founder's Pack before it disappears on March 31st! This special content drop includes 10 weapons, an exhilarating new way to travel and a stylish new accessory for your Raider!

name: No Signal
summary: An emotional point-and-click exploration game exploring an abandoned space station. Follow messages left by the long-gone staff to learn the outcome of the research team and the secrets they left behind.

name: Nobody Wants to Die
summary: Lose yourself in the dystopian world of New York, 2329; immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. In this interactive noir story, lead the investigation using advanced technology, as Detective James Karra who risks it all in pursuit of a serial killer targeting the city’s elite.

name: No Ticket Back: Craft, Survive & Escape
summary: As the brave crew sets course for the Red Planet, their mission takes a terrifying turn. In the vast emptiness of space, their once-proud vessel becomes a haunted nightmare. Can they survive the horrors that await them in the darkness and escape or will they succumb before completing their mission?

name: NovaX
summary: Nova-X is a solo/cooperative survival game currently in development. Immerse yourself in a multiplayer pirate/fantasy world where you can embark on world exploration, conquer territories, build ships, seek treasures, or gleefully indulge in pillaging.

name: No Gasoline
summary: A Co-Op/Solo, Adventure-Simulation-Puzzle game. Build your vehicle to overcome the obstacles it will encounter along the way. Find new parts by solving puzzles. Take care of your vehicle. Don't run out of fuel. Explore unique places and stories through the journey.

name: Nora Wanna Rise
summary: "Nora Wanna Rise" is a parkour game where players guide Nora through castles, cities, and a space station. Mastering agility and strategy, they face unique challenges in each setting. It's a blend of adventure and skill, captivating players with its dynamic gameplay.

name: No.996 Magic Tower
summary: This game is a strategy RPG with the theme of anti-work from 9 am to 9 pm, six days a week. The gameplay inherits from the classic "Magic Tower" series, combining elements such as pigeons and BD combinations. Please play with caution under the age of 35 to avoid dissing and hurting the boss!

name: Nooch Farm
summary: Nooch Farm is a relaxing/colourful Puzzle game with a fun choice based story! Organise the food on the farm into rows, use your smarts to figure out the combinations! Talk to the animals, get to know their hopes and dreams and discover the motivations behind the residents in Nooch Farm!

name: Noah's Dilemma
summary: Noah, the flood has come. Go search and collect animals that survived. Voyage across the sea to somewhere safe. Be careful though, don't let them kill each other. Noah's Dilemma is a unique Sudoku-inspired strategy roguelike set in a reimagined world of Noah's Ark.

name: Nose: Breathing Rebellion
summary: Face factories of hate and gas-filled tubes to liberate the city in this 2D action-platformer set in a dark satirical world filled with puzzles and adventure. Welcome to a future, or past, dystopia where your determination pave the way to liberation.

name: No Internet
summary: This game is based upon the dinosaur jumping over cacti game which one gets in the web browser Google Chrome which can be played when there is no internet connection available.

name: No Observer
summary: First day on the job, and dispatched after a distress call you, find yourself in the middle of a threat filled mansion. Fight or run. Manage your inventory. Discover puzzles and bring to light the mystery within the mansion walls.

name: Nonu
summary: Nonu is a fantasy souls-like set in a beautiful hand-drawn world. Face intelligent enemies in true souls-like fashion, with a unique twist. Draw upon the power of Nonu to forge your own fighting style, and uncover untold truths about the world, and its inhabitants.

name: Nomadica
summary: A new world exploration where you can do anything you want. Crafting, bulding, hunting, fishing, mining, farming, cooking, visiting villages, meeting native people, trading and exploring dungeons for better loot and uncovering mysteries of ruins and buried cities

name: No Heroes Here 2
summary: A group of non-adventurers is the last hope in defending the castle in this co-op roguelite chaotic game. Organize your castle, purchase new items each day, work as a team to craft ammo, and shoot at enemies to protect your kingdom. Just because you’re no hero doesn’t mean you can’t save the day!

name: No Bugs On My Windshield
summary: Don't let them touch your windshield!

name: No Lava
summary: Control a physics-based ball and complete the course as quickly as possible without falling into Lava! (Game done in 30 minutes)

name: Not Tonight & Not Tonight 2
summary: Not Tonight is a post-Brexit management game, fusing a time-pressure RPG with a politically charged story where every decision matters.

name: Nornium
summary: This is a machine girl themed air combat action role-playing game. In the world of Nornium, you can experience ARPG cosmic air combat and its Rougelike variants, manipulate the "Time Tree" to jump around in parallel time and space at will, or enjoy a leisurely slow life in the presidential suite.

name: Now Open! Horror House
summary: This is a simulation management and tower defense type game where players take on the role of a "Horror House Owner". Using various mechanisms and props, players aim to scare off visitors who come to challenge the "Horror House", gradually expanding and strengthening the business.

name: No Life
summary: Farming simulation and zombie defense. You find yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where the undead roam freely, threatening to overrun everything in their path. Your mission: transform a desolate piece of land into a thriving farm while fending off hordes of relentless zombies.

name: No Signal
summary: "No Signal" is a game in which you work as a researcher for the company OceanMind. You are the first person who will travel alone to the Titanic. But at 2500 meters the connection suddenly breaks down. Days will pass, but your hope of rescue is lost expires hour by hour.

name: Not Alone: Classic
summary: Not Alone is a single-player horror simulator in which you play the role of 45-year-old Mortie Jones. You learn that your mother is dead and your father is missing. Your task will be to spend the night in your old family home.

name: Nooo! My Body!
summary: Breathtaking jump and run with an incredible story and unforgettable gameplay, in which you control a severed head! Don't forget to vote this masterpiece as Game of the Year.

name: Nonetheless
summary: An atmospheric puzzler that begins simply, but soon splays out into complex directions.

name: Not so Simple Sonic Advance 2 Worlds
summary: Not so Simple Sonic Advance 2 Worlds (or Not so Simple Sonic Advance Worlds 2, you can call it either way) is a work in progress Sonic Advance 2 framework made in Not so Simple Sonic Worlds and it is the sequel to the first Sonic Advance framework released back in April 2021. Much like the actual game It features the returning cast from Sonic Advance along with Cream the Rabbit being introduced into the mix.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario "Brotherly Revolt"
summary: The "Fool of Owari" succeeds his father, and challenges the world. Additional scenario available for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening. Select "New Game", and choose "Brotherly Revolt" to play the scenario.

name: Novice Dungeon Master
summary: [Novice Dungeon Master] is a dungeon management simulation set in a fantasy world of dungeons and adventures. Turn your beginner dungeon into the ultimate dungeon of your dreams. Greet adventurers who come to visit your dungeon, grow herbs, summon monsters, and more!

name: No Report
summary: "NO REPORT" is a first-person, walking simulator, psychological horror game. Be cautious and observant; there is something hiding in these rooms, looking for you..

name: Nori Danshi!!
summary: "Wound up? By any nori but me." A thrilling school life with 4 good-looking nori! Which "nori" will you "omusubi" with ......?

name: No-Skin
summary: No-Skin is a roguelike game characterized by a horror atmosphere and a smooth yet complex gameplay. Face the horrors that the house hides behind every corner and discover who the No-Skin Man truly is!

name: No Players Online
summary: you find an abandoned fps game on an old computer. you decide to play it.

name: Nomads in the Dust
summary: Blast, ram and outrun your opponents - Nomads in the Dust is an arena-based vehicular combat game that pits up to 6 combatants against each other in fast-paced explosive rounds in a variety of unique locations. Play solo against AI opponents or take the fight online against other players!

name: Northern Tales 6: Oath to the Gods - Collector's Edition
summary: Ragnar the great Viking king continues his journey. Now he needs to return home after a long wandering. However, new adventures lie ahead. Who knows what new dangers may lie in wait for Ragnar and the party on the way to the house.

name: NoSleep: Nightmare Chronicles
summary: Embark on a an unforgettable narrative journey with NoSleep: Nightmare Chronicles, a chilling collection of interactive horror stories from the r/NoSleep subreddit. Explore immersive environments, face grotesque encounters, and fight to survive in this gripping anthology of terror.

name: Nothing Good Can Come Of This
summary: Engage in intense battles over the control of a deadly weapon in this local fighting game

name: No Tomorrow
summary: You are stuck in an infinite loop. Observe unusual activites and escape the loop.

name: Not Evil Sudoku
summary: A minimalistic IOS sudoku game with daily challenges and no ads.

name: No.9
summary: Synchronizing form and time.

name: Nonograms: Ammunition
summary: 20x20 - 6 puzzles ||| 25x 25 - 6 puzzles ||| 30x30 - 6 puzzles ||| 35x35 - 2 puzzles

name: Not Alone
summary: Not Alone is a first-person mystical horror game where you need to escape from a terrifying house. This house may look familiar to some, but that's only at first glance. Read the notes to understand what happened and search for ways to escape.

name: Noclip
summary: Chapter-based Backrooms experience. Embark on a chilling journey through the unknown. Visuals based on early 2000's camcorders.

name: Nolgorb's Ordeal
summary: A challenging 3D platformer with little room for error. Escape a dungeon by jumping to the top, and trade your collectables to aid in your ordeal.

name: No Limite
summary: Something a bit Zelda 2D-like, a bit SNES Goof Troop, but you find/use >many< items, and you pick up items that are of no use to the game either. Confusing point-and-click puzzles made worse by useless items. A jaguar eating a contestant from No Limite.

name: Nora: Forest Nights
summary: Take control of our intrepid hero as you take Nora on a camping trip for the weekend. While on the trip, you'll convince Nora that it is of vital importance to follow certain, rules!

name: Norah's Song
summary: Norah's Song: This first-person psychological horror plunges you into a nightmare. Immerse yourself in a haunting past, desperately seeking answers. Each discovery threatens your sanity, chilling you to the core. Can you survive the darkness long enough to find redemption?

name: Nocturne of Nightmares
summary: One day after falling into a deep sleep, you wake up terrified in a dark, creepy world. But you’re not alone. You find yourself trapped in this nightmare world along with a few attractive strangers. Yet, they all seem vaguely familiar. Who are these guys? And why does your heart hurt so badly when you look at them, especially Licht?

name: Noonkey: Healing Tears II
summary:
1. Grow your happiness garden by crying.
2. Collect the fairies and hearts.
3. Meet the various garden elements.

name: Nola1
summary: This Place is not Pure is Nolatron's first serious attempt at a Quake map.

name: Notes on a Mystery
summary: This is a short mystery story where you have to pick the right words to answer questions.

name: Nonsense
summary:
Welcome to Nonsense! A variety collab in every sense of the word, this hack features contributions from numerous level authors across the SMW community.

You’ll encounter many wild gimmicks and strange ideas throughout this hack. However, at its heart, Nonsense is about classic standard platforming. You’ll find very little in the way of puzzles or Kaizo here, but your platforming skills will truly be put to the test.

name: No Rules Box!
summary: In this intense and action-packed game, you will forget about the rules of traditional boxing and instead, focus on using weapons to take down your opponent.

name: No Loose Threads
summary: A detective game about the complications of working for a LOT of legal entities.

name: Novivors
summary: Unlock new heroes and abilities, collect and craft powerful equipment, path the 1000+ nodes stats tree, strategize meta-progression, customized runs, and create game-breaking synergies with 6 active classes and 36 abilities all at once in this roguelite hack and slash survivors bullet heaven game.

name: Nouns Crown
summary: Dive into Nouns Crown, a wacky rogue-lite dungeon crawler where every day brings a new character to master. Embrace the chaos as unique abilities and weapons redefine your adventure every 24 hours in your quest to protect the all-powerful Nouns Crown from the invading Souls.

name: No Man's Area
summary: NO MAN'S AREA is a gripping and hardcore FPS experience. Enlist with the rebel group, Dissenters, and traverse vibrant terrains. Combat both human and AI adversaries, striving to rescue Shiyuba while mastering survival tactics.

name: No Contact
summary: After being left alone on a delivery ship, you find yourself on a space station that has gone to hell. Navigate through the dark corridors of the station while running and hiding from the dark forces in pursuit. Choose who you can trust, while uncovering the mystery of what happened.

name: Northgard: Garm, Clan of the Hounds
summary: The Sons of Ragnarök, as they have come to be known, are indeed as destructive as the event their past leader, Hvedrung, worked so hard to unleash. Freed from the gods' restrictions, they might indeed be the nightmare Northgard feared…

name: Nomu
summary: In "NOMU," navigate the undead-infested Nevada desert, scavenging supplies, fortifying your vehicle, and evading relentless zombie hordes. Beware the Wendigo, a sinister creature of myth preying on the lost and desperate. Will you defy the odds as a survivor or succumb to the apocalypse?

name: Nocturnal Relics
summary: In Nocturnal relics you play as May who is trying to escape a monster while trying to get out of a museum. Is the monster in her head or did she release an ancient evil into the world?

name: No Rest
summary: No Rest is a horror game in which you will play with David, who is in a town that looks like any other but is unlucky to meet a terrible event.

name: Nox Machina
summary: Pilot a lone ship through the moon's core to shut down a lunar doomsday factory in this sci-fi deckbuilding game. Power up your cards and equipment to neutralize humanity's greatest threat... if you can survive the journey.

name: No Work No Life
summary: This game is a roguelike horror game. Beyond the door lies a completely white space where you must pick up items, offer them as sacrifices, and survive for as long as possible.

name: Nora: the Hidden Object Challenge
summary: Help Nora find the missing items around her house! Try the regular difficulty mode as well as shadows and dark mode.

name: Northern Song Dynasty
summary: A real-time strategy game based on the history of the Northern Song Dynasty. The player can experience the fun of conquering cities, directing the country, and ultimately uniting the world through their own efforts in the simulated historical background of the game!

name: NoteCaptor
summary: "NoteCaptor" A video game lets you gain the ability to read musical notes!

name: Non Stop Driver
summary: If you slow down you die, if you speed up you live!

name: Nothing Door
summary:
A puzzle game from a dark dimension.

The Nothing Door is your only escape. But the door is fickle. It lets nothing through... except you. Where will it lead you?

name: Nora: The Wannabe Alchemist + Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe
summary: Enter worlds full of magic and enchantment with Nora: The Wannabe Alchemist and Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe.

name: No Vacation for an Executioner
summary: It's a a Dark Fantasy Action-RPG about a frustrated executioner in late 17th century. He ran away from the gallows. It aroused a riot of monsters, he had to clean up this cruel mess, and find out the truth of this crazy world.

name: Not an Aim Trainer
summary: A young girl escapes into new realities through video games and her art, adventuring through different aim training scenarios; she aims to be the best.

name: Nomo Hideo no World Series Baseball
summary:
A baseball game for the Sega Game Gear released as part of the World Series Baseball series in Japan.

The game features an endorsement by Japanese baseball player Hideo Nomo, who had recently played his first season for Major League Baseball with the Los Angeles Dodgers.

name: Nonogram Animals
summary: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Nowhere Near
summary: Do you believe in ghosts? As a skeptical video blogger, you will travel to France to one of the most cursed places - the abandoned Lagarde psychiatric hospital. Will you be able to capture something. or someone.

name: Nova the Squirrel 2
summary: Nova the Squirrel 2 is in development for the SNES. It is planned to have a stronger storyline focusing on Nova as well as a unique mouse named Maffi.

name: Nora: In Search of Hidden Ingredients
summary: Help Nora find the missing items around her house! Try the regular difficulty mode as well as shadows and dark mode.

name: No More Humans
summary: NO MORE HUMANS is a top-down single player wave based shooter, where you play as one of the unique survivors slaying and surviving waves of nightmarish enemies. Choose and modify your weapons and defeat fearsome bosses across different environments. Will you survive or die with the world?

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
summary: A port of the second game in the Nobunaga's Ambition series.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
summary: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Zenkoku-ban
summary:
Nobunaga No Yabou Zengokuban (Nobunaga's Ambition - Whole Country Version) is the second title in the series. PlayStation revived in the "national version of Nobunaga's Ambition" timeless masterpiece of historical simulation. 5 of this book included the scenario of a mode for beginners in 17 countries and four mode 50 countries dealing with Japan. And dialects with the mode "Ninja", and give the message to become a regional dialect of damage to the enemy. Multiplayer can also be a maximum of eight people. Experience the Raging Gale Sengoku!

The player may choose from four campaign scenarios including: "Battle for the East" (beginning in 1560), "Daimyo Power Struggles" (1560), "Ambition Untamed" (1571) and "Road Towards Unification" (1582). In each scenario, the player must allocate resources to raise a capable military force, provide a productive economy to support both military and civilian expansion and support the peasants in order to sustain their respect and loyalty. Gameplay is taken in turns, with each turn in the map view corresponding to a season and each turn during battle corresponding to a day. The player may achieve victory through numerous means, among which are forcing the enemy to retreat, destroying the enemy command unit, outlasting an invading force, or prolonging battle until the opposing force has exhausted its supplies.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
summary: Players take on the role of one of the main characters of the period, Nobunaga Oda, Shingen Takeda, Kenshin Uesugi, or others and try to unite the 50 kingdoms of Japan, from Ezo in the north to Kyushu in the south, under their own rule.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
summary: Nobunaga's Ambition, the first of the series, was released in 1983. Players assume the mantle of either Nobunaga Oda or Shingen Takeda and strive to conquer the entire land (17 areas in the Kansai and central Japan region). They manage their country to make it rich, then prepare their military forces. These then attack and defeat surrounding Clans in battle.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Tenshouki with Power Up Kit
Noroi E: Darkness
summary:
In "Noroi E: Darkness", you immerse yourself in the shoes of Detective Juárez, a private detective who has been investigating paranormal cases since he was fired from the police department. One night, you receive a desperate call from a mother worried about the disappearance of her son, Oscar García, in a small, bleak town in northern Mexico called Santa Anna.

Arriving at the scene, you find a gloomy environment, decrepit buildings and an atmosphere full of mystery. Your mission is to discover what happened to Oscar and solve the dark secret behind his disappearance.

name: Norm of the North: Arctic Dash
summary:
It's off to the Arctic races in this multiplayer side-scrolling racing game! Play as the beloved polar bear Norm, or any number of characters from the animated film. Race against other players and do whatever it takes to cross the finish line first! But be careful...the other players will be out to get you with Bottle Rockets, Frosty Icicles, Sea Mines, and other nasty projectiles!

Play with other people online or host your own game with friends and battle for first place!

name: Noite de Bingo: Fofoca com Vampiro
summary: A bingo simulator with a vampire theme.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Kakushin - Power Up Kit
Nobunaga's Ambition: Reppuuden - Power Up Kit
Nobunaga's Ambition: Haouden - Power Up Kit
Nobunaga's Ambition: Soutenroku - Power Up Kit
Nordhold
summary:
Build a city and defend it in this Tower Defense game blending Roguelite mechanics with turn-based building Strategy. Choose your hero, utilize synergistic tower upgrades, and face epic battles in procedurally generated landscapes.

Nordhold is a tower defense game for strategy enthusiasts who crave high replayability through endless combinations. Build and manage a cozy medieval Nordic village while enjoying deep tactical gameplay that doesn’t require extensive learning.

name: Not Like Us: The Game
summary: Not Like Us: The Game is a web game created by Richie Branson based on the music video for Kendrick Lamar's song "Not Like Us". The game is a high score game where you hit owl pinatas.

name: No Man's Sky: Worlds Part I
summary:
Update 5.0, WORLDS, transforms the universe into a richer, wilder, more varied and immersive place. Featuring huge leaps in water and cloud visuals, increased planetary diversity, new gameplay features, and more.

Our journey continues.

name: No spikes, please!
summary: Avoid the spikes, reach the flag.

name: Norbert's Diary
summary: Norbert's Diary is a retro-themed psychological horror game set in the 2000s. In it you will learn the story of Norbert, the guy who opened a gas station in the forest. You have to earn money and serve customers, but who knows what, or who, can kill you.

name: No Way Out
summary: "No Way Out" is an intense and thrilling survival horror game where players take on the role of a volunteer trapped in a panic-stricken hospital. Players must bravely face their fears, explore various areas of the hospital, and search for a way to escape while uncovering the truth behind the events.

name: Nocturnal II
summary: Nocturnal 2 is an action-adventure game that lets you explore and rekindle the dark depths and towering heights of the city of Ytash.

name: Nobodies: Silent Blood
summary: Step back into the shoes of Asset 1080, the intelligence agency's top cleaner. Puzzle your way through 14 unique locations, devising clever ways to hide all evidence of your employer's deadly actions. Get in, get out, and leave no bodies behind.

name: No-Hi
summary: No-Hi is a parkour platformer, combo your moves to get fast and cut your way with momentum! Explore the map the way you want, never being lost. Face unique bosses with gracious movements. Sinergize itens to make your own gameplay style.

name: Not a Masterpıece
summary: Not a Masterpiece invites players on a whimsical journey through a vibrant cartoon world, where nothing is quite as it seems

name: Nonentity Galaxy
summary: Nonentity Galaxy is a rouge-lite strategy game about starship battle, asset management, dark humor, and jobbery. You need to play the role of a fleet commander in the field to make money for the company , just try to survive in these miserable times. Fortunately, you have friends, life goes on.

name: None Shall Intrude
summary: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

name: Norowareta: The Three Treasures
summary: Embark on a chilling journey as a young woman uncovers her past, answering the call of a tormented soul. Explore an isolated shrine in Japan and be transported back to the Edo period. Navigate through the mysteries and terrors of a fateful night in this spine-chilling horror survival game.

name: Nordhold: Origins
summary:
Immerse yourself in Nordhold: Origins, a tower defense game with high replayability. Build a medieval Nordic village, develop its economy, and defend it with unique towers and upgrades. Choose heroes and relics, compete on leaderboards, and aim for the Valhalla rank!

Nordhold: Origins is the Prologue Game for the full Game "Nordhold".

name: Noblemen: 1941
summary: Set in an alternate reality World War II, Noblemen: 1941 mixes strategy, tactical decision-making, and 3rd person combat. Gameplay is a blend of realistic combat mechanics, historic influence, and fictional elements such as melee combat, heavy armor, mechs, battle suits, vampires, and more.

name: Not Quite A Fairy Tale
summary: Welcome to the rogue-like with a unique combat system mixing the depth of turn-based RPGs with the thrill of poker, where your mission is to lose with style! Gather heroes, craft perfect skill combos, and navigate randomly generated dungeons where your boldest plans end in hilariously epic fails

name: No Ghost in Circus Caravan
summary: It's a small... somewhat eerie circus caravan. Each round lasts a few minutes, leading to numerous endings. Unravel the mysteries and control the outcomes. In the end, you might just hold it in your hands...

name: Noircotics
summary: All drugs are legal in the city. Your job is to manipulate them to keep up with the demands of the mobs.

name: Nonogram Mon
summary:
Playing the nonogram puzzles is even easier than before.
Improve the current problematic nonogram points; nonogram game with a range of new features.
firstly; By changing the puzzle; we have removed the parts that we had to make in order to continue
Enhanced close-up drag zoom (30x30); Reverse zoom function added.
Touch; Pen; The pad supports three types of operating modes; and; Offers a range of options for you.
If you delete the game and restart after or; if you are playing on a new device then you can find the contents saved on your Google cloud.
There are; also a number of features available.
Find other new and existing Nonogram!

name: Not A Banana: Capybara
summary: Hello! Welcome to the wonderful world of capybara clicker! Here you will become a true friend of the capybaras, clicking on the screen and calling the cutest and sometimes special capybaras! Don't forget to keep clicking to attract even more capybaras to you!

name: No Paint No Gain
summary: They say that without pain, there is no gain... But in this game, if you don't paint you don't gain! Choose the color or material you want and decorate the train stations as you want. Before start painting you must clean the station to earn money and buy some materials... So don't pain

name: Nostalgic Entropy: Neo Retro
summary: Welcome to the Neon Circles of Hell! Nostalgic Entropy: Neo-Retro is a large non-linear Vaporwave map where the architecture twists and turns into familiar structures of a future that wasn't meant to be. Experience a variety of combat scenarios, from classic coincidental encounters to gimmicky mini-game-like ones.

name: Northanda Chronicles
