summary: Master role-driven combat in Northanda Chronicles, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder. Recruit three heroes from countless combinations, craft a shared deck of powerful abilities, and fight to save Northanda from the devouring Void.

name: NoLimits 2: Vekoma MK1101
summary: This add-on contains an additional coaster style: The Vekoma MK1101. It is a modern and popular coaster type with a sleek design.

name: No Rest for the Living
summary: A remastered version of the No Rest for the Living made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: No One Lives Under the Lighthouse: Director's Cut
summary: Director's cut (previously known as Isolated Year Update) introduces a remake of most of the late-game content, completely changing the second hour of the game and also adding some new things to the earlier part of the game. All of game's endings were remade and some of them became much harder to achieve than the others. Additionally, many achievements were remade to fit with the new content.

name: Nostalgic Entropy
summary:
As the sun sets on the horizon, the last rays of light fade in the sky, like dancing ambers of a half-forgotten memory.

This place feels strange yet familiar in a nostalgic way. But you know not all memories are good, so steel yourself for the journey ahead.

name: Nobk Overlay
summary: Welcome to NOBK Overlay, the ultimate fruit-clicking adventure! Your task is simple: click on delicious, vibrant fruits to generate even more fruits. The more you click, the more your orchard grows, and the juicier your rewards become!

name: Nodebuster
summary: Nodebuster is a short, experimental incremental game about busting nodes and destroying reality.

name: No Blood, No Fowl
summary: You accidentally killed someone with a rubber duck. Time to hide the body!

name: Norikire! Hina-chan Stamp
summary: The genre of this game is similar to a deck-building rogue game.

name: Not Quite Vegas
summary: A short map making use of Nick Baker and Sam Woodman's Morister Resources texture pack.

name: NoLimits 2: Roller Coaster Simulation - Professional License
summary: This Professional License DLC adds more features to the standard version of NoLimits 2.

name: No Recollection: Swimsuit DLC!
summary: This DLC will allow you to enable swimsuit outfits for the main cast! You can finally live out the fantasy of seeing them half naked!

name: No Man's Sky: Aquarius
summary:
The Aquarius update to No Man's Sky adds Fishing to the game. Adding to the new water tech introduced in Worlds Update Part 1!

This includes new aquatic creatures to fish for, a new exo craft for players to utilise and various otehr additions including bait!

name: Nova's Adventure
summary: After crashlanding on an unknown planet, Nova the Star sets out on an adventure to collect all the parts from his broken ship that was hit by an asteroid while on his way home.

name: No Give up
summary: No Give up is a 2D Rouge+ strategy combination game.Heroes from different worlds are thrown into an unknown uninhabited planet, where there are only monsters and perhaps gods.Take up weapons, choose rewards, fight with monsters, and leave a legend of the unyielding……

name: Noisz Starlivht: True Heroes
summary: A continuation to NOISZ STARLIVHT "False Timeline"'s story rather than a full fledged second game. True Heroes marks the end of the NOISZ saga.

name: No, I'm Not A Human
summary: An intimate story about a disaster and guests from underground. People are breaking into your home, but not all of them are true people.

name: Noisz: Hyun Level Pack
summary:
All-new stages featuring music by HyuN:
Inferno Force / Hyun ft. Kabotya
Fallen Angel / HyuN ft. JeeE
Girl Embracing the Dark for Light 2 / HyuN (coming soon in free update)

Owning at least one Artist Pack unlocks Mega Style for use, giving you a new way to play older content as well by using its unique charging ability!

name: Noisz: DM Ashura Level Pack
summary:
3 all-new stages with crazy new mechanics, featuring music by DM Ashura:
π·ρ·MANIAC / DM Ashura
Violet / DM Ashura ft. 森岩虎
Allegro Con Fuoco / DM Ashura

Owning at least one Artist Pack unlocks Mega Style for use, giving you a new way to play older content as well by using its unique charging ability!

name: No Caddie Included
summary:
Crank-swing your way thru some fantastic golf-courses.
The perfect on-the-go golf "simulator".

name: Nostalgia Zero
summary: Nostalgia Zero is a set of 36 maps in CL3 for The Ultimate Doom. This WAD uses exclusively vanilla textures and vanilla limits, with the target source port being Chocolate Doom. In terms of gameplay and level design it’s much closer to the IWAD than either of the Nostalgia WADs, though it does sometimes dip it’s toes into more modern tropes.

name: Noiramore Academy
summary:
On the cold planet of Noivesse lies a school with a dark and storied history called Noiramore Academy. Judith Hovern, one of the talented students attending this institution, is a troubled but wickedly smart student who has an interest in discovering the forbidden secrets of the school. When one of the new teachers is violently kidnapped during the night, and Judith is the only witness, she must use her wit, powers, and puzzle-solving skills to illuminate the identity of the culprit and save the school.

Noiramore Academy is a 3D puzzle adventure game. Solve brain-teasing puzzles, explore the storied halls of the school, talk with interesting characters, and unlock the secret of the mystery plaguing the school.

name: No Ducks Given
summary: Indie mix of a Math Puzzles & Tower Defense. Use you brrraaain and fast calculation skills to defend friendly fowl agains the hungry monsters! Explore 8 different Levels, face 8 awesome Bosses and complete this crazy story!

name: Nortopia
summary: Help the penguins who fled from the plague and undead build a new life on the island of Nortopia! Construct a fortress, trade with other families, explore dungeons, embark on sea voyages for treasures, and engage in clan battles for power!

name: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain
summary: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain is a four-player co-op survival horror game centered on the supernatural "Yokai" from Japanese folklore. Trapped in a cursed domain, you and your companions must work together to endure the curse, hide from the terrifying Yokai, and find a way to escape.

name: No Happy Days
summary: A short RPG with only one fight. Uncover the truth of the past of the frogs.

name: Nowa Online World
summary: Nowa Online World is a mobile role-playing game about the war between human and orc developed by Nowa Games.

name: Not My Part
summary: This is story about 'Grace' who is on her way to the Sunday Lake camp, but something happens that makes her meet a famous serial killer at a motel along the way. In this horror movie-like scenario, what role will she play?

name: Nothing.SeriOS
summary: A tiny PSP game made in 48 hours. Play 3 mini games together!

name: Nova: Space Armada
summary: An exceptional sci-fi strategy game based on space adventure as its core.

name: Nova Era: Atom
summary: Welcome to the first trailer of Nova Era: Atom, Welcome to Nova Era: Atom, a sci-fi MMORPG game blending Chinese mythology. where you can DIY your own custom spaceship and explore the endless mysteries of the cosmos.

name: Nonogram Halloween
summary: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Nowv
summary: This game is inspired by Ningning, a member of the South Korean idol group aespa. It conveys the message that even one's flaws can become strengths through inner growth.

name: Novels Rogue: Isekai Koshodo to Fuuin no Majo
summary: Enjoy the cards and the story with a combination of "deck building" x "JRPG" x "pixel art."

name: Nonolith
summary: Discover the countless secrets of the NONOLITH. Copy and paste blocks to reach new areas, and master hidden mechanics that let you do the seemingly impossible. You are very powerful, you just don't know it yet.

name: Noddy's Big Adventure
summary: Noddy's Big Adventure is an edutainment game aimed at children aged 3-7 years. The game features characters from Enid Blyton's Noddy books and TV series. There are seven mini-games within the game. These are a memory game (Tricky Trees), a reading game (Bert's Scrapbook), several matching games (Can You Find Me? and Noddy's Kitchen), a math game (Noddy's Scales), a sorting game (Beach sorter) and Picnic Attack, which is not intended to be educational, where the player squirts water at crabs to keep them away from the food. The games are linked together via a world map where the player can drive Noddy's car from one activity to another, as well as picking up and dropping off passengers (which serves no purpose in the game).

name: No Strangers
summary: An online horror game of exploration, teamwork and betrayal for 3-15 players.

name: Nox Mortalis
summary: Nox Mortalis is a PS1-style open world survival horror game where you must gather resources, craft essential gear, and explore sinister caves. Face hellish creatures and fight to survive through the night.

name: No Stars No Problem
summary: Awaken from your dream and explore the liminal remains of a dead universe. Explore an open city scape with all sort of platforming mechanics. Run across billboards, double jump between platforms, and leap from wall to wall. Talk to a wide variety of NPCs and delve into deeper and deeper states of unreality.

name: No Space For All
summary: No Space For All is a top-down space shooter where you fight against an enemy fleet to claim your place in space. Upgrade your craft by collecting parts from destroyed ships and build the powerful Devastator Project. Follow the story through jokes in chat with your operator.

name: Nothing Beyond This Point
summary: In the Void, everyone is alone, and you're no exception. Use your health as damage, create your own character with abilities and Sigils, and fight through corrupted souls in this top-down action Metroidvania. Don't be fooled - you're nobody's last hope.

name: Nomad Idle
summary: Face waves of enemies automatically and create builds by distributing stat points, leveling up equipment, choosing passive skills, summons, on-hit effects, and more. An idle game about killing hordes of enemies, becoming stronger, and exploring an unfolding storyline. A spin-off of Nomad Survival.

name: No Robots Allowed
summary:
You’re at the doors of PARADISE…
…but it seems that the security protocol doesn’t trust you.

Can you prove you’re not a robot?

name: No Man's Sky: Starborn Phoenix Ship
summary:
An exclusive reforged starship, commemorating a time when Travellers old and new joined together to voyage across the stars.

This unusual ship is optimised for effortless gliding during flight, while a localised vector field allows the craft to hover above solid planes.

To add this ship to your collection, visit the Quicksilver Synthesis Companion aboard the Space Anomaly and choose "Collect Special Rewards".

name: Nordic Racing
summary: Nordic Racing is an exhilarating open-world driving adventure set in the stunning landscapes of the Nordic region. Experience the thrill of the road as you explore diverse maps, from icy fjords and dense forests to bustling cities and serene countryside. Choose from a wide array of vehicles.

name: Norm Aethos Real
summary:
The new norm sure ain't the same as the old norm, huh?
We're norming out right now!!
What the aethos?!

name: Not Monday Cafe
summary:
Build and manage your cute cozy cafe while working studying or streaming.
Farming and serving delicious dishes to adorable animal customer in your cafe on the bottom of your screen, all while you're working on other tasks and enjoying your day.

name: North Star Mining Co.
summary: Hire miners, fight off pirates, and exploit the cosmos.

name: Noise
summary: A small game made for the 2023 LSD jam. Explore randomly generated dreams, and maybe uncover some hidden things.

name: Noir: Dead On Arrival
summary: Noir/Horror themed story rich interactive adventure indie game with party-based RPG elements. As you investigate various mysterious cases, you will learn more about the secrets of this dystopian world and maybe discover why most of mankind has turned into zombies. Each of your choices really matters. In NOIR: Dead On Arrival, inspired by the 1950s classic film D.O.A., the story centers on the murder of Frank Bigelow, a government employee caught in a deadly web of intrigue.

name: Noah's Ark
summary: Noah's Ark was a 1995 Windows/Mac sci-fi Japanese point-and-click adventure game linked to NEC.

name: Nom Plant
summary: Grow as much as you can and chomp your way through Nom Plant! Avoid obstacles as you make your plant grow in any direction to get the best score - there are lots of different plants and pots to collect! How much can you grow?

name: No Man's Sky: Worlds Part II
summary:
Update 5.50, WORLDS PART II, transforms the universe with new stars, new story, and new planets. Explore ancient ruins, gas giants and water worlds, and discover strange creatures, varied biomes and dramatic terrain. Featuring new gameplay, huge improvements in lighting and water rendering, and much more.

Our journey continues.

name: Norma
summary: "noRma" immerses you in the role of private detective Augustus Pinkerton. The game takes place in June 2240, your mission is to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Norma X, a 19-year-old young woman.

name: Noelle: Lost Soul
summary: Noelle: Lost Soul is a DELTARUNE fangame set during an alternative ending of the Chapter 2's Weird Route.

name: North Wind: Eien no Yakusoku
summary:
North Wind is a dating-sim game, is published for PC (Windows) and PlayStation 2.

The PC version has three chapters, but the PlayStation 2 version has two chapters. The structure is somewhat unique. Usually, the mystery in chapter 1 is revealed in chapter 2, but in this game, chapters 1 and 2 are on the same time line. Some cut scene are added to PlayStation 2 version.

name: Nox Dash
summary: Put on your headphones and feel the beats in a vibrant world. Explore caves, dodge deadly traps, and search for the lost gold coins.

name: Not For Broadcast: Complete Edition
summary: Enjoy the full Not For Broadcast experience, base game and all DLCs included!

name: Noobs Are Coming
summary: You are the final boss in this brutal synergy arena roguelike. Select a character, equip boss patterns and combine tons of attacks to create unique builds. Play solo or in co-op!

name: No Escape from Madness
summary: No Escape from Madness is a thrilling shooting adventure game that blends Lovecraftian elements with extraction gameplay. You will guide the self-sacrificing infantry operators into the Sector where The Elder One is poised to descend.

name: Noodleman.io party games
summary: Noodleman.io is an multiplayer action game fun and popular. You can fight against local or online players. Grab other players and throw them out of the area. Meanwhile, try not to get killed, try to survive and be the last one standing.

name: Nonozle: Food and Drink + Miscellaneous Puzzle Packs
summary: A DLC containing two new puzzle packs (Food and Drink pack and Miscellaneous pack) with 50 puzzles each for a total of 100 new nonograms.

name: Nox Aeterna: Veil of Darkness
summary: On your journey in this sometimes philosophical text adventure, discover unforgettable characters and secrets that must remain hidden from the human world forever..

name: No.8 High School
summary: You've returned to your high school classroom, where time seems to stand still. You need to look around and find something unusual to get through the last 30 days of school.

name: No Rest for the Weary
summary: A 2D Action RPG Inspired by Persona and 2D Zelda games. No Rest for the Weary combines social simulation, dungeon crawling, and an emotional story full of impactful decisions with retro-inspired visuals.

name: No Need for Flowers
summary: Dodge through colorful bullet patterns as you shoot down hoards of enemies in this arcade-style scrolling shooter bullet hell about magic dragon girls! Uncover a tragic story about acceptance as you overcome intense challenges that test both your skills and memory.

name: No More Shopping
summary: Go through the supermarket buying all the products on the list, but be careful! Your family is very forgetful so they won't stop calling you to ask for more products they didn't think of in the first place. What could be more stressful?

name: Nolean: The Space Bartender
summary: Play as a bartender traveling across the galaxy, serving unique drinks to clandestine clients while evading the watchful eyes of the Shioncala Empire. With your trusty ship, you'll navigate space, dodge patrols, hack enemy systems, and craft custom cocktails without leaving a trace.

name: Nouen Hokkoriina
summary:
Nouen Hoccolina is a farm simulation game published on Mobage exclusively for cell phones. Developed and operated by DeNA, it was released on January 9, 2010 and is compatible with both Android and iPhone.

In December 2023, an official SNS account was established to provide game updates and other information.

name: Nothing Exists Outside of This House
summary: Your friend Marie needs you. Find Marie.

name: Noel 3: Not Digital
summary:
An Special Edition of Noël 3: Mission on the Line, This Special Edition of Noël 3 contains:
- the game
- a mini-CD single with two tracks: "Yuka kara no Message" and "White Morning" by Mayumi Iizuka (飯塚雅弓)

name: Norse: Oath of Blood
summary:
Norse is a turn-based tactics and combat game for PC and console. Set against the rich backdrop of the Viking Age, join Gunnar, a young warrior, on a relentless quest for revenge across the rugged landscapes of Norway.

Build a thriving settlement, govern your community, forge alliances, grow strong, and win the favour of the gods. For this is a time when legends are forged in the fires of conflict, and only the brave are remembered.

Written by prize-winning and Sunday Times bestselling author Giles Kristian, Norse is set in a fully realised historical world, driven by a compelling narrative and brimming with memorable characters.

name: No Man's Sky: Relics
summary: Turn your hand to palaeontology in update 5.6, RELICS! Unearth hundreds of unique bones, assemble skeletons to design fossil exhibits, join the community on an expedition to recreate lost creatures, battle against gargantuan stone guardians, and more!

name: No Sleep for Kaname Date: From AI - The Somnium Files
summary:
Kaname Date and the AI-Ball, Aiba tackle a mysterious case and rescue Iris, an internet idol who has been forced to take part in a dangerous escape game.
Examine crime scenes and listen to testimonies in "Investigation". Enter the dream worlds of suspects and key witnesses in "Somnium". Solve puzzles to break out of locked rooms in the new "Escape" sections.
By moving between these three sections, obtain the necessary clues to solve the case.

name: Nobody Expects Exploding Immortal Pigeon
summary: You are a pigeon that will do anything for a slice of that sweet, sweet bread.

name: Nosferatu's Dominion
summary: Build and rule your gothic dominion as the vampire Nosferatu in this hybrid Action-RPG/RTS game where choices matter. Hypnotize and feed upon your villagers, who have unique inherited traits, to thrive and unlock vampiric abilities.

name: No Time to Build
summary: No Time to Build is a cooperative casual game with parkour and action elements! Collect logs, avoid cars, trains, and walking bombs, overcome challenges, and build structures within the time limit. Teleports, speed-boosting bushes, and player interactions make every game chaotic and fun!

name: No One Survived: Military clothing
summary:
Tactical set DLC, after owning DLC, can be made at the garment station.
Includes clothing, pants, hats, and shoes that can be made.

name: No One's Escaped
summary: Escape the towering prison by mastering your grappling hook! Navigate through vertically moving cubes, avoid deadly spinning turbines, and manage your stamina to reach new heights in this thrilling climb. Die, repeat, learn, and conquer your way to freedom.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Complete Edition
summary: A complete edition of the game with various add-on content and new scenarios.

name: No the Baby
summary: no the baby is a short stealth horror game where you escape a kindergarten full of manipulative kids and an overworked teacher. Find items and solve puzzles to open the front door and get out of there for good!

name: Nomia
summary:
NOMIA is a story-rich tactics roguelike where two heroes coordinate to execute brilliant skill combos.

Guide a warrior and a wizard through a mystifying tale. Harness grid-based strategy and deep deckbuilding mechanics to battle gorgeously illustrated foes. Blast monsters off cliffs, steal their cards, and sling spear and spell to reach the horizon.

name: No Food No Drink
summary: Enjoy delicious snacks, earn rewards, and navigate whilst avoiding the librarian. Equip yourself with many tools to distract others creatively. Assist your classmates and prepare to face challenges in this stealth-strategy game at different time or weather.

name: No Fap Island
summary: No Fap Island is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel. Set in a reality TV show surrounded by five gorgeous women can you evade the view of the cameras and find a way to get dirty with the ladies? Build relationships, go on hot dates, have sex and get ready for a vacation you'll never forget!

name: Nomad Drive
summary: Repair your rundown RV and hit the road in a procedurally generated post-apocalyptic world. Gather resources, customize your RV, and survive as long as you can. Every journey offers a unique experience!

name: NomNomNom
summary: You are a little worm that woke up feeling very hungry! Go and find some delicious food to satiate that ever growing hunger of yours.

name: Normenhill: Chapter 1 - "Your New Look"
summary: In the unknown to you World of Darkness, where you ended up, you get a new look, abilities and maybe even friends, who will help you find a way out of it! You can explore bizarre locations, gain unusual abilities, and most importantly - fight your opponents in a special way (You don't have to fight them at all, instead you can negotiate with them without violence and maybe even become friends!)

name: Nomad: Steppeborn Saga
summary: Nomad: Steppeborn Saga is an open world co op survival crafting adventure set in a vast, ever changing world of nomadic culture. Explore, trade, forge alliances, and face threats while packing up camp, migrating, and forging your legacy.

name: Not My Floor
summary: You get into the elevator... You press the button... Oh, looks like this isn't your floor! Explore strange floors of an unknown building. Who knows, what waits for you there...

name: No Afraid Of Battle
summary: Fight with cool combo ! Strike the enemy and enjoy it ! Equip up the spoils that your harvest ! 2D Action Game by beating monster . Easy to play, and with depth .

name: Nock & Load
summary: Become the best band of bowmen in the land by defeating all those who would stand against you! Nock & Load is a small, casual archery game with PvP and roguelike elements. Recruit archers into your troop and collect upgrades to outmatch your foes.

name: Nocturnal Nemesis
summary: Experience the terror in Nocturnal Nemesis, a first-person survival horror game. Navigate a dark, eerie winery, fix generators, and outsmart relentless AI-driven threats. Can you survive the night and uncover the mystery?

name: NokNok
summary: NokNok is a unique cross-platform open world idle game with elements of self-governance. As a player, you're tasked with earning coins and treasure chests through idle mechanics, which in turn allow you to unlock and upgrade a variety of rare hammers.

name: Nook Fall: West Town
summary: A charming yet fantastical town, where vitality and decay constantly collide. We hope that through interactions with characters and objects, and the sensory experience created by visuals and sound, you can connect with the emotions and charm of this little world of West Town.

name: NoSpellHero
summary: A useless hero who only takes on D-rank quests suddenly becomes the world's only hero? Defeat monsters using the equipment left behind by other heroes!

name: No Throwing
summary: There is only one level of the 3D fixed view integral mini-game.Maneuver the robot to hit falling items and protect the chickens.

name: Norvezskaya Semga
summary:
The Norvezskaya Semga Mod is the most extensive modification for Disciples 2 to date. Its author does not stop supporting his brainchild, and updates are released periodically.

Comprehensive and engaging. The modification contains so many new features that an unprepared player's eyes may run away at the first launch. But don't be alarmed. Despite all the scale and apparent complexity, the content of the mod is quickly mastered and remembered.

Everything new is a well-forgotten old. It is this phrase that most aptly characterizes the modification. Changes do not cause rejection, and innovations significantly expand the usual aspects of the game. Even completing original campaigns with the mod won't be a chore. You'll get a whole new experience, and you'll love it.

In addition to the legendary Battle for Vizgard, the author creates new maps that are strikingly different from everything that you could pass before. It is on them that you can test your strategic abilities. AI, which in the original almost did not pose a threat, will be able to give you a decent rebuff. Now PvE is not about clearing the map of neutrals in an attempt to collect trophies and upgrade troops, it's a real fierce battle with a computer opponent.

The Norwegian Salmon mod is also notable for providing advanced mapping tools. And many skilled authors have already switched from the original version to a modification in order to implement ideas that were impossible to implement before.

name: No Alibi
summary:
No Alibi is an online top-down co-op shooter with roguelike elements. Sneak in unseen, take hostages or go in gunning – the choice is yours. Use your cash to buy a range of customizable weapons, from small pistols to massive miniguns and sentry turrets. Add attachments to your weapons at the weapons workbench – but keep in mind that the more you invest in your gear, the more you’ll lose if you can’t make it out.

Your group starts out as a small criminal concern, robbing banks and jewelry stores, but you’ll soon find yourself scoring big on some high-stakes targets. The man you answer to is hard to keep happy, and if you can’t deliver, it’s game over. The relentless action will keep you on your toes, so make sure you come well-equipped. You’ll never be truly ready.

name: Noir Total: Deadly Party
summary: Noir Total is a 2D local multiplayer PvP shooter set in darkened arenas. Sneak through total darkness using your controller's vibrations, track down your enemies, collect bonuses and set traps to stay one step ahead of your opponents in fast-paced, competitive matches for up to 4 players.

name: Nonononogram
summary: Never-ending nonogram game.

name: Not Not 2: A Brain Challenge - Golden DLC
summary:
With this DLC you'll NOT NOT unlock:
3 unique skins for your character
3 cool backgrounds for a change of scenery

name: Not Not 2: A Brain Challenge - Platinum DLC
summary:
With this DLC you'll NOT NOT unlock:
3 unique skins for your characater
3 cool backgrounds for a change of scenery

name: Noox
summary: Noox is a medieval fantasy ghost investigation game. Find the correct ghost type based on the clues left behind, assemble the correct runes on your trap, and capture the spirits and expand your powers.

name: No Way Out
summary: With the survival card battle genre, can upgrade and unlock new characters, you will freely experience and play again to collect rare items in the game. If you want to survive, the player must make reasonable calculations.

name: Nobility Simulator
summary:
Take a step back to the 17th century and experience life as a true Polish noble. You own land, command peasants, and live by your own rules — but beware: idle workers and the looming Swedish invasion may ruin your day faster than you can say “Wiśta wio!”

Nobility Simulator is a third-person, immersive management game set in the slightly exaggerated but historically-inspired world of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth.

name: No Brake No Gain
summary: Put your driving skills to the test in no brake no gain, the ultimate arcade driving game packed with wild challenges, chaotic tracks, and endless opportunities to show off your precision and control!

name: Nocturnal Survivors
summary: Fight monsters in each night, survive as long as you can! Nocturnal Survivors is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter game in which you simply keep combining your weapons to more powerful versions to kill thousands of monsters at nights.

name: No More Noise
summary: Survivor of a post-apocalyptic world, the dead have returned to life to make you regret still being among the living. Moreover, their hearing has evolved, and every sound they perceive makes them stronger. A small piece of advice: I think you should stay discreet!

name: No Such Place
summary: A top-down extraction shooter. You are dispatched to a Dimensional Fragment to conduct reconnaissance missions. Survive in an environment full of unknown threats, gather supplies and clues, and find the evacuation point. Through the collected information, bring back the truth to this world...

name: Northern Lights
summary: Travel through the Northern Lights, D.Tiffany's song as imagined by Jack Rothwell.

name: Northern Lights
summary: While the Great Stargazer is deeply sleeping, the Celestial Guardians protect the equilibrium of the forgotten world…

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition + Collector's Set
summary:
"NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening," where players can truly experience the Warring States period with officers who make decisions for themselves, now has a collector's edition that includes various add-on content that has been released, along with an officer artbook and complete soundtrack.

The contents:
In addition to "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening Complete Edition" and all its add-on content, the collector's set includes:
- The "Kou Shibusawa's 40th Anniversary Commemorative Officer Data Set,"
- "Digital Officer Artbook," "Digital NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book,"
- "Digital Complete Soundtrack."
For more details about the collector's edition contents, please see the official site (https:///).

name: No Mosaic Girls With Sess-AI 2.0
summary: Break Mosaic to Save the Girls! Simulation RPG by Great Think Program!

name: No JetPacks For Chattini
summary: The Chattini somehow got a JetPack, lets us see how long the Chattini can fly!

name: No More Deep
summary: Experience survival horror in this first person shooting game - No More Deep. What mysterious force has turned this once-thriving Gothic town into a ghost-ridden ruin? Come and experience this eerie, spine-chilling tale for yourself.

name: Noon Stone
summary: Quick runs, endless challenges. Noon Stone is a tactical adventure with RPG elements blending procedural exploration, strategic upgrades, and dice-driven combat.

name: No Man's Home
summary: You wander into the dangerous Asran Exclusion Zone. You will have to survive hunger, thirst, dangerous factions, radioactive emissions and the wild life. Remember, this is no man's home and you are not the hero.

name: No Way Home (Update)
summary:
This previously delisted Apple Arcade-exclusive game was made available to purchase and brought to other platforms. This update included weapon rebalancing, new loot, new bosses, raid dens, challenges and quality of life improvements.

Apple TV is no longer supported.

name: No Gods of Men
summary: Rebuild a towering citadel, manage your disciples, and slash through waves of enemies in a hand-drawn world that combines roguelike metroidvania gameplay with base-building & colony management.

name: No Way Home: Blammo!
summary: No Way Home: BLAMMO! is a tactical arcade roguelite that's all about fast-paced twin stick space combat. Every run is a new adventure!

name: No Man's Sky: Beacon
summary: Expand your planetary empire in No Man's Sky BEACON. Become Overseer of multiple planetary settlements, and discover the townships of the secretive robotic Autophage. Introducing improved settlement balance, more variety of management decisions, building upgrades, infestations, new base parts and more.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Set of 6 Scenarios
summary: This set consists of 6 scenarios, with 3 historical scenarios including "Birth of Nobunaga," the scenario with the earliest possible starting point in the game, and 3 fictional scenarios including "Absence of Great Conflict," the scenario about how history would have played out if the Onin War had not occurred. In addition, the scenario "Battle of Nagashino," which was released as a bonus for the Asian version for the game,

name: Noble Legacy
summary:
After returning from war you claim your inheritance: Greenwood—a neglected realm on the brink of collapse. As its new Lord, you must guide your kingdom to greatness, not from a distant throne, but by walking its cobbled streets and verdant fields. In this third-person kingdom builder, you must raise your realm from rubble with a builder’s touch—every hall, heath, and castle wall crafted to your design.

Attract skilled settlers to your realm and keep their spirits high by ensuring their homes are furnished and their needs well met. Rule wisely over your land’s resources and build a thriving economy through careful management of trade and labor. Prepare in the times of plenty as harsh weather, plague, and roaming bandits can stall your progress. From the ashes of ruin, reclaim your land, guide your people, and uncover your past as you forge a Noble Legacy worthy of song and steel.

name: No Time for Pants
summary: Compact, tactical, rogue-lite, 2d action with pixelized graphics with a dark, gritty tone. Gather all the resources you can and customize your loadout- you must evolve with every death to fight through the horrors that await you. This is No Time For Pants!

name: Nova Dawn: Overload
summary: Take up arms and take care of robot buddies in this co-op action roguelite. Hunt giant hostile robots that have stolen the sun to harvest their mechanical parts, upgrade the machinery you can build and strengthen the bond between you and your Nova robot buddies!

name: Nonplace
summary: You find yourself in the nonplace. Nonlinear, uncanny, maybe in between worlds or time itself. What is your purpose here? Are you just passing through, or are you an intruder surveying a reality that isn't even real?

name: Nonogram Desserts
summary: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Novath
summary: Slay. Spare. Subjugate. Novath is a single-player, story-rich turn-based RPG set in a fractured medieval world. Assemble your party from enemies and allies alike. Shape the story through choices that echo across the continent. Your path is yours to forge.

name: No Straight Roads 2
summary: Metronomik and Shueisha Games are thrilled to announce NSR2 – the explosive sequel to the hit action-music adventure NO STRAIGHT ROADS – coming to Steam in 2026.

name: No Other Alchemists Here
summary: NO OTHER ALCHEMISTS HERE is a sandbox simulation merging roguelite about a world within a desktop computer. Combine elements, manage resources, and defend your digital paradise by using the power of alchemy.

name: Novems
summary: Cut open your destiny with 9 cards! Master strategy in a turn-based roguelike auto-battler. Collect cards and survive battles by utilizing 'placement' and 'linking' mechanics.

name: Not Easy
summary: Get ready for the ultimate challenge with Not Easy, a hardcore platformer that tests your skills and patience. Navigate relentless obstacles, gather keys, and unlock doors across 60 intense levels. Each level is designed to push your reflexes and determination to the limit. Can you conquer Not Easy?

name: No Customers Left
summary: Andy, a night shift security guard at a game console store, expected a quiet shift in the nearly empty mall. But as the hours passed, an unsettling presence made itself known. Flickering lights, and distant echoes—something was watching. Little did he know, the night was just beginning.

name: Noscope Flappy: MLG Bird Version - The Parody
summary:
Montage parody + most popular game ever = loominati confermed!

This flappy bird parody delivers more than just a few minutes of fun. It's actually a real game with leaderboards, achievements and stuff to unlock. It's combining a quality gaming experience with the fun and randomness of our beloved internet-memes.
Try reaching better highscores to unlock new skins or get the pro-pack to gain access to more funny sounds, memes, skins and the newly added dank mode.

name: No Retreat! the Russian Front
summary: This game is a Strategic game on the Eastern Front of World War II.It is a digital port from the famous and eponym boardgame, No Retreat!, designed by Carl Paradis.

name: Nora & Magic That Does Not Turn Back Time
summary: “Don’t use formal speech. Please.” That was the first thing she asked of me when I woke up. I couldn’t remember anything—not who she was, with her amber eyes, nor how I ended up here. Nothing. And yet, she told me to call her Nora.

name: Nonsense Fall
summary: The city has been attacked, leaving roads in chaos! Strange and dangerous things are falling from the sky. You must avoid these obstacles, and pick up shields to survive! Collect money to unlock new heroes.

name: No More Grudges
summary: Step into a shattered world where every bullet tells a story. No More Grudges is a visceral 3D top-down shooter that marries razor-sharp gunplay with a gripping, shadow-soaked narrative.

name: North Shore
summary: North Shore is a top down skating exploration game in which the player navigates a series of connected waterways. To do so, the player must learn to master the art of skating to effectively navigate through these spaces. As they progress they encounter scenes of natural beauty and danger.

name: No Logic Inc.
summary: Tired of serious life? Good. You're now a super-agent, certified in top-level absurdity. No logic. No sanity. Just nonsense — and you're built for it

name: Nonogram: Master's Legacy - The Classic Pack
summary: The Classic Pack is a DLC for Nonogram: Master's Legacy and includes 50 hand-made B&W levels.

name: Nonogram: Master's Legacy - The Speed Pack
summary: The Speed Pack is a DLC for Nonogram: Master's Legacy and includes 50 hand-made time-limited B&W levels.

name: Noroi no Kegareuta: Narumi Tatsuya no Kaikiroku
summary: You have lost your memory and wake up in an unpopular Japanese house. Strange phenomena occur. Eerie singing voices coming from inside the house. Uncover the mystery of the cursed house with your partner.

name: No Death in Wild West
summary: In "No Death in Wild West," play as the Grim Reaper in a fast-paced action game. Use parkour to dodge bullets and slash through the Reaper Raiders, a cowboy gang hunting you. Optimize strategies, speed through the Wild West, and claim top ranks in this thrilling adventure.

name: Norm: A Serial Killer RPG
summary:
It is not a story about love. It is a story about survival. It is a story about what is considered "normal" - and the actual truths of the universe that send people screaming from their beds in the night. It is a story about the lies we are told. It is a story about the lies we tell ourselves. It is a story about murder, debauchery, cannibalism, fraud, extortion, torture, Stockholm Syndrome, drugs, war, heresy and black magic. It is a story about tedium... it is a story about entropy... and there will be no happy endings.

But there will be plenty of macaroni and cheese...

name: Not Not 2: A Brain Challenge - Complete Edition
Nobunaga Shinsen
summary:
"Nobunaga Shinsen" is a brand new work created by the production team of "
Sangokushi Tactics" authorized by "Nobunaga's Ambition: New Life".
In the game, you can experience the strategic confrontation of the Warring States Period, which brings you a more extreme strategic experience and rich and interesting personal development gameplay. You will play the role of the lord of a city in the Japanese Warring States Period when many heroes emerged, practice personal abilities, form the strongest retainers, and create a force with friends... until the world is full of military power and the troubled times end!

name: Nocturnal
summary: Explore a dark labyrinth in this top-down survival horror. Solve puzzles, evade traps, manage scarce resources, and uncover the gruesome story of a cannibalistic killer. Stealth and strategy are key to surviving this tense, atmospheric experience.

name: No End
summary: Explore a seamless endless universe with an uncountable number of galaxies, stars, planets, and moons. Make friends or enemies with unique alien civilizations. Research upgrades for your vessel with scientific phenomena and alien tech that you've acquired.

name: Nokia Bowling
summary: A simple bowling game included with Nokia phones in the early 2000s.

name: Nothing Strange Here
summary:
Nothing Strange Here is a single-player open-world adventure game with mystery and slice-of-life elements. Set in the small town of Larcenest Gap, players take on the role of a reporter exploring the community, documenting strange events, and interacting with townsfolk.

The game combines narrative discovery with photography and journaling mechanics. Players can photograph scenes, collect evidence, and publish their findings in a customizable in-game journal. NPCs follow daily routines, and the world changes based on the player's actions and the time of day. Additional features include hidden collectibles, such as stickers and gnomes, and dynamic events that encourage exploration and investigation.

name: Not Not & Not Not 2
summary: NOT one game, but NOT NOT two games!

name: Novel Rogue
summary: In the mystical Ancient Library, a young apprentice named Wright trains under Yuisil, the Witch of Portals. As part of his magical studies, he delves into the stories of four enchanted books, each offering a unique realm to explore. From reclaiming a fallen kingdom to unraveling the mysteries of the underworld, your choices shape the destinies of captivating characters and their intertwining tales.

name: Nova Patria
summary: Nova Patria is a Roman Steampunk Colony Sim. In this alternate history, the empire never fell and lived on to discover the New World and steam power. Manage intricate supply chains, expanding cities, and innovations in a hopeful, procedurally generated, isometric simulation of industrial antiquity.

name: Not Guilty!
summary: You are the judge, the executioner, and the warden — all in one. Investigate absurd cases, make questionable decisions, expand your prison, and keep the budget balanced. Bend your morals, play with verdicts, and build your own empire of justice.

name: No-good Streamer Mirai-chan! (Now accepting lewd comments)
summary: Chat and play with a cute streamer girl!(Almost fully voiced) Flirt with clumsy streamer Mirai-chan and spice up her stream! Even saying things like "Show me your boobs" is totally okay. The more excited she gets, the longer the stream—and maybe you’ll get some special services, too…

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Complete Edition
summary: This is a tale of revenge — of a demon, a girl, and their companions. After seven years of development, the popular dark suspense adventure "Noel the Mortal Fate" finally arrives as a complete edition with all 13 seasons included, fully upgraded and with no extra charges.

name: Noctheria
summary: Noctheria is an Action-adventure 3D game inspired by the N64 era, focused on exploration, horror elements, combat and puzzle solving.

name: Nose: The Great Keana Edition
summary:
NOSE is a Souls Like RPG made by rightkamo and published in 2020

You're a nameless child that's only goal is to "Seek the Great Keana"

name: No Door Can Not be Opened with a Non-black Key
summary: A world constructed with sentences. 2D action puzzle game where you get keys, open doors and clear stages by rewriting sentences and altering rules by adding and subtracting the word ‘Nai(no/non/not)’.

name: Noroi Kago: The Grduged Domain - The Birth of Kitaro: The Mystery of GeGeGe Costume - Kitaro's father and Mizuki
summary:
This is "The Birth of Kitaro: The Mystery of GeGeGe" Collaboration Costume.
The character costume "Kitaro's father" and "MIZUKI" will be added.

name: No More Heroes: Naomi Hook
summary: This updated version includes smart quality-of-life improvements like sprinting during combat and adjustable FOV. A mid-fight weapon switcher adds strategic flexibility, while optional balance tweaks let players customize the difficulty on the fly—perfect for those seeking extra challenge or a smoother ride.

name: No Hope For Us
summary: Team up with 3 friends and join a co-op multiplayer game to defend yourself against the mutant hordes. Or face the zombie rush on your own if you have what it takes. Either way you need to lead this effort or there is NO HOPE FOR US!

name: Noir Lords
summary: Welcome to the Noir Lords! This fast-paced strategy card game puts you in the middle of an intense battle against a powerful enemy army. As an elite strategist, you’ll build your ultimate deck, outsmart ruthless opponents, and take down bosses in a gripping noir-inspired story.

name: Nocturnals: Cacti Coast
summary: A narrative-driven, choose-your-own-adventure game where a young survivor must make difficult decisions in order to survive the foggy wasteland of Cacti Coast and find a community to call home.

name: Nocturnal Whispers
summary: Solve the mystery behind bizarre nightmares in this immersive Full Motion Video Game.

name: Non Euclidean Room
summary: An exploration game in a strange land. How many times can a room be connected to itself?

name: Northstar Courier
summary: In Northstar Courier, you take the role of a 20-year-old delivery worker as she becomes accustomed to her new life in a small town. With the help of a rusty scooter, you make your way around town as you talk to the local residents, enjoy photography and fulfil your company's mysterious requests regarding odd sightings. With over 10+ cryptids to track down, will you find them all before the clock strikes midnight. Who knows what lurks in your dreams...

name: Noor
summary: Uncover a world where memories are magic and forgetting is a threat! Noor is a top-down action-adventure game inspired by ancient Arabic mythology.

name: Novaxandria Volume 01
summary:
This game is a combination of a visual novel and a 2D turn-based strategy game. It marks the first volume in the Novaxandria series, taking you back to the very beginning of the story

Novaxandria is a vast cosmopolis full of enigma and mystery. Its atmosphere varies dramatically from one district to another, each with its own unique character. In the very north of its territory there’s the Starfall Home, an orphanage where our protagonists were raised.

Young Iris, our main protagonist, finds out that bullying is happening in the orphanage. As she stands up to fight against the bullies, she makes a group of friends, and together they uncover the darker secrets lurking within Starfall Home. They resolve to fight back against the injustice and give all the kids a better life.

name: Nora and Frank
summary: Blast through hordes of vicious mutants and science-gone-wrong experiments to save your goblin friends in a stylish retro-magic post-apocalypse. An auto-shooter where builds are made of baseball cards and candy. What? Yeah, we're confused too!

name: No Road to Peak: Together
summary: Push your out of gas vehicle with friends through challenging obstacles to reach your destination! Physics based cooperative car pushing game - One mistake can end it all!

name: Nocturnomaly
summary: You're heading home from school. Something feels off. Observe your surroundings carefully to escape the endless street.

name: No Arm
summary: Reach the destination. Even if you get frustrated, don’t smash your keyboard.

name: Not Not 2: A Brain Challenge - Golden Edition
Not Chess
summary: Wait, if this game is NOT chess, then what is it? It's a mind blowing puzzle game with some simple chess rules and a few special ingredients to make it fun and challenging for everyone!

name: Not Sure About That
summary: Not Sure About That is an exciting trivia quiz set in the middle of the ocean. Test both your brain and agility to conquer all 555 questions.

name: Nostalgia
summary: Nostalgia is a two-player cooperative indie game that escapes from enemies in a dark labyrinth. After waking up in the deep, dark forest, the two follow an unidentified girl into the labyrinth. Avoid enemies in the labyrinth, find a diary, reveal the hidden past, and escape.

name: Noble Legacy: Villager - Abigail
summary: Start your Legacy with style and skill, Abigail is now available for you to help grow your village and handle the challenges you face. Abigail is currently ONLY available during the Pre-Order period.

name: Nookle
summary: A daily game where players aim to guess the mystery Animal Crossing character or item price. Each incorrect guess will reveal information about the target character/item price.

name: No Sweet Looks
summary: Nothing but ocean in every direction, and monsters eyeing you down everywhere you go! Wake up, confront the monsters, and find your way home in this top down rouge-like, with a unique take on shooting mechanics.

name: Nonogram Piggy Valley
summary: Nonogram Piggy Valley is a classic logic-puzzle game with a special farm twist. Solve picross puzzles, adopt cute pigs, build your farm, collect all pigs and themes.

name: NotChess
summary:
NotChess is a tactical PvP game where chess pieces ditched their crowns and went straight into brawls.
Forget boring matches: here every unit has its own personality, abilities, and quirks. You build your own army and decide how to lead it into battle.

name: Nocturnarya: Collector's Edition
summary: Play Match 3 to help a vampire tribe resist a cruel human invasion. The Collector's Edition includes 60 additional matching levels, exclusive village buildings and more.

name: Nocturne FX
summary: Fast, unforgiving, and endlessly replayable, Nocturne FX turns every run into an arcade showdown for your best score.

name: Noctambulo
summary: A Game Boy Color platformer adventure where you'll have to explore, solve puzzles and collect different items to learn the story of Bennie: A drunk heartbroken rabbit trying to crash a mysterious night club in the Andes.

name: Northern Crossroads
summary: Northern Crossroads is a free, text-based multiplayer RPG that’s been live since 1992. It’s classic Diku-style hack-and-slash: explore 400+ areas (~40k rooms), fight thousands of mobs, level and gear up, and team with others. No graphics—just depth, challenge, and a loyal community that loves discovery and progression. Play via modern MUD clients or Grapevine; direct connect: ncmud.net:9000.

name: Noroi E: Nightmares
summary: Noroi E: Nightmares is an auditory psychological survival horror game, where the true enemy isn't what you see… but what you hear.

name: No Man's Sky: Voyagers
summary: Create your own colossal, fully furnished, completely bespoke Corvette-class starship in No Man's Sky VOYAGERS - and invite your friends on board. Introducing habitable, multi-crew starships assembled from hundreds of ship modules, new multiplayer missions, a stunningly detailed new player suit, a ship-building community expedition - and more!

name: Novice in the World
summary: This game includes RPG content such as exploration, self building teams, battles, and growth, as well as multiplayer gameplay such as interacting with other players, forming guilds, and competing in battles.

name: Nourish
summary: Nourish is a retro-styled 3D horror game about survival, responsibility, and the terrifying cost of failure.

name: Nothing is Known: The Innocents
summary: As a young detective, you will have to investigate the disappearance of a little girl, while simultaneously living in the missing little girl moments.

name: Not Again, Hero
summary: In a child’s never-ending imagination, the quest keeps looping. Arrange scene cards to build your timeline, and watch your story unfold—again.

name: Not a Dream Job
summary: Have you ever found yourself in a situation where you have no other choice and have to act according to circumstances, trying to survive? When your words and actions literally depend on your life? This game is about that. Read below for more information about the game.

name: No Forgiveness
summary: In this psychological horror, you are a guilt-ridden, drunken father who wakes in his dark room, alone. As you search for your missing family, reality twists, and madness takes hold. Something is watching, guiding you—will you uncover the truth, or become its victim?

name: NoSlack Pets: Lo-Fi Paws
summary: No Slack Pets is a desktop idle game where your cute cat companion joins your daily work, study, and chill time. Enjoy collecting over 300+ adorable headgears, customizing your DIY room, and focusing better with Lo-Fi white noise and a built-in Pomodoro timer—fun, chill, and full of surprises!

name: Noir Mafia Simulator: 1960s American Crime
summary: Plan. Strike. Escape.

name: No Sheep Left Behind
summary: No Sheep Left Behind, is a simple and casual game where you embody a valiant sheepdog on a procedural journey to gather and protect a growing flock of sheep. Enjoy the chill atmosphere and all the sheep bleats while you try to beat your top score.

name: No Tithe for Olaf
summary: A grimly humorous single-player tower defense roguelite set in 17th-century Norway. Defend your farm from the King’s tax collectors, build bizarre towers, and lead a farmer’s uprising as a goat-riding rebel! Upgrade your farm, manage resources, and weaponize onions in escalating rural chaos.

name: Nonsolar
summary: A survival horror game where you must work alongside an 8-bit computer to overcome deadly challenges. Use unique weapons and equipment to explore a dark, hostile exoplanet.

name: Nordic Ashes: The Complete Saga
summary: Nordic Ashes is a challenging Norse inspired roguelite-survivor game, where you’ll have to survive hordes of creatures that come your way.

name: Northgard: Gardariki, Clan of the Hippogriff
summary: From Southern Lands, Sindri, eldest of Brok and Eitria, returns clad in fire and steel, his twin hammers echoing both legacy and defiance. A figure of both might and mastery, bringing with him the legacy of the forge and the discipline of distant Kingdoms.

name: Nothing To Declare
summary: Live the thrill of working for airport security! In a wholesome setting, weigh and scan bags, ask passengers questions, and if you are not convinced, search their luggage for dangerous items. It could be a bomb or an oddly shaped electronic device. Earn money and upgrade your workstation.

name: NoFlash
summary: VALORANT flash-dodging trainer with dot-clicking mini-game. Two modes: ① Practice (customize flashes/targets) ② Time Attack (score under limit). Master flashes while boosting aim!

name: Noah and the Sea
summary: Noah and the Sea is a short narrative game that explores the past and present of an old man. In this side-scrolling adventure game, you control the protagonist, exploring his surroundings and objects, and experience a story that moves between a modern city and a small rural island village in different time periods.

name: No Zombie Land: Lucy
summary: No zombie land: Lucy is a freestyle shooter 3D lawn mowing game.Lucy arrives at an abandoned village full of mutated zombies, and in order to survive, you need to keep fighting.

name: No One's Island
summary: On No One's Island, you have only one goal: survival. Everything and everyone on the island wants to kill you. The island's wildlife, its other inhabitants, nature, the other survivors... Do whatever it takes to survive one more night.

name: Nophenia
summary: explore atmospheric dreams of vagrant but familiar memories.

name: No Walls in Heaven
summary: No Walls In Heaven is a first-person exploration platformer about losing yourself in the hostile vastness of the cosmos. Grapple, leap, and fight your way through the towering concrete and metal landscapes of a lost megastructure that seems to disobey all laws of physics and reality.

name: N.O.X.
summary: N.O.X. is a co-op horror game where up to four players take on the roles of paranormal investigators. Players must find clues, identify the type of spirit, and banish it using their tools, either alone or together with their crew.

name: Nocturnal Visitors: Book One
summary: Discover a world where magic and science, chaos and order, are two sides of the same coin.

name: Noctuary: New Journey
summary: Noctuary DLC: "New Journey" Featuring 6 stories, 17 sections, and 3 playable characters. All mysteries and adventures await you to unravel!

name: Nova's Cube!
summary: Nova's Cube! A Bullet Hell Game!

name: Node Math
summary: Node Math is a simple, idle-factory game about combining numbers with math operators, unlocking new stuff, and making money go brrr!

name: NonFullControl
summary: A simple and short minigame.When some of your actions are not under your control, can you unravel the truth behind? Relying on partially controllable operations to pass through the level, there seems to be some anomalies in the space.

name: Non-Virtual Reality Games
summary: VR without the headset. Games without visuals. Each player gets one of the VR controllers, no headset needed. All included games only use vibrations and sound to convey the game, while you play in the real world.

name: Now Hiring
summary: Now Hiring is a top-down narrative adventure where you play a job seeker trapped in a scam syndicate. Across 21 days, your choices in dialogue battles and moral dilemmas will shape your fate, reveal human struggles, and lead to multiple endings.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Hadou
summary: "Nobunaga's Ambition: Hadou" is the latest in the "Hadou" series. It faithfully portrays the battles of the Warring States period, including castle sieges and clashes of large armies on the battlefield.

name: No More Furries
summary: Hordes of Werewolves siege the world and you alone must find out how to stop it. Fight in a Singleplayer Round-based Shooter as you fight off waves of enemies. Only the strongest can survive the longest in this action packed game.

name: Nocky el Armadillo
summary: New icon of 2D platforms that will try to fight to gain a space in the hearts of lovers of the genre. Join him on his fascinating adventure and celebrate his birth together!

name: Noloinstale
summary: Noloinstale is an immersive MMORPG that offers a completely reimagined adventure with custom content, unique events, and refined progression systems. It combines balance, challenge, and creativity within a vibrant community focused on quality and innovation.

name: Non-violent Hero
summary: A pixel RPG where you play as a handsome, non-violent Hero on a mission to help the King rescue his daughter, who has been kidnapped by the Demon King!

name: No Way Back: Dark Horizon
summary: Survive on a mysterious island! Battle against the infected creatures of a failed experiment, gather resources, build your base, and uncover the dark secret of the island.

name: Noneworld
summary: NONEWORLD is a cute RPG set in a dying world. You are a Princess from another world, accompanied by an omnipresent Cheshire Cat. Only YOU and your fruity colored allies can LIGHT THE WORLD and return home safely.

name: Nova Survivors
summary: A sci-fi survivor game focused on fast-paced combat and deep meta-progression. This is no walk in the park. You'll land on a hostile alien planet and face relentless waves of monsters. The only way to survive this hell is to fight, upgrade, and permanently strengthen yourself!

name: Nonogos
summary: No no-go's in Nonogos, a nonogram solving game! Choose from a wide selection of nonograms to solve, with no restriction on puzzle grid size!

name: Not Raised by Wolves
summary:
Not Raised by Wolves is a third-person shooter starring La Coyota, an anthropomorphic gunslinger. Dash, aim, and shoot with your revolver while your robotic sidekick hacks enemies to stun them and expose weak points in your fight to rescue the colony’s pups.

**A student team project designed to deliver a ~10 minute experience.

name: Node RPG
summary: In Node RPG, take control of a humble cursor embarking on a grand quest! Select from unique classes, overcome tough zones, and enjoy the feeling of always getting stronger in this minimalist RPG incremental adventure.

name: No More Work for Ito
summary: A horror visual novel with light adventure elements, about a group of office workers grinding through an intense all-nighter. Just do your job and.... don’t ask about Ito… nothing happened to him... everything is fine.

name: No Zombies Allowed
summary:
No Zombies Allowed is an action and resource-management game where you need to defend your character's position from attacking hordes of the undead that will try and take your life, along with anyone else behind you, with one clean bite.

The difference between this game and other similar titles is that No Zombies Allowed takes strategic, real-time elements that have you organizing the defenses of your city and recruiting new characters, and combines them with elements typical of action games that have you shooting down the zombies that get too close.

Of course, in addition to recruiting other characters and looking for supplies, you can also upgrade your weapons and buy new ones, all of which makes your zombie annihilation a little simpler. Normally, you can take them out by just pressing the zombie in question.

No Zombies Allowed is an entertaining title that, between its playful graphics and simple gameplay, makes sure that you'll have a good time playing on your Android device.

name: Nova Rally
summary: Nova Rally: a chaotic party racer for up to 24 players. Assemble your dream team of drivers, outwit rivals, and chase victory via stats-based strategy and dynamic action! Play locally or online!

name: Noroi no Game: Chi
summary:
Action game beginners absolutely must be afraid.

This is the most brutal side-scrolling action game based on the "Horror Game" that appeared in the Nintendo DS horror game "Nanashi no Game: Me." Escape vicious traps and aim for the 13th level.

name: Noroi no Game: Goku
summary:
Action game beginners absolutely must be afraid.

This is the most brutal side-scrolling action game based on the "Horror Game" that appeared in the Nintendo DS horror game "Nanashi no Game: Me." Escape vicious traps and aim for the 13th level.

name: No Food?
summary: On a rainy day, you find and bring home an abandoned kitten. Now, you're responsible for this precious life. Provide the best environment and food, building a deep bond. Your love and care will determine the cat's growth and its final moments.

name: Nocturnal Throne
summary: Collect 100s of items, level up your character and obliterate anything that crosses your path. There are no limits in this endless rogue-lite. Mix and match weapons, items and characters to create the perfect build.

name: Not the End
summary: Not The End is a story-driven horror drama in first-person view. Fight zombies with your sword and keep your family alive using the resources you collect. A story that will push your psychological limits awaits you.

name: Nocturne Maze: Shadows in the Hedge
summary: Defeat as many ghoulish enemies and go for the high score!

name: No Exit
summary: No Exit is a small chapter based indie horror game. You'll have to face challenging enemies, and perhaps make some allies, as you try to escape the crooked dimension you're trapped in.

name: Nonetbeat
summary: NonetBeat is a TPS action game starring three charming heroines. Each with unique combat styles, they obliterate hordes of monsters with magic! Sandbox stages let you destroy terrain for dynamic battles. Collect magic and unleash dazzling combos in thrilling hack-and-slash action!

name: Noise Canceler
summary: APods — AI-powered earbuds that read your emotions and generate music. Drawn to these songs, five ordinary people find themselves moved to action.

name: Not Survivors
summary: Not Survivors is a top-down survival Roguelike game. Choose from diverse adventurers, skillfully combine item and weapon effects to fend off hordes of monsters, survive, and secure victory.

name: Nocturnal Sun
summary: Nocturnal Sun is an open-world RPG set in the mysterious and lush environment of Cozamal. You've been tasked with exploring the region and documenting available resources within the Codex provided. Cultivate the land, fish, hunt, and harvest natural resources to discover the riches of Cozamal.

name: Nowhere Belonging
summary: A 15 minute account of not belonging. No save points. No going back.

name: No One Leaves the Field
summary: A first-person folk horror game set on a cursed farm where the wheat shifts each time you enter. Search for your car keys, uncover the family’s dark ritual, and beware—something ancient walks between the stalks.

name: Nontan to Issho: Kuru-kuru Puzzle
summary:
Nontan to Issho: Kuru Kuru Puzzle is a game based on a children’s anime and book series telling the story of a young kitten and his animal friends.

It is a block puzzle game the likes of Tetris and Baku Baku Animal, where the goal is to stack blocks in a way that matching ones are connected and therefore disappear. Unlike in Tetris games though, the blocks cannot be rotated – they can instead be flipped around to reveal different blocks on the reverse side. There’s also the usual bonus blocks that remove entire rows, as is common in this genre. A two-player mode is also featured, even though unlike what usually happens in two-player gameplay of puzzle games, the actions of one player will not affect the other directly (like having more blocks falling on your opponent’s screen after you scored pretty high).

name: Noise’s Halloween Bash
summary: Play as The Noise in this one level fan-game, inspired by the Crash Bandicoot and Rayman franchises. Jump, slide, dash and bash through a 2.5D world while collecting pumpkins to save the Halloween festivities!

name: No Kings Tiny Defenders
summary: Cozy roguelike tower defense where every run is unique. Build, adapt, and defend a world with no kings.

name: No, I'm Not a Femboy
summary: The game takes place in a world on the brink of destruction. You experience all the horrors of the apocalypse in your own cozy house on the outskirts of a small town. People may knock on your door in need of your help. Will you be able to save them?

name: No More Heroes
summary: "No More Heroes" is a 2.5D survival-exploration game. You find yourself in a world of unknown Yin-Yang and Five Elements forces. Gather food and materials, construct buildings and tools, forge weapons, combat dangerous entities, and confront unexpected events. Do whatever it takes to survive.

name: No Man's Land
summary: A First World War turn-based strategy game. It's you versus them, versus No Man's Land.

name: Not My War
summary: Explore, survive, and escape a deadly island as a clever ferret. Not My War is a 3D isometric stealth and exploration game with a day-night cycle that turns time against you. Gather resources, help survivors, and repair your boat, but remember... the robots never rest.

name: No, I'm not a Voenkom
summary: You're an ordinary factory worker, whiling away your dreary life in a nondescript small town. You had a stable job, your own apartment, mortgaged at just 89% interest, and everything was going well, until one gloomy evening, an uninvited guest knocked on your door...

name: Noël: La Niege Special
summary:
Noël La Niege Special is the third game in the Noël series for the Playstation one console. This game is the sequel to Noël La Neige and features the same 3 female characters from that game: Yumi Tachibana, Ryo Midorikawa & Chisato Kadokura.

The game uses the same controls of Noël La Neige: each button is for a different thing like say yes, no or question.

The gameplay is about choosing different answers or gather information to investigate in your computer network. Click on Interactive to start talking to Kaho or another girl right away. During the talk mode, there is a re-sizable data window in the middle of the screen. As your character talks with Yumi or any other character, topic icons stream across this bar, so click on them and they will be transferred to the data window.

name: Nocturnal Watch
summary: In this short anomaly horror game your job is to patrol the forest at the northern border. Spot anomalies and purge the rot being spread by the witch.

name: North Hunt
summary: Think you’re good at hiding? North Hunt dares you to prove it. Hunt or be hunted in this Viking-era & social deduction sequel to West Hunt, packed with new systems, tense missions, and chaos worth every betrayal.

name: NodalBastion
summary: Defend the last AI core in an abstract minimalist game of incremental progression, powerful skills, and evolving networks.

name: No Entry
summary:
This is a club bouncer simulator meant for the types with a dark sense of humor but deep empathy of the feeling of exclusion, social isolation, and desensitization of the pleasures of life. Decide who is worthy and unworthy, while factoring in the club's status and the bouncer's health. Dealing with losers and drunks can be a very stressful job, and there is a support system of a bartender(shop), DJ(information), bottle girl(opportunities), and a loveable, taller, older dominating boss(raison d'etre).

There is downtime to talk to these fellow employees, but occasionally the club can have a VIP who can also add lore to the experience of night life debauchery. But really, it's just scanning, and making decisions. Occasionally, there will be an attendant who will protest their refusal of entry. They can be denied again, or force can be used. Sometimes they are willing to bribe, which there are no negative consequences in the short run, but may devalue the club's atmosphere in the long run. Survive 10 nights without dying or the club closing down due to an incompetent bouncer.

name: Nora the girl
summary: Nora wakes up in a strange forest with no memory of how she got there. Guided by silent creatures and mysterious events, she explores an unfamiliar world and slowly uncovers a hidden truth. The journey is driven by choices, atmosphere, and subtle storytelling.

name: Not Not 2: A Brain Challenge - Platinum Edition
Nodwar
summary: Nodwar is a Real Time Strategy game based in the browser.

name: Noble Steed
summary: A fast, funny 2D platformer where every level throws you into chaotic combat and questionable heroics, all to rescue your runaway horse… again.

name: No Roads: 4×4 Off-Road Challenge
summary: Take it slow or send it hard—No Roads lets you tackle terrain your way. Explore tough climbs, find creative lines, and use tools like a winch when you need a boost.

name: Not Waste Wood
summary: Step into a gorgeous yet perilous world, create your unique combat style from 40 distinct cultivation techniques, and challenge the ultimate bosses of seven chapters in each random adventure.

name: Northflower: The Last Watch
summary: "Northflower: The Last Watch" is an atmospheric horror with a first-person view, elements of survival and tower defense. You will have to fight hordes of opponents using firearms and turrets. The game will appeal to both fans of fast-paced action and fans of strategic thinking.

name: Nothing But Me and You
summary: A cosmic story about enduring love and true conclusions.

name: No Means Nothing
summary: Psychological horror/ anti-dating sim about learning to say no.

name: No Law
summary: Welcome to Port Desire, a city that doesn't belong to anyone, but where everyone wants a piece. You’re Grey Harker, an ex-military attempting to live a quiet life after near fatal injuries in the field. All you want now is peace - but in a city of no laws, what you want isn’t always what you get.

name: Not For You
summary: Not For You is an album of short, narrative experiences, which you can play through in any order you would like. Each one delves further into the thoughts and feelings of the games developer, Thomas Hunt, and the struggle that is the video game industry.

name: Noelle
summary: Trapped in a frozen dimension of depression, you fight despair and fading sanity as memories of Christmas haunt you. Every step is a battle, every memory a lifeline. Can you survive the season when even hope has frozen over?

name: Nocturn
summary: Nocturn is a strategy rogue-like game where you have to survive eternal darkness. Rebuild your outpost, manage villagers, survive random events and assaults to bring back the light to the world!

name: North Sentinel Island
summary: A young man and woman, a rising YouTube couple, travel to the forbidden North Sentinel Island and vanish. Their last upload shows their approach to the island. Five days later, the Indian Coast Guard finds their empty boat drifting offshore. No bodies. No clues. No contact.

name: No Nap November
summary: No Nap November is a short psychological horror game set in a kindergarten during an endless nap time. Observe each loop carefully, spot anomalies, and survive an entire month without sleep to save yourself and the children from a strange presence.

name: Notebook Battlegrounds
summary: A multiplayer game where your voice is the weapon. Play as a random letter and use proximity voice chat to hear nearby players. Say the funny words on your screen to shoot opponents, find secret words for special powers, and battle in Timed Deathmatch or Battle Royale!

name: No Backup
summary: Escape together - or die alone. In this intense co-op bodycam horror game, you and your team are hunted by a relentless creature. Communicate, stay quiet, and fight to survive. Every move counts. Every sound could be your last.

name: Noob's Room
summary: Escape from the noobs room. It is called noobs room becouse this room is for noobs. No offence but this is really easy for escape the room gamers.

name: Nobu Jump
summary: A game where you keep aiming upward, no matter how many times you fall. It's a high-difficulty action game — skilled players might clear it easily, but for those who aren't good at games, it will be a real challenge.

name: Not Enough Space
summary: Land with your friends on the surface of various planets, gather resources, create items and buildings, defeat enemies and move to other planets to discover their secrets and secrets

name: Noxpheria: The Crimson Madness
summary: Noxpheria is a survival horror where investigation and survival intertwine. Trapped in Ranchester, Logan faces scarce resources, infirm creatures, and a strangely familiar cult while uncovering links between an old literary obsession and the death of his wife and daughter.

name: No Time 2 Freeze
summary: The 32 maps range from small to gigantic, with a large number of different places to explore. This is also facilitated by an unusual gimmick: on each level, you can find a computer map power-up, which will display the approximate location of all secrets on the automap in the form of snowflake icons, encouraging you to explore. At the same time, the difficulty curve is designed for simple but enjoyable combat that won't distract you too much from the exploration process, but won't leave you without dynamic action either.

name: Nova Hunter
summary: Nova Hunter is an exciting space adventure game that requires quick reflexes and courage. Players must earn points by fighting off wild aliens.

name: Nowhere Highway
summary: Atmospheric Single-player Survival FPS. Explore a post-apocalyptic world one year after a global catastrophe. Uncover the story of a mysterious mountain highway that connects the last remaining patches of life. Explore the world, fight for survival, and push forward along the highway.

name: No Time Left
summary:
The clock is broken, can you replace it?

From now on, you need to check that the time doesn't run out. Click on the clock to gain time. Upgrade your "time per click" by pressing the upgrade button on the right. Sometimes, a boss will spawn. Kill him to get extra time.

Note: This game was a jam submission to the German-language 'MrLuchs Sommer Wettbewerb 2024' (Summer Games Competition 2024) on itch store in 2024. It ran between July 2nd 2024 at 3:22 AM to August 5th 2024 at 7:58 AM.

name: Nocturnal Quest
summary: Nocturnal Quest is a Semi-Idle Adventure RPG with 100s of spells & effects, 6 classes, 12 specializations, and countless builds. Have your teams grind gear and progress through an infinity of levels!

name: No Reason To Climb
summary:
A simple yet challenging 2D platformer about climbing for absolutely no reason.

Jump, dodge, and keep climbing in a world where the only goal is to reach as high as possible. There is no reason, no epic story… the characters simply do it. Why? Nobody knows.

Explore 5 different worlds, each more difficult than the last. As you progress, new enemies, deadlier obstacles, and tougher challenges will appear, putting your precision and skill to the test. One small mistake can make you fall… and lose all your progress.

This game is perfect for casual players looking for a challenge, as well as speedrunners trying to complete the game as fast as possible.

name: Noneday
summary: Grab your notebook and get ready to explore every nook and cranny of the surreal, esoteric adventure game Noneday! Search dreams for clues, solve puzzles, and unlock the secrets hiding within Bow’s own mind.

name: Nothmere
summary: A retro classic point-and-click RPG inspired by 1990s adventure games, primarily Quest for Glory. Explore a mysterious town where no one remembers their past, powerful wards hold back unspeakable horrors, and every choice shapes the fate of a world trapped between life and death.

name: Nocan's Quest: Sex Gold Glory
summary: An erotic JRPG adventure in the primal wastelands. Barbarian Nocan unleashes sexual demonesses seeking to enslave the world. He fights back by exploring ancient ruins, uncovering lost lore, collecting artifacts, earning gold, and fighting turn-based battles.
